Who is she force fed by?

The Brood

The Morlocks

or

Karma
11112.title: Force Fed

111121.content:
14-year-old Kitty Pryde was walking back to the Mansion after getting some take-out at a nearby fast food restaurant. While eating the double cheeseburger, she heard someone screaming. Quickly finishing her meal, she went to a nearby alley and changed into her blue Shadowcat uniform.

Running over to the source of the screams, she found the place empty. Suddenly, she heard a sound behind her. She turned around and saw a group of the alien Brood, a group of aliens who she had met back when she was still new to the X-Men. During said battle, the Brood had tried to infect her and the other X-Men with their eggs and thus make them into Broods as well, but the team had succeed in stopping this procedure.

The Brood lept to attack her. Kitty didn’t react fast enough, couldn’t get away, and was knocked unconscious by the Brood via a stun blaster. "We've got her. Quickly, get her into the ship." order one Brood to his two cronies. One picked Kitty up and carried her to the ship in question and they then took off into space.

Kitty soon awoke to find herself strapped to a chair, still wearing her costume. Then a Brood came into view, and snarled, “You shall be the new vessel for our queen, but your body is yet to be ready. As such, we shall give you the perfect body for you to carry our queen."

Before Kitty can protest or say anything, a machine came in and stuck a hose into her mouth. Then, she started to feel something entering her mouth. She realized it was food, Earth food. Cake, pie, doughnuts, burgers, sandwiches, cookies, hot dogs, cupcakes and more. Kitty tried to hold it back as it started filling her mouth, but she eventually swallowed the food when she realized it wasn’t going to stop, not wanting to choke as her cheeks were pretty stuffed by that point.

While being fed, Kitty’s mind was focused on how to escape, and as such didn’t realize her slowly protruding belly as it started to bulge against her costume's jacket.

Meanwhile, Ororo Monroe, Wolverine and Colossus were waiting for Kitty. "I wonder where Kitty is. She usually is not this late without calling first." Storm said with concern. Since meeting Kitty, Ororo had formed a mother-daughter bond with the girl.

"Maybe she got held up on the subway, or somethin' 'Roro. Punk'in can handle herself. Ya know that." Logan grunted assuredly. Like Ororo, he had a close parent-daughter like relationship with Kitty ever since he helped her during an adventure in Japan a few months prior.

"All the same, Katya usually is not late in returning home. We should investigate." Colossus offered with concern for his ex-girlfriend. After a moment, the other two agreed. Soon, they were in the Blackbird, heading for space after going to the alley and discovering what had happened. Magneto, Rogue, Nightcrawler and Phoenix had all offered to come help, but the trio had declined. They knew the Brood was responsible for Kitty's kidnapping and that, if they failed and were made into Broods themselves, the other four would be needed to help defend the planet should the Brood or other alien foes of the team try to invade.

Half an hour later and Kitty had finally given up, deciding to accept whatever was happening to her. She had gained much in that time, her belly was much larger, almost making her look pregnant. Her breasts and butt had also expanded, becoming twice as large as they were before. Her face and arms had also been subject to her weight gain, and looked thicker and softer. Her blue costume was straining against her ever expanding stomach, yet the machine kept on feeding her, filling her up with bite after bite of food.

“God, I hope the others find me soon before I burst like an overstuffed diaper." Kitty thought as she kept loudly gulping down the food, swallowing a large piece of custard cream pie followed by a large chili cheeseburger, three ham sandwiches, six glazed doughnuts, four brownies and a large ice cream sandwich.

The machine kept feeding Kitty even more food. Cake, sandwiches, burgers, hot dogs, pizza, cookies, doughnuts, ice cream, chocolate, tacos and other foods kept pouring into her gullet. She lost track of time, as her body started to grow ever fatter. Her belly had grown so much that it had long since started spilling out of her pants, over her waistband. Her arms and legs looked like inflated balloons, and kept growing as piles of fat continued to stack on her. Her breasts were the size of basketballs, and though she couldn’t see it, she knew her butt was much larger. Her face had also developed a double chin. She looked at her new expanded body, and thought, “I am gonna kill those Brood for this when I get out.”

Then, she heard some crashing from somewhere close, and soon, Storm, Wolverine and Colossus came into the room. Once they finished up the Brood guarding her, they made their way over to Kitty and removed the hose from her mouth. As she swallowed the last of the food in her mouth, she gave a large belch, becoming slightly embarrassed by it. However, none of the others said a word, as they slowly lifted and pulled the obese Kitty out of the chair.

As she struggled to walk due to her thick legs, she had to rely on the others as support as she got used to her plump legs. Finally, she gave up and turned to Colossus, saying, “Can you just carry me? It’ll be a lot faster that way.” He then lifted her up and started to run out of the room, but as they rounded the next corner, they saw their path blocked by even more Brood.

“You should stay here, Katya. We will handle this,” Colossus said as he put Kitty down. However, she was not going to just sit out of this fight, so she stood up with some effort and ran into the fight, huffing and puffing, her large gut jiggling and bouncing, already seeing sparks of lightning and what looked to be sliced off arms of Brood. As she phased through everything in front of her, she made her way to a few in the back. Turning solid, she tried throwing a punch, but due to her new girth, she threw more than the punch, falling forward and tumbling into the Brood. “ Okay, that works,” she thought as she continued to run into Brood, toppling them down with her weight, and pinning them to the ground with her massive belly, before giving a swift punch to the face of each Brood.

“Maybe this weight can help me,” Kitty thought. And soon, she and the rest of her team were running over to the Blackbird, flying back to Earth.

“How are you feeling, Kitty?” asked Storm. Kitty replied with a shrug, saying, “Pretty good, actually. I’m thinking about keeping this fat to help me fight. Maybe I'll lose a little bit though. Also, when we get home, can we stop by someplace to eat, like maybe a few pie shops, taco restaurants and bakeries?” She smiled, just as the others looked at her with a look of shock and wonder as she patted her big belly which rumbled in hunger at the thought of all that food..
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------
One month later…

“Put the money down, and step away from the people,” Kitty ordered the thieves as she phased in from the roof of the bank. In the month since being fed by the Brood, she had tried to work off some of the weight to give her more mobility, but she also retained some of the weight, training to fight with her new body.

Kitty’s belly, while still big, was trimmed down, so that costume could at least cover most of it up. Her arms and legs were less thick, and her face looked less puffy. She had, however, retained some extra weight on her thighs and back. “Now I can sit on the guys I’m fighting,” she had told Storm when asked.

Her fattened body, she realized, can also take some of the punches thrown her way. It also adds some extra force to her punches, kicks and overall strength. Kitty had also made a commitment to keep her weight, which made her gain a massive appetite, eating much more fatty foods whenever she got the chance.

As the thieves at the bank recovered from the shock of her entrance, the leader shouted to his men, “Shoot her fat ass!” As the thieves started firing their guns at her, she ran at them, phasing through the bullets, and as she made her way towards the leader, turned solid, and tackled him to the floor, pummelling him until he put up his hands in surrender.

As the police came in to arrest the thieves, she heard Colossus ask her her situation through the comms. “Good,” she replied, “I’m coming back to the mansion, and you better not have eaten all of the pizza, or I swear I’ll kill you.”
111121.title: The Brood

choices: At Stevie's dance class, Kitty rips her leotard and falls on her butt.
Dance class goes by with no problems.
1111211.content:
Kitty changed back to her normal clothes and started for home. As she did, her large big belly gurgled hopefully. "What's up, tummy? You need somethin' to tie you over until we get home and hopefully have more of that yummy cheese, pepperoni, mushroom, sausage and pineapple pizza?" she guessed, patting it. *Grumble* *Gurgle* confirmed her tummy as it jiggled and burbled in delight.

Kitty looked around and then noticed a McDonald's nearby. "Perfect." She smiled and hurried over to it. She went over to the counter and looked at the menus thoughtfully. After a moment, a young female cashier came up. "Hi and welcome to McDonald's. What can I get for you?" she smiled politely. Kitty smiled after a moment.

"I'll take 10 Big Macs with cheese, ketchup, mustard, pickles, lettuce and onion. I'd also like 6 large fries, an extra large chocolate shake, five McRibs, heavy on the sauce, and three Fillet of fish, no tarter sauce." She requested. The girl seemed shocked by this but quickly nodded and moved to fill the order after Kitty quickly paid for it.

After a few minutes, the large bags were ready. Kitty grabbed them, thanked the girl and left McDonald's humming happily as she headed for the mansion, her belly jiggling and wobbling.

Soon, she had reached the mansion just as she finished the last Fillet of fish sandwich and fries. Stifling a big burp, she entered the mansion and went to the kitchen, still humming one of her favorite songs as she did.

Upon reaching the kitchen, she found Colossus, Rachel and Colossus' younger sister and her roommate/best friend Illyana there. They were clearly finishing up lunch as they had empty plates and glasses in front of them. Illyana noticed her first.

"Well, look who just waddled her big butt in." she giggled. Kitty rolled her eyes. Illyana had been making fat jokes about her for the last month since the Brood incident. Despite this, the others knew she was only joking and so Kitty often laughed along. Kitty's favorite joke about her girth was Illyana stating that Kitty is so fat, she needs a cab just to get to the next corner.

"Very funny, Illyana. You know, if we weren't best buds I'd sit on you." Kitty joked as she phased partially into the fridge and located the cheese, pepperoni, sausage, mushroom and pineapple pizza her taste buds and belly were craving.

"No thanks. I don't wanna be under your hippo butt, especially after you've eaten enough spicy Mexican food or chili to take out an army with just one of your super farts!" Illyana laughed. She wasn't kidding about Kitty's farts either.

A few weeks earlier, Kitty had eaten an entire pot of Rogue's Five-Alarm Chili for lunch and had ended up dealing with burping actual smoke (due to how hot the chili had been) and large, smelly farts. Even Wolverine was in tears from the fumes. Kitty had farted so much that day that she swore that she'd nearly pooped her pants a few times.

"Awww. I'm hurt, Illyana. I thought we were best friends." Kitty whimpered dramatically. Illyana giggled as she watched Kitty take the large pizza box out of the microwave and sit down beside Rachel.

"So, Kitty, how'd the bank situation go?" Rachel asked as she watched her friend and fellow X-Man take a large bite of pizza and slowly pull the slice away, causing the cheese to stretch out until it broke and hung from Kitty's mouth as she slurped it up while still chewing. Kitty chewed for a few minutes and then swallowed loudly before answering.

"It went really good. I didn't have to sit on anyone and my awesome new strength helped me wallop those suckers into next year!" She giggled before attacking the last few slices of pizza. "I thought you said you were coming home right after the mission. What kept you, Katya?" Colossus asked gently. "Oh I got hungry and stopped at McDonald's for a 'light' snack." Kitty explained before belching loudly as she tossed the empty box into the recycle bin.

"Well, hope you didn't eat too much. We've got our dance class with Stevie today." Illyana reminded her. Kitty wiped her mouth and nodded. "Thanks for reminding me. We'd better go and get ready." She smiled as the duo headed for their bedroom.

Stevie Hunter was a former dancer turned instructor after an injury during a performance. She'd become Kitty's dance teacher after Kitty had joined the X-Men a year prior and so knew of Kitty and Illyana's statuses as mutants. Despite this, she kept her friendship with the team and was very kind.

Once in their room, Illyana and Kitty changed into their dance leotards. While Illyana had no problems, Kitty had to struggle a bit. She had yet to order a larger leotard and had barely managed to keep this one from bursting as she got bigger. Once ready, the two BFFs set off for Stevie's studio (after Kitty made a quick pit stop to the bathroom).
1111211.title: She stops by a fast food joint for extra food

11112111.content:
Once they arrived at Stevie's studio, Kitty and Illyana met up with some of their friends there. The girls were soon chatting away about comfortable topics when another girl sauntered up to Kitty. "Well, well, well, Pryde. Looks like someone's been hitting the market a little too much lately." she smirked, poking Kitty's large belly. Kitty just glared at her. "What do you want, Blaire?" she asked in annoyance.

"Oh, I just wanted to see the class' fat little piggy before today's lesson. Wouldn't want our porky girl to become pooped during class." Blaire said with a superior smirk. "I'd rather be big and fat than a skinny, twiggy pompous jerk like you!" Kitty replied, forcing Illyana to quickly grab hold of her obese BFF's arms and restrain her as Blair laughed in superior amusement.

"Just ignore her, Kitty." said another girl, an African-American girl named Lesha. "Yeah. Blair thinks she's so hot 'cause she has money, powerful parents and mansion." agreed another girl, this one a Chinese-American named Kumiko. Kitty smiled at her friends as Stevie arrived to begin the lesson.

As the today's lesson progressed, Kitty handled it rather well. Though pretty heavy and out of shape, she could still dance surprisingly well with her blubbery girth. However, she should've known things wouldn't last.

As Kitty performed a twirl, she felt her left slipper slide along the floor. "Woooooaaahhhhhh!!" She yelped as she lost her balance and fell with a heavy THUD on her butt, causing her body to jiggle like a large bowl of Jell-O. Some of the girls, mainly Blair's posse, snickered while Illyana, Stevie and the others all winced in sympathy. Blushing as red as a giant tomato, Kitty quickly heaved herself up and resumed her dance routine.

After the slip, things went normal until the end. Kitty finished her dance neatly and smoothly. "Well done, Kitty!" Stevie smiled as the others, except Blair and her cronies, cheered, applauded and smiled in agreement. Kitty, panting slightly, smiled and took a deep bow. But as she did, it happened.

*RRRRRIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!* Kitty's leotard could no longer handle the strain of stretching so much and ripped right down the middle of her butt, exposing her panties to the class. Immediately, she shot back upright, hands covering the giant hole, her face bypassing tomato red and going full blown deep maroon. No one spoke for a long moment.

Then, Blaire howled with laughter. "Guess you better lay off the snacks and buy a bigger leotard, Pryde! I bet a car seat place has your pattern on file!" she snorted, causing her posse to howl in delight as well. Kitty didn't say anything. She just turned, grabbed her stuff and raced out as fast as her thick, plump legs and feet could take her, sobbing as she did.

Despite growing very tired as she did, Kitty didn't stop running until she reached the mansion and flopped onto her bed, sobbing loudly into her pillow, resulting in it becoming soaked from her sweat and tears. Lockheed, her pet dragon, gently landed beside her and nuzzled her face, whimpering slightly. "Oh L-Lockheed! I'm so embarrassed! Not only did I slip and fall in class, but I also split my leotard, exposing my undies to everybody!" She wailed before burying her face into her sopping wet pillow again, her shoulders shaking.

Soon, she heard Illyana returning. "Are you okay?" Illyana asked gently as she sat down beside her friend. Kitty's face was blotchy from crying and her eyes were still red, but she had calmed down. "Yeah. I'm feeling okay now." she sniffled, blowing her nose loudly.

"Blaire's been kicked out for a few weeks." Illyana revealed. Kitty looked up in surprise. "Why?" she asked. "Lesha and Kumiko told Stevie about Blaire's insults after you left and Blair wouldn't shut up about you ripping your leotard during your bow. So Stevie told her not to come back until she learns to grow up." Illyana smiled. Kitty smiled as she wiped her eyes one last time.

"What'd Stevie say about everything?" she asked. Illyana was quiet for a moment before answering. "She said she'd order you a new stretchy leotard. Since she knows about what happened last month with the Brood, she figured you'd like that since you've decided to stay fat." she explained.

"Yeah I would." Kitty smiled as she looked at her best friend and roommate. "Stevie also said she'd like you to meet her for lunch tomorrow at noon." Illyana added. Kitty nodded and grinned. "I'd like that." she smiled. "Stevie also said she knows a place you'll like. She'll pick you up here and take you to it." Illyana smiled as she hugged her best friend. Kitty nodded again. Then, she looked at the alarm clock. It read 3:45.

"I'd better get a move on! Wolvie and I have a Danger Room session at 4!" She yelped as she quickly got up and pulled on her Shadowcat costume before phasing down to said room for the session as Illyana watched with a grin.
11112111.title: At Stevie's dance class, Kitty rips her leo...

choices: Kitty enjoys a really big dinner.
Kitty learns dinner isn't ready yet and so takes a nap. Sleeps all night.
111121111.content:
Kitty soon reached the Danger Room, huffing and panting slightly as she'd ran the rest of the way to it. Logan was already there, clad in his brown and yellow costume. "Hey, Logan." Kitty wheezed slightly, bending down and touching her knees as she caught her breath.

"Glad to see you're alright, Punk'in. Illyana told us 'bout what happened at dance class this afternoon." Wolverine replied. "Oh. Okay. So... what're we doin' today?" Kitty asked after a moment.

"I figured we'd see how yer current weight affects your agility and fightin' skills." Logan explained as he allowed Kitty to enter the room first. Once they had entered the Danger Room, Logan turned to Kitty.

"First, let's see you run through this obstacle course. You've got twenty minutes ta do it." Logan said, nodding to the course. Kitty bravely went to the starting line. Then, "GO!" Logan barked, starting his watch. Kitty took off quickly, her jumbo belly jiggling.

It was an obstacle course she'd run with Logan and the others before. You had to dodge lasers by zig-zagging or dodging them anyway possible before testing your leg muscles by jumping over hurdles, swing on a rope over a small pool of water and other items.

Kitty plowed on, determined not to let her girth ruin her record at this course. She evaded all the lasers with no problem, cleared all but one hurdle (her boot caught onto it and she took a massive belly flop as a result), and did everything very well. She finished the course, sweating, huffing, puffing, wheezing and red in the face, but smiling. Logan was grinning too as he eyed the stopwatch.

"Congratulations, Pun'kin. Ya beat your own record!" Logan revealed as he showed her the stopwatch. Kitty's previous time on the course had been 18.20 minutes, the highest out of all the X-Men and New Mutants who did the course except for Logan and Storm. But now, the stopwatch read 18.09 minutes! Kitty couldn't believe it. She just kept gulping air and panting in between gulps as she grabbed her water bottle and guzzled half of it before she managed to answer. "Thanks... Wolvie..." she panted as she took another large swing of water.

"Alright. Now, let's see how ya can handle these robots." Logan smirked as he pushed a button and six large robots appeared. They were rather big and powerful looking. Kitty smiled as she squared off as the robots lunged for her.

Minutes later, Kitty phased through the final robot, short circuiting it and causing it to collapse on its' face. The other robots were either completely destroyed or otherwise depowered. "How was that, Logan?" she smiled. Logan just smirked. "Kid, I think ya can still handle yerself in a scrape, even with your current weight." He chuckled, patting Kitty on her shoulder.

Kitty smiled and went to get her water bottle. Once in the locker rooms, she got undressed and took a nice, hot relaxing shower, allowing the water to run over her large, obese body. After a while, she climbed out and dried off before squeezing herself into a tight yellow t-shirt and green sweatpants.

She then decided to go and see if dinner was ready yet since it was almost dinnertime now. Concentrating hard, Kitty slowly walked up through the ceiling and into the main hallway. She then happily skipped towards the kitchen for a big dinner.
111121111.title: Training session with Wolverine

choices: Kitty meets Stevie for their lunch date
1111211111.content:
Kitty soon arrived in the kitchen to find Storm cooking away. Ever since Kitty had decided to keep the weight the Brood had ballooned her up to, she'd been eating larger and larger meals. Right now, Storm was busy cooking a large butterball turkey, a large basket of biscuits, five trays of corn on the cob, seven pies and a giant bowl of mashed potatoes. Kitty couldn't help it and started to drool hungerly.

Storm happened to turn around and noticed her youngest teammate watching with wide eyes and her tongue hanging out of her mouth. "Hello, Kitten. Dinner is almost ready." smiled Ororo, knowing why Kitty was eying the food like that.

"Great. 'Cause I'm starvin'!" Kitty smiled licking her lips loudly as she rubbed her hands together. Ororo smiled as she carried the food out to the table in the dining room. Kitty tried to help, but Storm just smirked. "I know you Kitten. You would eat all the food on the plate or tray before reaching the table." she explained when Kitty looked at her in bewilderment.

Soon, everything was ready and the X-Men and New Mutants gathered around for the meal. Kitty sat beside Rachel, Colossus and Illyana. As the turkey was passed around, Kitty eagerly grabbed two large drumsticks. She also took at least six corn on the cob and a giant blob of mashed potatoes. No one said anything as they watched Kitty start eating. She tore through the cobs like crazy, cleaning all six in seconds. She then plopped a large spoonful of mashed potatoes into her mouth, moaning in delight as she stuffed a second one in before swallowing loudly and repeating this.

None of the X-Men or New Mutants moved as they just kept watching. "An' Ah thought Blob was the only one who eats like a hog!" Rogue remarked quietly from beside Storm, who smiled slightly at the comment.

"Should we say something?" Nightcrawler asked, eyeing Kitty as she grabbed a drumstick and tore a very big chunk off, bulging her cheek as she chewed loudly, licking and smacking her lips and fingers after polishing both drumsticks off.

"If you wanna try, Elf, be my guest." Logan smirked as they watched Kitty continuing to make a pig of herself.

"Want a biscuit, Kitty?" Rachel asked, handing the basket over. "Thanks." Kitty smiled as she took one, only to then pour the entire basket into her mouth, making her cheeks bulgy and lumpy like a chipmunk's. Once Kitty'd swallowed them, she popped the remaining one into her mouth as well.

"Somethin's tellin' me we ain't gonna get a lot of this meal." Cannonball remarked quietly from beside Illyana and Sunspot, Roberto smirking slightly as Illyana merely chuckled. Finally, Kitty licked her plate clean and rubbed her giant tummy.

*BBBBBUUURRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!* She belched loudly with a grin. "Excuse me." she smiled as she heaved herself up and started for her and Illyana's bedroom. Once she left, the others began talking.

"Should we be concerned that Kitty is eating too much now?" asked Magma. "No. She still works out and has lost a great deal of weight after the Brood incident." Storm replied. "Not ta mention her blubber seems ta give her strength similar ta Rogue an' Petey." Logan added. That was true. Ever since she'd ballooned up, Kitty's strength had grown considerably. She could now lift items like a small car or fire engine with no trouble and could go up against Colossus and Rogue's strength with ease in sparring sessions.

"I agree with Storm and Wolverine. As rather unorthodox as Kitty's current situation is, she does seem to enjoy it and it certainly seems to have its' uses for her in a fight." Magneto agreed thoughtfully.

"Aye. But the lass still has some drawbacks with her weight." Rahne "Wolfsbane" Sinclair countered. "Yeah. Yesterday we went to the mall to play video games and get lunch. She had seven triple cheeseburgers with fries and a shake and she was so bloated, it took me pulling her and her powers to get her out of our booth." Cypher agreed, blushing at the memory of Kitty's soft, warm squishy belly on top of him when they'd hit the floor after Kitty popped free.

"Not to mention her accident in dance class today." Illyana added. The others nodded, having heard of Kitty ripping her leotard during her bow at Stevie's class when the girls came home. Luckily, Kitty already knew that they knew since Illyana had mentioned this when she was getting ready for her and Logan's Danger Room session.

"We will not say anything at this time. As long as Kitty keeps working out and dancing, I see no problems with her girth." Storm decided. The X-Men and New Mutants agreed after a moment and spent the rest of the meal quietly talking amongst themselves.
1111211111.title: Kitty enjoys a really big dinner.

choices: Kitty has to stop in order to make room by burping and farting
11112111111.content:
The next day, Kitty was waiting for Stevie to pick her up for their lunch meeting. She wore a large blue t-shirt and large jeans. Soon, Stevie's car pulled up and Kitty went over to it. "Hi, Stevie." Kitty smiled as she climbed into the passenger seat. "Hey, Kitty. How're you feeling?" Stevie asked with a grin.

"Pretty good. So, where're we goin'?" Kitty asked eagerly as she buckled up. "You'll see." Stevie smiled as she started the car and they set off. The drive into the city was fairly uneventful, with Kitty and Stevie talking about this and that as they drove along. Soon, Stevie stopped the car and they climbed out.

Kitty looked at the place in shock. It was a new swanky looking restaurant. "Wow, Stevie. This is where we're eating?" she asked in surprise. "Yep. I figured this place'd be a good area to have lunch." Stevie beamed as she led Kitty inside.

The inside was very nice looking and big. Several people were already there eating lunch. A smiling waitress brought Kitty and Stevie to their booth and handed them menus. "So, what looks good to you, Kitty?" Stevie smiled.

Kitty groaned as she looked at each item. "Everything looks so yummy, Stevie! But I don't have enough money to pay for it." she sighed in dismay. Stevie chuckled as she looked at her overweight pupil.

"Kitty, I told you I'm paying for lunch today. Order anything you want." she reminded Kitty. Kitty smiled mischievously. "You're gonna regret sayin' that, Stevie." she giggled as the waitress arrived again.

"Have you two decided on what to order?" she asked. "Yes. I'll have the chicken salad and a side of fries please." Stevie smiled as she handed her menu over. "Alright. And for you, miss?" the waitress asked Kitty. Kitty smiled at Stevie. "I'll take the bacon cheeseburger and a large side order of fries. I'd also like some of your Yankee pot roast with stuffing..." Kitty listed five more meals she would like as Stevie's eyes widened in shock, as did the waitress's eyes. "...And I'll finish with two of your apple cinnamon pies." Kitty finished with a smile as she handed her menu over. The waitress just nodded in shock as she left to fill the order.

"Um, Kitty? Are you sure you can eat all that food? I mean, I know your appetite's giant now, but that seems to be a bit much for even you." Stevie said with concern. Kitty just smiled and tied a napkin around her neck. "Don't worry, Stevie. I can handle this, no problemo!" She smiled as she awaited her massive meal.

Soon, the duo's lunches arrived. Stevie's was what she'd asked for: a medium chicken salad with french fries. Kitty's was bacon cheeseburger with fries, a large yankee pot roast with stuffing, five cheese, ham, tomato, bacon, lettuce and mayo sandwiches and two large apple-cinnamon pies.

"Enjoy your meals, ladies." The waitress said as she walked away. Kitty licked her lips eagerly and then set to work pigging out on the massive feast. Stevie just watched in shock as she ate her salad. Kitty was completely demolishing her feast with ease.

Suddenly...
11112111111.title: Kitty meets Stevie for their lunch date

111121111112.content:
Kitty paused just as she was getting ready to sink her teeth into the last sandwich. "Kitty, are you okay?" Stevie asked with concern for her friend and pupil. Kitty didn't answer. She just sat there, her cheeks bulging as her tummy rumbled. And then...

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!* She let out a giant burp, causing several people to look up in surprise. "Excuse me." Kitty blushed as she then stuffed the whole sandwich into her gullet.

"Feel better now?" Stevie asked. Kitty nodded as she swallowed her large mouthful of sandwich with a giant gulp. "Uh huh. Just need to bur-" Then she froze and screwed her face up. "Kitty?" Stevie asked. Kitty just grunted as she clutched her belly.

Then, *PPPPOOOOOOORRRRRRRAAAAAPPPPPPPPTTTTTTTTTTT!!!!!!!!!!* A thunderous fart escaped her giant butt. "Much better." she giggled as she went back to eating her pies. Finally, the duo were ready to leave. Stevie was somewhat shocked by the bill, but ultimately accepted it with a smile. The duo got up and went back to Stevie's car.

"Did you enjoy our lunch, Kitty?" She asked, Kitty, who was lovingly stroking her big belly with a smile. "Yeah. Thanks again, Stevie. I really enjoyed it." Kitty smiled as they arrived at the institute. "I'll have your new leotard ready by next week." Stevie smiled as they hugged, Kitty's blubber squishing against Stevie's trim belly. "Thanks." Kitty smiled as she climbed out of the car and headed inside.

Once inside, she went to her and Illyana's bedroom. Lockheed was there, calmly sitting on her bed. "Hey boy. Were you a good dragon?" Kitty cooed to him. Lockheed yipped and wagged his tail as Kitty stroked his head before sitting next to him.

"I had a really good lunch today boy." she smiled as he crawled into her lap and curled up.

Then, the alarms went off. Kitty jumped up in surprise, forcing Lockheed to use his wings, otherwise he would've taken a spill to the floor. "Better get ready." said Kitty as she tugged on her Shadowcat costume. It was a bit snug due to her pig out, but it would need to do for now.

Kitty then phased downstairs to the meeting room. Magneto, Rachel, Nightcrawler, Rogue, Wolverine and Storm were already there. "What's the problem?" Kitty asked. "There is an attack occurring in downtown." Magneto said promptly. "Who?" Kitty asked.

"It's..."
111121111112.title: Kitty has to stop in order to make room by burp...

choices: Kitty and Rogue pig out in the food court.
1111211111121.content:
"...Freedom Force." Magneto said as said team appeared on the screen. Mystique, Destiny, Blob, Pyro, Spiral, Avalanche and Spider-Woman were all attacking the New Salem Mall. The team had once been terrorists, but had since cut a deal with the government to become agents. However, it seemed they had decided to go AWOL.

"We must stop them." Storm said. With that, Magneto, Kitty, Nightcrawler, Rachel, Wolverine, Rogue, Colossus and Storm set off to stop Freedom Force.

When they arrived, they found that Avalanche and Pyro had used their powers to create a barrier, making a fortress of sorts inside the mall. Spiral was on lookout while Mystique, Spider-Woman and Destiny looted several stores and took hostages while Blob went to the third floor.

"Alright. Rogue you will handle Blob. Wolverine and Nightcrawler, you two can deal with Spider-Woman. Storm will take Mystique. Rachel, you will free the hostages. Colossus you will try and break down the barrier and I will evacuate the remaining workers and shoppers not yet captured." Magneto ordered promptly.

"Gotcha Mags." Logan said as they prepared. "Wait. Who's gonna take Spiral?" asked Rachel suddenly. "I can." Kitty said promptly. "Alright. Just be careful Kitten." Storm said as she watched her obese friend and teammate head to the second floor via walking on air, belly, boobs, hips and booty jiggling as she did.

After reaching the second floor unnoticed by the FF, Kitty slowly made her way towards the spot beneath her where she knew Spiral was. The only thing separating them now was the floor/first floor ceiling.

Kitty looked down at her big body and got an idea that made her smile. She phased through the floor and then went solid, allowing herself to fall. Spiral only had time to look up and see a massive blue butt falling for her. Not only was she too shocked to teleport in time, there was also no time for her to do so.

"OOOoommmmppphhh!" Kitty grunted as she crushed Mojo's teleporter and right hand woman under her jumbo booty. Spiral was incapacitated and Kitty now had a different challenge: getting off the six armed villainess.

Meanwhile, Wolverine and Kurt were fighting Spider-Woman. Despite being fairly new to the villainess game, the new Spider-Woman was proving to be no pushover. Kurt and Logan were only just able to counter her web lines and physical attacks.

Nearby, Storm was fighting Mystique in hand-to-hand combat. Both were proving to be equally matched, though Storm was somewhat quicker than Raven.

Destiny stood back and watched. Due to being blind, she usually didn't intervene physically. Instead she used her future predicting power to help the best she could. But right now, with Mystique and Storm moving around so much, she couldn't get a clear reading of the outcome.

At that moment, Colossus was busy crashing his way through the still very thick barriers. Though he was making good progress, it was taking him forever to get through it entirely due to Avalanche and Pyro making an even thicker wall behind the last one.

Rachel was nearby, using her telekinesis to free the tied up hostages from their bonds. When each one was freed, they quickly began helping Rachel free the others.

Magneto was evacuating the still free guards, shoppers and workers, using his powers to protect them from Avalanche and Pyro's attempts to capture them.

Meanwhile, Blob was (naturally) making his way to the third floor food court. Rogue was already there, just sitting calmly at an abandoned table, unafraid of the 510 pound mutant. Rogue then got an idea as she watched Blob lumber towards her.

Taking her glove off, she leapt onto Blob, absorbing his power and knocking him out cold. Rogue then felt a massive change coming...

Meanwhile, Kitty managed to finally heave her obese body off the still unconscious Spiral and slowly made her way towards the fortress.

1111232.content:
Ororo Monroe, also known as "Storm" walked through the mansion, reflecting on recent events. New Mutants member Karma had been possessed by Xavier's old enemy Shadow King. During this time, his overindulging habits rendered Karma immobility obese. The X-Men and New Mutants had successfully rescued and brought Karma home. Now, Professor X and Fantastic Four member Reed Richards were trying to find a way to help Karma while the X-Men dealt with Shadow King's remaining forces.

In the kitchen, "C'mon Kitty! What's the harm of one more bite?" Karma was complaining as Kitty "Shadowcat" Pryde held a large slice of pizza away from her while her body was being partially phased in Karma's gut and one hand phased in her cheek.

"Because the last four bites you took wiped out eight extra-extra large pizzas! I think that's enough snack time, Karma." Kitty explained gently. At that moment, Storm arrived.

"Kitty, the team is mobilizing to take on what's left of Shadow King's organization. I need you to stay here and look after Karma." She said. "Easier said than done!" Kitty retorted as she and Karma kept struggling.

Once the others left, Karma stopped struggling. "It's just not fair! I can't help it that I'm always hungry nowadays!" She pointed out sadly.

"We've got to find a way to curb your appetite somehow. I'm sure the Professor and Dr. Richards'll come up with a plan." Kitty said reassuringly as she walked away. Karma frowned in dismay as Kitty did this.

"She'll never understand. I'll just have to make her understand!" she decided.

What next?
1111232.title: After Karma is freed from Shadow King

choices: Storm arrives and sees what happened in her absence
Karma takes her hunger out of Kitty before Storm arrives
11112321.content:
Biting her lip in concentration, Karma used her powers to implant some of her enormous hunger into Kitty. As this happened, Kitty froze, her eyes becoming purple in color, the way anyone's Karma used her powers on did. She then turned back to the fridge in delight.

"MMMMM!! Let the snacking continue!" She smiled, licking her lips as she grabbed a carton of ice cream and poured it into her mouth while grabbing another.

Karma smirked as Kitty kept eating. Slowly, but surely, Kitty's belly started swelling up. As it got bigger and bigger, her costume's shirt started ripping open, exposing her jumbo belly. Her face also grew rounder as her body also bloated up.

However, Karma's delight turned to fear as Kitty started hogging the foods and drinks for herself. After eating the second ice cream carton in the same manner as the previous one, Kitty started guzzling down a large bottle of soda.

*GULP* *GULP* *GULP* Kitty gulped very loudly, letting out a large burp after she finished. "H-Hey! Save some for me!" Karma wailed in alarm. Kitty grinned and, waddling slightly now, handed Karma some red velvet cake while keeping the rest to herself.

"That's much better." Karma smiled as she ate her slices, growing bigger as well. Kitty just smiled and buried her face into the rest of the large cake, eating like a pig.

The next few hours seemed to just fly by as the duo ate and ate and ate and ate and ate. Finally, Karma was much bigger than before and Kitty was getting closer to being the same size as her friend. Karma, however, didn't want her too. She only wanted Kitty to know hunger and not end up immobile as her. "I'd better take my hunger out of her otherwise she's gonna need help movin' around too." she decided as Kitty devoured an entire basket of large buttery biscuits in one go, her belly now hanging over the waistband of her tights.

What next?
11112321.title: Karma uses her powers to give part of her hunge...

111123211.content:
A little later, Storm returned after the X-Men successfully stopped the rest of Shadow King's forces. "It's been awhile since Kitty's last checked in. I'd better look in on her and Karma..." Ororo decided as she headed for the kitchen.

When she arrived, she couldn't believe it. Karma was now much larger and she wasn't the only fat one in the kitchen now. A very bloated Shadowcat was eating like crazy, her belly jiggling as she did so and she didn't even seem to notice her obesity.

"What is the meaning of this?!?!? Karma? What's happened to Kitty?!?!?" Ororo demanded to know in disbelief as Kitty devoured an entire ham in just a few bites before loudly chugging more soda.

"I wanted Kitty to experience the same hunger I've been facing so I gave her some of mine. Don't worry. I'm gonna take it out of her right... now!" Karma explained as she quickly pulled her hunger from Kitty. The second she did, Kitty let out a large burp.

"*UUUURRRRRRPPPPPP!!* Ugh... man, what happened?" Kitty groaned, rubbing her head. Then, she noticed her very large, squishy, jiggly belly poking out of her costume's jacket. Her hips and butt were also bigger, her face was round and doughy, her boobs had gone up a few sizes, her arms, legs, feet, hands, fingers and toes were all plump.

"Oh my God! Karma?!?!? What happened to me?!?!?" She asked, poking her large belly, causing it to gurgle loudly. "Um... well... I kinda used my powers to give some of my hunger to you." Karma sheepishly explained.

"What?!?!? You brainwashed me to become fat!?!?!?" Kitty shrieked, only to clutch her belly as it rumbled ominously. "No! I-I just wanted you to understand the level of hunger I'm facing right now! I mean, you pack food away like crazy and don't seem to either gain a pound or even think about it!" Karma protested. "I am sure her intentions were noble, Kitten. Though they were a bit misguided." Ororo said gently. Kitty frowned, but then sighed and smiled.

"I guess so, Ororo. Karma, I'm sorry if I didn't understand your hunger pains. Boy, I sure do now! *Brrraaaapppp!*" She smiled, letting out another giant burp.

"Well, at least you seemed to enjoy our pig out." Karma smiled. "Yeah. Somethin's tellin' me I'm gonna need to have a few extra Danger Room sessions to lose this blubber." Kitty giggled, poking her gurgling, rumbling tummy.

"I am sure they will only be for a few weeks, Kitten. Then you'll be slim and trim again." Storm smiled. "Would you like to start now?"

"Sure." Kitty smiled. But then, *RUMBLE* *GURGLE* GLOOORRRRRPPPP* *SLOSH* *GGGURRRRGGGGLLLLEEE* Her belly let out five alarming tummy noises. "Uh, actually Ororo… could I take a raincheck? My tummy's got other plans!" Kitty whimpered. "Certainly." Ororo smiled as Kitty, despite being rather bloated, turned and raced for the bathroom where Storm and Karma heard her puking a few minutes later.

Sure enough, Storm's theory about Kitty's dieting and exercising worked and Kitty was back to her slim, trim fighting form within two weeks. Though Kitty's new larger appetite remained, she was careful not to extremely overdo it.
