Next morning, the trio have a ginormous breakfast
115222111311341.content:
After a few minutes, the cab Kitty had ordered rolled up. The cabbie looked shocked at the three bloated women, but didn't say anything as they opened the door and started to climb in.

Kitty got in first, sitting by the other door. Rogue went next, followed by Storm. "Oomph!" Kitty grunted as she was pressed slightly against the door by Rogue's girth. "Rogue, do you mind scooting over a bit? I'm pretty much wedged to the door." she said, wriggling around uncomfortably. "Sorry sugah. But Ah'm jammed between you an' Ororo." Rogue replied apologetically as she rubbed her big tummy with her fat, gloved hand.
115222111311341.title: The trio manages to return home safely

choices: The following morning, the other X-Men share their doubts about the three ladies
During the night, Xavier does something to their minds and to someone else…
Following Morning, the three friends deals with a clothing shrinkage problem
One week of daily indulgences later
115222111311342.content:
The three la(r)dies sat in the cab, squishing each other’s flab.

Still, as uncomfortable as it was for each of them, they yet had to understand why they were feeling so perturbed. In the end, each of them simply thought that the cab had to be so run down that they were forced to sit tightly against the other. As the ride progressed, suddenly Rogue piped up, asking the driver to stop even though they were almost there at the mansion. Storm, massaging her widened hips, not really understanding how big they really were, turned a puzzled look to her friend.

“AnneMarie? Why did you ask the driver to stop? We’re almost home?”

Kitty Pryde, instead, having seen what had picked the interest of her white streaked friend, eagerly nodded making her chins wobble slightly and her arms too.

“Well, Ororo, since we’re almost there I thought maybe we could pick up a donut or two…you know, for later?”

The fattened, white haired mutant smiled a bit within herself. She didn’t want to be the first to admit it but, even though they had finished lunch just a couple of hours before, was feeling rather famished. Still, trying to be the mother Hen as she usually did, she accepted but adding a remark for her two friends.

“Alright, but just a couple.”

Getting out of the cab was quite the feat for the three newly fattened ladies, yet, after a bit of prodding and pushing, they managed finding themselves short of breaths but right in front of the bakery. Waddling slowly, one by one, they entered the place finding themselves suddenly surrounded by a treasure trove made of sweets and treats. As they waddled toward the counter, though, Professor X was checking on their progress with quite an interested mind.

‘I see…No matter that they’ve eaten more than enough to satisfy their normal intake two or three times over. But, they still are growing hungrier yet.

Mmmh. This must be studied further.

I have to try and let themselves go just as they did at the Buffet.
The more their exterior changes, the more effective will be the results of the experiment. ’

The professor, then, did something he normally wasn’t fond of doing. He entered the mind of the clerk at the shop and imprinted into it the idea that the three new customers were their millionth customers and so they could have all they wanted for, almost, free.

As the professor did that, he felt his energies dwindle and so had to abruptly cut the link, taking care to rest, while promising himself to check on them as soon as they returned into the mansion.


The three bloated beauties had managed to reach the counter, although each of them was feeling rather down in energies, so they actually thought that a load on sugary things was just what they needed. But, as they reached the counter, the clerk looked at them and quickly showed them to a table near the counter, while providing, especially for Storm, wide seats for them to seat on.

“Here ladies, have a seat here. You’re our millionth customers of the month so, you’re awarded with a discount of the ninety-five percent to our store wares. Let me know your order and I’ll bring them right here to you.”

Kitty didn’t make any fuss about it, ordering immediately a dozen jelly filled donuts, followed suit by Rogue which instead went for an extra large milkshake and three pieces out of a chocolate sheet cake. As those two ordered, Ororo tried to contain them.

“Girls! We said just a couple of donuts…haven’t you eaten enough already?”

“Lighten up, 'Roro…” said Kitty thickly as she massaged her massive belly rolls, anxiously waiting for her order. “It’s a cheat day, isn’t it? Plus we’ve got this deal they’ve offered to us. If we don’t use it it will be a shame.”

“Yeah…*slurp*…” Reinforced Rogue, as she began drinking from her massive milkshake, her already overburdened belly starting to bloat out eve more. “We should definitively take advantage of that!”

As her two friends seemed to have gone all hog, Ororo finally decided that if they were to act like pigs, she should then be the one out eating all of them.

“Well…if you put it that way. Sir? May you bring me a Devil’s food cake? No, not a slice. A full cake, please.”

As she said that, under the surprised stares of Kitty and Rogue, both girls decided that if that was the game to play, they could compete too. Right after that thought the girls began to guzzle and munch all the way, letting out all they had to show each other that they could eat more. It soon began some sort of competition within them. With Storm taking huge chunks of the cake, smearing her face with it, just as Rogue began to chug milkshake after milkshake, downing them one after another almost as fast as Kitty was downing donut after donuts. As the girls lost themselves once more into their gluttony, their bodies began to expand once more.

Storm practically exploded out of her outfit, her pants completely ripped in two, leaving her in her, tighter than ever, panties. And even though her jacket was still, somewhat, wearable the same could not be said for her top. This one had in fact turned into a make-shift bra, pushed up by her quickly bloating, and filling up, belly. Rogue was right beside her, although, since her hourglass shape couldn’t grow much larger, the rest of her seemed to be catching up. Especially her belly that began growing out and about, getting wider and hanging lower on her thighs as she kept clearing whatever was offered to her.

But the real deal was with Kitty. Shadowcat was growing hugely, her already massive stomach seemed to be outgrowing even her diminutive body, as it reached the floor, filling up on sugar treats as she kept eating and eating. Her overall shape blossomed out soon, with her arms getting fatter and fatter, as bingo wings began to form under her arms and her legs began to bloat out so wide to resemble tree’s trunks. And yet, as if blind to how big the three ladies were getting, the clerk kept bringing more and more from pastries to pies, and even full cakes to each of the lardy ladies.

It was as if a beast had awakened inside their bodies, even though they were starting to feel full, and they heard their clothes ripping apart, not one of them found herself able to stop from having more. Within themselves they reasoned that they were going to have one more pastry, then it became one more slice.

Until they reached the limit at one more cake, just another one and we will stop.

As that limit was reached, even though they were blinded by the mind tricks of Professor X, each of them began to wonder how they could eat so much. Rogue, as she grabbed a Bundt cake from the table, bringing it to her lips, wondered if they were, maybe having too much of it. That didn’t prevent her from consuming it whole, but it still gave her some doubts.

Ororo, too, was having these issues.
Especially since she could feel her ass cheeks overflowing the chair she was seated on, and yet, she almost inhaled the thirty six chocolate glazed donuts that she had been served.

Even Shadow cat, the most gluttonous of them, was having doubts. Not because she couldn’t see her feet anymore, since all that stood within her and the floor was now a humongous belly, but because her grabby arms were trying futilely to grab at the next sheet cake and she wasn’t even close to it.


“G-Girls…? I…I think…maybe…we should…stop. Ororo…Anne Marie…don’t you think…we’ve had…enough?”

At first Storm felt like rejecting the idea, but, as she felt herself stuffed, once more, over the brim she had to concede, while nodding in defeat as she felt herself getting tired and tired, even though she thought they had to feel pretty energetic with all the confectioneries eaten. Rogue, As she inhaled the last morsel of cake, feeling it slowly travel from her throat into her vastly overburdened stomach, stopped too, while slowly nodding.

As they rose from the chairs, wobbling all over, they paid what was due and left the place as they began to waddle at a crawl’s pace toward the mansion.

“We…We didn’t…overate…too much…didn’t we?”

As they waddled slowly, bloated like overinflated zeppelins, and yet blind to their massively fattened bodies, Rogue was the first to speak, as her tired and breathless voice spoke slowly, whit huge intake of air between each word, almost. Her two friends, in an equally overfilled state, took their time to respond, although only Ororo actually spoke, as Kitty was far too tired to even speak.

“I…don’t…think…so. A…good…night…sleep… and we…will feel…better…tomorrow.”

As they finally managed to enter into the mansion, the three bloated beauties slowly separated to go each in their own bedroom. Rogue, as soon as she was in her room, simply collapsed on her bed, as her body digested the massive amounts of food she had consumed in that day, letting her body slowly deflate quite a bit, while gaining a serious poundage yet. Kitty did almost the same. As she reached her bedroom she went to her bed and soon fell asleep, as her humongous belly began to shrink once more, spreading the fat gained throughout her entire body.

Storm, even though she felt completely drained of energies, still managed to get into the shower, to clean herself a bit. After both the buffet and the bakery, she had managed to get herself pretty much covered in food stains and frosting. Finally clean, although she noticed to have taken much more time than usual, she finally went to bed letting her body, too, digesting the massive amount of calories received that day.

Still, as she began to fall asleep, she realized with a smile that it was nice to let herself go like that, occasionally.
115222111311342.title: Pit stop for a light snack

choices: Enjoy a snack and then go to buffet for lunch time.
Stay under Jean care, mall in the afternoon and dinner at buffet
Separate, one to stay with Jean as the others go to the buffet
Go immediately to the buffet, avoiding Jean
1152221113113421.content:
Morning came and the three friends woke up feeling refreshed and restored. Storm was the first of them to wake up, and to shower herself. While in the shower she inspected her body but, although she felt like she had put on weight, she herself couldn’t see any exterior damage ad so simply discarded the idea.

Truth was very different.

The cheat day she had with her friends had brought quite a few pounds on her frame but her mind, due to Xavier manipulation, wasn’t really able to pick up such changes. And so, Ororo, finished showering and began to put on her clothes, finding out that they were feeling tighter than they had ever been, and yet he didn’t recognize this as a problem.

‘Must have shrunk in the wash…mmm…yes, that must be it’

Rogue and Kitty had the same issue and yet, neither could face the issue at hand. Both deciding that it was probably old clothes or washing malfunction that prevented them to wear their clothes properly. One thing all of them shared, though. As if planned, their three bellies began to rumble noisily, asking for food and since it was breakfast time, the three ladies left their rooms and walked toward the kitchen.

Ororo was the first to find out that walking seemed way more tiring than it ever was, still, she marched on although her chubby belly wobbled at her every step making her feel weird, especially so since she couldn’t see it herself. Rogue, instead, seeing that walking was definitely a chore, lifted herself into the air and began to float slowly through the hallways.

Kitty was the one that had gained the most between them, while Ororo had a small potbelly and a wider ass, and Rogue seemed to bring out an inflated hourglass shape, Shadowcat had apparently gained almost everything in her overall form making her squishier and softer in her body and on all of her appendages.

So much so that when she tried to leave her room, she found herself unable to pass through the door without a hitch. Having instead to use her powers to phase through it, as she also did when she realized she would have to walk all the way to the kitchen.

In a short time, the three ladies met in the kitchen and, as soon as they were there, each of them received dubious, and one interested, stare from the other X-Men there with them. As Jean Grey cooked and prepared breakfast, dutifully helped by Wolverine, the other X-Men whispered among themselves as they watched their three friends come into the kitchen looking rather zaftig than what they usually appeared. Cyclops was the first to try and break the ice.

“Ororo, Kitty? Do you…Do you feel alright?”

“What do you mean, Scott? I feel great today…a bit hungry, but still…”

“Yeah, Cyclops…Me and Storm are feeling wonderfully. It’s such a good morning…”

“What I meant is…err...Have you gai…”

“SCOTT! Could you come over here and give me a hand, please?”

Jean interrupted Cyclops and forced him to leave the question at that, as Ororo, Kitty and Rogue shared a wondering stare, as they waited for the breakfast to be prepared and served. Cyclops though wasn’t the only one who had noticed the additional inches on each of them, and yet, every time somebody tried to make a remark about their figures, Jean was there shushing them up. In a short while, although most had tried to say something the three friends had remained as clueless as they had been waking up, what they noticed was that Jean seemed to act a bit strangely toward them.

After almost half an hour, as their other friends had left, one by one, in the kitchen there was only Jean and the three chubby ladies. The psyker then, finished preparations and soon left quite the platter to each of the three friends, leaving each one of them stupefied by the sheer mass of food awaiting them.

Ororo looked in disbelief as she had in her plate six donuts, two slice of shortcake a couple of muffins and some milkshakes. She tried to politely refuse but, after being rebuked that breakfast was important, she didn’t discuss it anymore and went at her meal with gusto. Rogue, instead, was facing a junk food fest in her plate. In fact, Jean had left in front of her four hotdogs drenched in ketchup and mayo, two cheeseburgers and two massive double decker hamburgers, all of this accompanied by three XL sodas.

As Rogue tried to replay, jean simply shaked her head.

“You need your carbs to start the day in the right way.”

Kitty, instead, was the only one who accepted her platter without a fuss, as she received it from Jean she simply dived in with gusto, enjoying the two bowls of fried chicken, the massive mound of fried bacon strips and the surrounding fried chips.
As Jean watched the three girls going at it at the massive, unhealthy, breakfast, she couldn’t stop herself from feeling excited. It had been always a fantasy of hers to be able to cater to girthier people and now, with Storm, Rogue and Kitty growing themselves to that size, she couldn’t help but assist them.

When Breakfast was over, as Jean cleaned the dishes and left the three bloated beauties to recover, the three friends tried to discuss what they were going to do in that day. Kitty, although appearing the most exhausted by the meal just consumed was the first who piped up and proposed to return to the All You Can Eat Buffet.

“I tell you, guys…We should totally go there…it was so good…and the…discount! We’ve gotta accept it…”

Ororo moved slowly the head from side to side, as she massaged her bloated belly.

“We…*urp*…We went yesterday...since it was a … cheat day. We can’t… go back there…today…”

Rogue, as she stifled burp after burp, having downed her three sodas almost one after the other, was having difficulties to speak but, as she managed to release some more gas, she joined the discussion.

“I’m with…Kitty this time…’Roro. We’ll…just have…a bite to eat…and return. No big…Deal…”

As their discussion progressed, Professor X tuned in on them to see their progress and was ecstatic to see them talking about food, right after such a massive meal. For a moment he thought about the strange behavior of Jean but in the end, he let it at that. There was going to be time to investigate in that direction. Now he wanted to focus on his three test subjects.

Quickly, by sending out subliminal messages, he eroded Storm defenses, making her more susceptible to side with what the majority of the group decided to do, while he also increased Rogue confidence in her superior genetics, as well as boosting up Kitty’s desire for more. In this way, his three guinea pigs surely would have gone down the path that he wanted them to pick. Exiting from their minds he stood silently around them, watching as the discussion proceeded.

“So…” Said Storm “We either go to the buffet…or we go to the mall and, after, to the buffet, is that correct?”

Kitty, already licking her lips, nodded eagerly. No matter that her bloated belly almost touched the table, she was already feeling hungry for more and, although she wondered what would happen if she asked Jean to prepare her something, she also wanted to go straight away to the buffet.

So much so she could barely wait her friends to decide.

Storm, thought about it for a bit. She had been against returning to the buffet so soon, for one this was no cheat day and then, she was afraid that even with her heritage, her genes couldn’t resist much more food before turning her into a fattie. Poor Storm, if only she could see herself. Right after her meal, her belly and hips had already gained a few more inches and yet, she was blind to them.

Still, the idea to go back to the buffet was also enthralling. The food there had been so good that she still seemed to remember the taste of it.

Rogue was the second most decided of them, she too wanted to go back at the buffet. She had noticed that her girls seemed to have grown larger since her last visit and was clearly excited by the prospect. Although she had still the no touching issue, having curves on her otherwise lean body, couldn’t be but a plus, in her book. Still, as much as she wanted, she also wanted to try and go to the mall, to try and see if something interesting was there to do.

As the girls digested their meals they had almost reached a decision when, suddenly, Jean appeared at the doorway with a smile plastered on her face.

“Hey girls! I see you’re still here…How about I prepare you a mid-morning snack? You girls may need the energy if you wanna go out again today…”

As this new proposition hung in the air, the girls decided to…
1152221113113421.title: Doubts and Breakfast

choices: Buffet à la carte/Mansion Mind tricks
Mansion chemically induced hunger/Buffet special feeding room
11522211131134213.content:
As Jean proposal hung in the air, the reactions to it were vastly different between the three friends.

Storm rose from her chair, although with some difficulties, and made to leave the room.

“Sorry Jean, I think I’ll go directly to the buffet... Kitty, Rogue?”

As she waited for her friends she tried to look as inconspicuous as possible. It wasn’t she didn’t like Jean it was only that she didn’t trust her own senses around the woman. At the buffet, at least, she could use her will to stop eating if she was going to eat too much. Kitty and Rogue, seeing Ororo standing up looked at each other for a moment, until each decided what to do for the day.

“Coming ‘Roro!”

“I think I’ll pass guys…”

Rogue herself was surprised in hearing herself saying that. She had wanted to go to the buffet once more but, after hearing Jean and knowing that the woman was as lean as her, she thought that maybe she could give her some advice on how to grow more voluptuous. Kitty and Ororo, too, seemed shocked for a moment but, without wasting any time, they simply accepted their friend decision and moved on toward their decided location.

As Storm and Shadowcat, although feeling quite snug in their uniforms, left the mansion opting to take a cab to go at the buffet, Rogue remained seated in the kitchen, watching interested as Jean slaved away at the stove.

“Oh, Rogue…I see that there is someone here who knows how a proper diet has to be followed.”

“Yeah, well… To tell you the truth I wanted to go too but, I believe you may help me with something…”

Jean, as she cooked, turned an intrigued stare toward the bloated mutant.

“What about?”

“You see, I’m trying to get some more curves on my lean body and, since you’ve got a perfect shape I thought…”

“Say no more. I’ll coach you and you’ll see that you’ll be the most curvaceous girl in the mansion. I so vow it!”

‘Oh man, oh man, oh man! I’ll have Rogue all for me to cater and pamper all day long!
And then tomorrow…and next week…Oh, I wonder how she will look by the month’s end…’

As Jean returned into the real world, she quickly grabbed a plate and, after having it filled with a dozen donuts and a few pastries, slid it in front of Rogue, inviting her to dig in.

“Now, AnneMarie, I’ll help you achieve your dream as much as I can but You’ll have to do what I tell you. You will need lots of carbs, proteins and some sugar for this to work so, leave the cooking to me and dig in.”

Rogue, seeing as the other woman seemed to take her request so seriously, decided to follow her new Curve-Coach directives and, without further ado, began to chow down on the plate she had in front of her. As she munched on the donuts she realized that Jean had to be a great cook, cause those were the best she had ever tasted. As she cleared treat after treat, unnoticing of how her belly seemed to bloat out more at her every bite, she saw that more was soon going to come as Jean was already placing in a plate a few burgers and even a steak.

‘Jean seems to know what she’s doing…I better follow what she tells me to do…’


Meanwhile, Ororo and Kitty had just left the cab which had brought them to the buffet they loved. Upon entering, a little surprised it was already open by mid-morning, they were greeted by one of the waiters, which recognized them almost immediately.

“Ladies, welcome back. I see you’ve come to enjoy our fine foods once more, isn’t it?
Well, that’s truly good. As you can see there is already a few people in here but, we will find you the perfect table for you all. On and, by the way, have you thought about the discount offer we’ve proposed yesterday?”

Storm and Kitty had discussed it during the trip and, finally, Kitty managed to convince Ororo about the usefulness of the offer. So, as the waiter accompanied them toward a table close to the buffets, and within range of the finishing beltways, they both accepted their offer, making sure that also her missing friend, Rogue, was inserted into the list.

“Splendid! Now, here’s your table. Should you need anything, please to let us know. Enjoy your meal.”

As the waiter moved off, Kitty was already standing and closing in toward the buffet, under the stupefied gaze of Ororo. Still, spurred by her Kitten actions, also she rose from the table and moved closer to the buffets, searching for something that intrigued her. After a few minutes, both girls returned to their table, each with her fair share of plates. Kitty was first with just a couple of plates filled with apple fritters and a smallish tray with buttery cookies and a tall glass of chocolate milk. Ororo, instead, returned with two small trays filled by éclairs and jelly filled donuts.

As the two girls seated, both began enjoying the food, unaware that the kitchen staff had been already informed by the owner and filled each of their portions with appetite stimulant and metabolism suppressors. As the two mutants ate with abandon, each could feel her own hunger rising the more she ate. Until both stopped tasting their food but simply swallowed it as fast as they could. Leaving their plates almost licked clean, both Ororo and Kitty shared a look of ravenous hunger and, same as before, both rose from their seats to fill their plates once more.

As time passed both girls made trip after trip toward the buffet lines, bringing more and more food each and every time they rose, due to this their uniforms, already snug to begin with began to get tighter and tighter across their bodies. Storm, as she had already a dozen plates under her belt, could feel her pants cutting tightly in her mid-section, so much so she began to unfasten her belt and opening them up, to give her growing belly more and more room to expand. Kitty, instead, didn’t seemed fazed by the fact that her uniform was stretching out to accommodate her bloating figure. She was feeling so ravenous that even when the spandex like cloth began to tear at her belly button, she still kept shoveling food in her mouth.


Meanwhile, at the mansion, Rogue wasn’t faring much better.

Under Jean care, for the last two hours, she had kept eating whatever the other woman brought to her, making short work of burgers, hot dogs and chicken wings by the pound as Jean seemed an indefatigable cooking machine. The once lean mutant was looking quite bloated already, her belly ballooning out under her very eyes and yet, as she was presented with yet another platter, this time filled with ribs almost submerged in BBQ sauce, she still leaned forward to munch at it.

Jean was feeling ecstatic. Rogue seemed to be insatiable, and yet, she knew that sooner or later she had to slow down. Otherwise all that her growing buddy had eaten was going to be wasted when she would feel sick. But, for sure, she was going to give her another round of burgers before stopping. And then, maybe, it could be the case to use the special medicine she had bought just for similar cases?

Rogue, instead, was already feeling quite sated, and yet she kept going, knowing that Jean had only the best interests toward her. Still, as she cleared ribs after ribs, she couldn’t lie to herself that she wasn’t enjoying all that food. In truth, it wasn’t as good as the one from the buffet but, it still was good enough.

As she kept going, her belly still bloated up more and more, already filling her lap and starting to mash against the table, as her uniform too began to stretch way too much and a slight sound of stitches under pressure could barely be heard.


After countless trips to the buffet line, Both Kitty and Ororo were feeling stuffed and tired, and yet, both were still quite famished. Their figures had bloated out even more, with Storm almost bursting out of her clothes. For which she decided to get her jacket off, leaving herself with just her top, now used mostly as a bra, and her pants, left wide open with her belly pooching over it. The African beauty had lost count of how many plates she had consumed. Last number she remembered had been plate sixteen. Yet, as full as she was feeling, she still felt a powerful hunger begging her to get more food. But she was way too tired to simply move from her seat. Her body had, once again ballooned in every direction, although her hips and ass seemed to have absorbed the most from her meal. Already she was slightly overflowing the chair on which she was seated, and her hands were rather busy kneading and massaging the large, bloated, belly that protruded in front of her.

Kitty wasn’t faring any better, she was even in worse condition.
Last plate she remembered taking was plate twenty-three, but after that her hunger had been too much to control and she soon found herself in a whirlwind of gluttony that now left her speechless, breathless and as mobile as a beached whale.
Her suit had ripped apart all around her midsection, leaving her bare belly to jut forward, filled up to the max with delicious, fattening food, and yet, she too was feeling still rather famished for more.

But as the two bloated la(r)dies were unable to move, one of the waiters approached providing a solution to their problems…
11522211131134213.title: Division within the group

choices: Rogue chair can’t hold much longer…
Kitty and Ororo grow too bloated for their clothes
Both Mansion & Buffet ends late in the afternoon
115222111311342132.content:
Ororo and Kitty were hungry but could not manage to move an inch of their bodies. Not even for a moment this event worried them, as they both were too filled up with food to think clearly but, as much as stuffed they were, they still were hungry for more. Which was quite a predicament for they couldn’t move.

One of the waiters, though, seeing as the two that their boss wanted to get as round as possible, noticed the situation they were in and moved closer to them to propose a solution.

“Ladies, I see you’ve enjoyed your meal…but are you done or would you rather keep going after a breather?”

“M-More…still…so hungry…but, so…tired…”

Even Storm was surprised by how easily and rapidly she had answered back to the waiter and yet, it was the truth. Kitty, opposite to her, couldn’t answer but, as she hiccupped, she nodded in agreement to her friend statement.

“Well, Ladies, since you’re Special Guest, we have a solution to your problems. A few of my colleagues will help you go to a private room we have in the back. There, you shall be able to continue your meal without the need to move a finger. Would that be ok with you?”

As the two girls nodded, a fleet of young waiters moved toward them, assisting them into standing and accompanying them toward the private room where they could resume their meal. As the two were moved away, the main waiter looked at them and wondered.

‘They’re already this big and it’s only lunch time…True, for the most part is bloating but…how big will they get in the feeding room?’

At the mansion, Rogue was feeling just as her friends were at the buffet.

She was stuffed full, completely filled up to the gills, and yet, Jean was still seemingly cooking more. The once lean, now resembling more of a ball with arms and legs, mutant, could only stare with desperation as the other woman kept preparing more and more food.

“J-Jean…? I…I think…I’ve had…enuff…”

The other woman though seemed deaf to her pleads, until she turned around and cleaned away the last remnants of the massive midmorning ‘snack’ she had provided to her friend, which had lasted up to almost lunchtime.

“Oh, I know Rogue. You silly, we can’t have you eating all the time..." 'For now, at least)' "...You may rest a bit and take a nap…I’ll wake you up as soon as its lunch time.”

Hearing those words Rogue blessedly fell almost immediately asleep, but as she slept away her humongous meal, Jean moved closer to the bloated heroine, caressing her filled up body, where the suit hadn’t ripped yet. As she inspected her friend, heavily snoring, Jean wondered dreamily at how larger and girthier she could manage to make her before she would realize it. In truth, she had a way to ensure Rogue growth but, she was afraid of using it.

‘I could use those drugs I bought…But would it be fair? And yet, when another occasion like this could present itself to me?
If I don’t use it now, when will I?
No, there isn’t time to be picky. Don’t worry Rogue, will manage to bring you blimp sized before you may have time to say Cake…’

Jean, then, as she kept preparing the lunch she had promised Rogue, while making sure that their fellows X-Men weren’t going to intrude on them, she simply added a few drops of one of the drugs she had brought on the black market, this being a powerful appetite enhancer. The other, she had acquired through a common enough store, being bulk-up powder to be used through gain shakes.

As lunchtime approached, barely an hour later, Jean began to sweetly prod Rogue awake.

“Wakey, wakey. It’s time for Lunch, AnneMarie…”

“Mmm…How much…have I…slept?”

Rogue felt groggy and, still, a bit stuffed. Yet, her stomach getting used to be fed such massive portions, already began to grumble a bit asking to be fed.

Jean smiled innocently and, shamelessly, lied to her friend, telling her that she had slept way over the real thirty minutes that it had been, then, without further ado, she began giving to her widening friend what was going to be only nominally considered lunch. The woman began by leaving a plate with two Double Bacon Cheeseburgers, with bacon and fries to the side, along with two tall glasses of shakes.

“Here you go, Rogue. You may start with this…I’ll bring next course in a few.”

Rogue, shaking away the last of her grogginess, leaned forward and, feeling more comfortable, she moved closer to the plate and grabbed the first double burger with both hands, giving it a big bite.

Immediately the enhancer went to work within her system and Rogue felt herself growing hungrier and hungrier by the bite. She still, didn’t worry though. Between the subliminal orders from Professor X and the fact that at the buffet she had felt the same, she didn’t worry herself about it. Preferring instead to simply let her hunger and gluttony drive her from there. Jean kept providing plateful after plateful, slightly increasing the portions she was giving to her friend, and yet Rogue kept cleaning each and every plate she received. Her body working overtime to process all those calories it was receiving, quickly storing them as fat in order to speed up the process.

Rogue’s body seemed to literally balloon as more and more food went eaten, her hourglass figure quickly changing in a more rounding shape. Sure her breast and ass still were growing massively but, her belly too had begun growing larger and larger. Her ass soon began to overflow the chair she was seated on, while her breasts started to move to either side of her, pushed away by the dome of a belly she was getting. Jean, seeing this development, began to try cooking faster and faster, wanting to enjoy the show as much as she could.


At the buffet, instead, both Storm and Kitty had been finally moved to their special private room, this one was as luxurious as it could be. Extremely comfortable couches, massive stout tables, there were even two massive 52” flat screens, one in front of each of the girls. Both girls were ecstatic about the location but, as their hungry bellies rumbled, they still were feeling quite hungry. Yet the waiters quickly positioned them on a massive, comfortable, couch and soon left, replaced by a few guys dressed as chef’s which moved closer to the two ladies.

The one closest to Kitty, brought forward an iPad, on which there was represented which way the meal was going to be served. As Kitty scrolled through the menus, her new double chin slightly squished against the other, she finally decided to go with the option called ‘à la carte’ which meant that food was going to be brought to her by one of the waiters there, until she asked for it to stop.

Ororo, which also was checking through a similar booklet, was undecided. Each choice seemed good but, in the end, her belly decided for her. With a grumbling sound louder than the usual, her finger stopped on the ‘Beltway’ method.
At that, Storm’s waiter nodded and in no time a portable mechanical beltway was mounted and directed toward the African mutant.

To her was given a small remote through which she could select the speed of the belt transporter.

Soon after, both girls began to go back at their meals.

Kitty, quickly cleaned plateful after plateful, almost uncaring toward what was brought to her. Her waiter moved each plate to her, letting her clean it out completely before getting a new one from a trolley stationed nearby. Shadowcat suit’s began to rip more and more, tearing apart not only at her mid-section but also at her thighs, as her entire body was seemingly filling up. And yet, the girl couldn’t stop herself.

The hunger she felt was pushing her to have more and more, as she started to act more and more piggishly, with smears of food on her face and uneaten bits falling on her bloating breasts and belly. Her plates soon began to be overfilled with fried up concoctions of chickens, burgers, sausages. At a certain point even ice creams and cakes that were given to her had been previously fried, granting them this crunchy fried cover to their cold insides. Kitty enjoyed each plate to the fullest and seemed unstoppable in her consumption.

Storm, instead, at first had started to regret her chosen method. Food was brought forward though the transporter directly into her mouth, all she had to do was to open up her lips and munch and swallow. Yet, also she was making a mess of herself, with bits of food falling all over her breasts and shoulders. That happened until a waiter noticed and simply adjusted the output of the transporter, making so that it would go perfectly into Storm open mouth.

From that point, the weather controlling mutant simply abandoned herself to the pleasure of filling her gut up, feeling her hunger getting sated and, yet, increased at her every bite. As Kitty was filling out nicely, getting herself quite rounded, Ororo was getting fuller mostly in her ass and hips, as they began to grow wider and larger, as more calories entered her body. But she didn’t care or noticed, all of her focus was on the next mouthful she was receiving, be it a massive triple patty hamburger, a whole pizza pie, in slices, or even a massive cake. As she gulped down each item, she could almost feel it heaviness falling int her overfilled gut, rapidly being converted into fat to make room for more.

1552121.content:
Slowly the sun rose above the Xavier institute. One by one the students woke up. Young Kitty Pryde also known as Shadowcat was no exception. Slowly she rubbed her eyes and looked around her own room.
When she first got here she did't really knew what to think. She was a mutant. Most people were't too fond of mutants. They made that very clear. Then she went living here. But to be honest it was't so bad here. This was her new home and to be honest she felt very good here. It felt like home. All other persons here felt like... well family. Sure there were rules, and if you broke them there was a chance you were punished but that's everywhere.
But what was the best thing was that her powers were here not strange or different. Everyone here had powers. Perhaps not the same like her but still they had something special that made them 1 force. The X-men.
Slowly the young teen sat up straight.

"Ah that was a good night sleep. Now I would like some breakfast. I gotta admit I'm pretty hungry. Like, don't you agree Rogue? Rogue?"

She took a look at the bed of her roommate and saw it was empty.

"Is she up already? Ah well. Like, it doesn't matter."

She quickly grabbed some clothes, got dressed and walked downstairs. She walked right through the kitchen door and looked around. No one was there.

"No one here. Probably enjoying their free day. But breakfast totally is, like, the most important meal of the day, and I'm starved."

She soon grabbed some bread and made four peanut butter jelly sandwiches and a big glass of orange juice for herself and started her breakfast. The tasted pretty good. Soon the sandwiches disappeared in her belly. She let out a soft girly: "burp!" and giggled. But for some strange reason she noticed she was still hungry. She grabbed the box of cereal and poured a big bowl full of cereal, whole milk and also poured some sugar over it. She just liked cereal more when there was a lot of sugar on top of it. Some others told her that there was already sugar in the cereal but telling her that was a lost cause. She just liked it more with sugar. And with no body else around she could do all she liked without receiving criticism. But after her first bowl, she noticed she still didn't feel full and took a second bowl before she was really full.

"Wow. Guess I was more hungry then I thought. Ah well I'm a growing girl after all."

She lifted her shirt a bit and looked at her belly and slowly rubbed it.

"Hm hmm. That feels good. Well I'm really full now."
1552121.title: The hungry Kitty

155212132.content:
Kitty slowly got up still rubbing her belly wondering what to do with her free day and decided to watch some T.V. Perhaps a funny cartoon or sitcom. Problem was that a lot of others thought that those shows were a bit childish and rather watched something else. Still she wondered why she suddenly was so hungry. She was so lost in thoughts she bumped against Wolverine.

"Watch were you're going half pined."

"Oh! Sorry Wolverine. I was a bit lost in thoughts. What are you going to do?"

"Take my bike for a ride. Sometimes a man just wants to be on his own without kids around him."

Kitty looked over her shoulder while Wolverine walked further. She had sometimes mixed thoughts about him. He sometimes acted a bit grumpy and sometimes had a bit of a temper, but at the same time she knew he could be very nice. He would never hurt her or the other kids around here. If someone would attack her or one of the other kids, she would almost feel sorry for that person. Wolverine would go totally berserk at that that person. So he was nice and friendly but did't always show it.

She reached the living room . No one inside. She wondered why all the others were. Maybe outside playing. Well better for her. Then she could watch T.V without anyone else asking to change the channel. She watched T.V for about one and a half hour but suddenly noticed she was hungry again. She did't understand why. It was't like she did anything other then normal. She did't used anything. So why did she suddenly had such a big appetite. Perhaps puberty? Growth spurt? She must admit she would like it to grow a bit taller and got some more female curves.
She walked into the kitchen and after looking around for some time she found three bars of chocolate, on box of cookies, two family sized bag of chips and a two liter bottle of coke. She carried it all back to the T.V. As soon as her butt hit the couch she started stuffing the first chocolate bar in her mouth. She quickly finished him and started on the second. After that one was gone she devoured the third one in a record time and drank some of the coke. after that she started on the cookies. Eating them one by one taking sips of coke every now and then. After they were gone she ripped open the first bag of chips and pushed them in her mouth. To much focused on the T.V shows to really notice how full she was getting. She even finished the second bag of chips. After that she emptied the bottle of coke and let out a huge belch.
The teen laid lazy on the couch. Crumbs of cookies and chips around her mouth. Her belly a bit bloated thanks to her current snacks. She Finally turned the T.V of and looked at the empty box, two empty bags, some empty wrapper and one empty bottle.

"Men did I eat all that? I did't even notice."

The she suddenly felt how full she really felt.

"All right. Now I believe I ate it all."

She slowly lifted her shirt a bit showing her bloated belly. She pushed with her finger a bit in her belly button but finally started rubbing her belly and it did work. Slowly the full feeling got less. She lazy kept laying at the couch slowly she closed her eyes and fell asleep.

15521213211.content:
Kitty slowly opened her eyes. Suddenly she remembered why she was in the living room. She saw the remains of her snacks. She fast stuffed the empty bags and wrappers in the empty box of cookies and threw it in the garbage bin.
She'd really made a pig of herself. But no one had been around to see it so it didn't really matter. She brushed the crumbs off her face. She suddenly noticed all the crumbs on her shirt and a few chocolate stains. While she stuffed the chocolate bars in her mouth, some small pieces fell of and had melted causing some brown stains. She walked upstairs straight to her room. She pulled off her shirt and looked for a new clean one. A minute later she walked back downstairs in a clean shirt.
Suddenly Nightcrawler appeared in a cloud of smoke.

"Oh Kurt! What's up?"

"Hello Kitty. I just wanted to tell you we gonna have lunch. It's such nice weather so we decided to eat lunch outside. Do you come too?"

Kitty thought about her recent snack. She really shouldn't. If she kept eating like this she would turn into a blimp in a few days. At the other hand she would like a bite to eat. How was that possible? She should have a tummy ache from eating so much food. Was something totally wrong with her? Perhaps she should ask Charles Xavier, or else Hank McCoy.
They were both the two smartest people she knew. Or the smartest mutants. But according to Charles Xavier mutants were people who were just a bit more evolved. Perhaps one of them knew what was going on with her.
She thought again about the lunch. Lunch did sound good and she didn't had a weight problem yet so one day of overeating wouldn't change that. Would it?

"All right. I'll come too. Lunch sounds good."

A minute later she came outside. Everyone was sitting at a table or on the field. One mutant ran around in her dog form with a sandwich between her jaws. She went sitting next to Kurt and grabbed two sandwiches and a glass of orange juice.

"What have you been doing all day? I have't seen you?" Rogue asked.

"Oh nothing much. Watched some T.V."

And also made a total pig out of myself, she thought but she didn't say that. She stopped thinking that quickly since Jean or Xavier could hear that thought in her mind. However they probably wouldn't tell anyone. But still.

"Have you seen Wolverine?" Kurt asked.

"Yeah I've seen him. Don't go bother looking for him. He went away on his bike. If he doesn't want to be found... you don't find him."

"Unless you have someone who's good at following tracks. Like Sabretooth." Spyke said.

"Oh I really hate that guy. He's so scary and mean," Kitty said.

"You hate him?" Kurt asked. "That goes double for Wolverine."

"Or even triple," Spyke said. "Those two really hate each other."

Kitty already finished her first two sandwiches and grabbed two more. She hoped no one would notice how much she consumed.

She looked at her side and saw Scott and Jean in the shadow of a tree. Eating and kissing. She felt a bit jealous. She would also like it to have a boyfriend. Well you had Lance who seemed to like her. But she didn't like him. Every time when Lance was in a bad mood he made an earthquake. And his friends weren't really people she liked to hang out with. Especially Toad. He ate insects and had the hygiene of a dead pig. Also the place they lived looked like it hadn't been cleaned in ages. What probably was the case.
She sighed and grabbed another two sandwiches.

"Wow Kitty. That are you fifth and sixth sandwich," Kurt said. "Are you feeling all right?"

"Yeah. I guess I'm just a little bit... hungry."

"If I would touch you long enough… would I then also gain some of your weight, or only your appetite?" Rogue asked with a naughty grin.

"You'll never find out, you rechargeable battery," Kitty said grinding her teeth.

But after her sixth sandwich she stopped eating. She must admit she did start to feel full.

After lunch

1552121321131.content:
Kitty walked to her room and sat on her bed. She was a bit angry at what Rogue said. Maybe Rogue just made a joke, but she said what Kitty was scared of. If she did keep eating like this she would lose her body for sure. She liked her body. Sure she would like it to have some more rounder female curves and to grow a few inches but she was slender and she was proud of that. She didn't want her flat stomach to turn into a overinflated beach ball. Then Rogue would really have something to laugh about.

She fell down on her bed and looked at the ceiling, thinking about what could have caused her hunger. Puberty? Sure that could cause some hunger but not this much. Did she ate anything strange or drink something strange? She couldn't think of anything. Not anything she didn't had before. At least not that she could remember. But she wasn't sure. Of course if she knew this would happen she would have put a little more attention to what she had been eating and doing.

Slowly her hand went right through her drawer and came back with a bag of candy. She liked it to chew on something when she was thinking. She kept pushing one piece of candy in her mouth after another and didn't notice how much she ate. At least not until she noticed the bag was empty. Had she eaten the entire bag? It had been pretty full. She looked at her alarm clock.

"This late already? Better get down or I'll be late for dinner. Hm I could of course...."

The next moment she faded right through her bed, through the floor and dropped out of the ceiling landing perfectly.

"So I can go down being perfect on time."

Slowly all other members gathered at the table for dinner.

"What's for dinner?" Kurt asked.

"Turkey, mashed potatoes and green beans." Storm answered.

Kitty looked with open mouth. She loved Turkey, and mashed potatoes. Green beans were fine but not special. Suddenly she knew the growing rumbly feeling in her belly. She wanted to eat. No! She wanted to pig out.

Pull yourself together Kitty she said to herself. You can't go making a pig of yourself. You're a human not a pig. She smiled a second at the thought that her name Kitty was also the name of a animal.

However she did grab a lot of food. She was able to eat well mannered. Ate without dropping anything on her clothes. But the food went down pretty fast.Turkey with greasy gravy and mashed potatoes went down so fast she barely had time to chew. After her first plate she took a second, and even a third. During her third plate she started noticing others were looking at her.

"What?" She asked. "Do I have something on my face?"

"Are you feeling all right?" Storm asked. "This is already your third plate. Normally you never eat so much."

"I just love Turkey and mashed potatoes," Kitty mumbled.

"You maybe do but your clothes don't," Rogue whispered.

Kitty wanted to give her a mean look but saw she had been right. Her belly was, thanks to all snacking and not yet digested food, pretty round and poked out between her pants and shirt. She blushed and hoped no one else had seen it.
After the last piece of food went past her lips she decided she was full for now. But she had't counted that Storm came with cake. She cut the cake in perfect slices. Kitty couldn't help herself. She grabbed with both hands a slice of cake and pushed them in her mouth. Suddenly she realized what she had done and looked around. Most people looked a bit shocked.

"I... I don't think I'm feeling well. Sorry I... I'm going to bed."

While she ran to her room she noticed she really didn't feel good. She had a terrible tummy ache. No wonder if you realized how much food was in it. She felt terrible. Her belly made gurgling noises in protest of being so incredibly full. She was in so much pain. In her room she quickly unbuttoned her jeans. At least it took some of the pressure off her belly. But still she was in a lot of pain and was hearing constant gurgling noises from her belly. Suddenly she remembered how good it felt if she rubbed her belly. She put both hands on her belly and started rubbing. Her belly felt kind of hard, like a bag of wet cement. Probably because of all the food inside it. She started rubbing her round belly. It did feel good and the pain did become a bit less. She continued rubbing her belly. It felt so good she didn't even notice that she fell asleep.

155212132113111.content:
Kitty slowly opened her eyes. What day was it? That's right. It was Sunday. A nice free day. Then she noticed a familiar feeling. Hunger. Her belly rumbled and wanted food. Even after having a terrible tummy ache last night. But that was yesterday. That food had digested by now. She wanted food.

"How can I be this hungry? I don't understand. I really need to ask the professor what's wrong with me. Or else Mr. McCoy. He's smart. But I'm so hungry. What should I do first? Hmmm, guess talking with the professor is easier on a full stomach. Besides it's not like he's going anywhere. I can take a breakfast and ask him afterwards. Good idea."

She slowly walked downstairs. She hoped she didn't see anyone. She didn't liked her sudden hunger attacks but still she ate. But no body else needed to know that. She walked further and listened. She heard a lot of voices outside. Well it was a nice sunny day. Perhaps she could go swimming. If the water was warm enough. It would be a nice chance to wear her new bikini.
In the kitchen she saw Wolverine.

"Hi Wolverine. How was yesterday?"

"It was fine. Sometimes I just need to blow of some steam kiddo. But I need to work on my bike. If anyone needs me I'll be in the garage."

As soon if he left, she grabbed bread and peanut butter and jelly and made five peanut butter jelly sandwiches just for herself. She also poured in a tall glass of orange juice and fast stuffed the sandwiches in her mouth. They tasted good. She must admit that. That was why she was sad they were gone that fast. She decided to finish it with a few bowls of cereal with a lot of sugar. But instead of the two bowls from yesterday she ate three entire bowls. It seemed like it only got worse and worse everyday. This way she soon would be a blimp.
Suddenly she saw her belly poking out between her pants and shirt. She sometimes wore shirts that showed her belly but not in this way. And those times her belly was flat. Not round. She tried to pull her shirt down but it rode up again.

"Stupid shirt. I wish someone washed it in too hot water. But I know that's probably not what happened."

She ran back to her room and looked in her closet for a bigger shirt. She soon found one made sure it hide her belly. She brushed her hair a bit and decided she looked presentable enough and ran downstairs.

15521213211311111.content:
She stood outside the office of professor Xavier and softly knocked on the door and waited.

"Come in," She heard.

She faded through the door. She saw professor Xavier behind his desk and also Storm. Storm looked doubt full at her like if she knew something was wrong with her. She also saw Beast. It was sill a bit strange for her to see her old teacher with blue fur and claws but knew very well he had a heart made of gold and would rather fight with words and science then with his muscles. But if he needed to do that he would.

"Ah Kitty. Nice to see you. Why do you come to see me?"

"If it's about the cake don't worry," Storm said. "I've made plenty more. Besides you seemed to feel bad after…"

"No it's not that. But I did feel bad afterwards but that's not it. I seemed to have suddenly since yesterday a huge appetite."

"I don't think that's something to worry about Kitty. If you're hungry you just need to eat. You're a growing girl." Professor Xavier said calmly.

"No professor! It's not just a bit more. It's a lot more! I seem to don't have control! It started yesterday," Kitty said and started a list about what she all had consumed yesterday until the two slices of cake and the terrible tummy ache afterwards. "And today I woke up with a terrible hunger. I already ate five peanut butter jelly sandwiches and three bowls of cereal. Being a bit hungry I can understand that but this is not normal. Not for me. I have a small appetite. Now I have a appetite like The Blob."

"I see. That is strange. It seemed you can suddenly eat about three times what you normally eat. Just suddenly?"

"Well since yesterday morning. Could it have something to do with my mutant powers?"

"I never heard mutant powers effect someones appetite. Except maybe like someone like The Blob. I don't see any reason why your body would suddenly want more food. Did you do or eat anything strange?"

"Not that I can think of no."

"I believe it might have something to do with her mind," Beast said. "When your stomach is full it gives a sign to your brain so it knows it's full. If your appetite suddenly is so out of control it might be that someone is playing a trick at you. playing with your mind."

"You mean a telepath? Like professor X?" Kitty asked.

"Or Jean," Professor X said. "But I did't do anything and I know Jean would't do anything like this."

"Perhaps Emma frost? The white witch?" Storm suggested.

"She could do that," Professor X said. "But I seriously doubt it. Why would she do that? give Kitty a bigger appetite or making her gain weight I don't see how that would help her. That's not her style. But perhaps another telepath. This seems like just teasing."

"Just teasing?" Kitty yelled. I'm at risk of losing my body. I already have one shirt that's to small and… I don't wanna get fat."

The other three looked at her

1552121321131111131.content:
"Well I'm afraid there isn't much I can do." Professor X said. "I'm not even sure if it does have anything to do with your mind. If you really ate that much… I mean if your hungry or not your stomach doesn't grow. So I'm not sure how it can hold so much food all at once. You should have been throwing up."

Kitty shivered. She hated throwing up.

"But Kitty I'm here to help you. I will see if I can find anything. But at the moment I'm not sure I or anyone can do anything."

"But what can I do now. I just… can't control myself when I'm getting hungry. Like I'm two Kitty's. This one I'm now, and one that only wants to fill her belly. Not really caring about anything else. Not really caring what it is as long if it's edible. That's gonna ruin my perfect figure."

"I understand you don't want that but what do you want us to do?" Storm asked. "Change your appetite back to normal? We would love to but we don't know how. But we will look if we can find anything until then…"

Kitty walked out with a bowed head. Like someone who had been sentenced to death. She know what soon would happen. Soon she would be hungry again and ate a large meal. She could try to stop it, but was aware that it wouldn't do any good. She knew her hunger kept growing and growing until she couldn't control it and she stuffed herself. She might as well just eating large meals. Eating large meals would make her gain but maybe keep her hunger enough under control so she didn't made a total pig of herself. Otherwise Rogue would really have something to tease her with.

This is how it all started. Kitty did what she could trying to eat enough so her hungry side wouldn't take over. It did work most of the time. Lucky for her it was summer vacation. At school she wasn't allowed to eat during classes. However the eating of large meals did take a toll on her body. Slowly she started gaining all over her body.

15521213211311111311.title: Fast forward a week

155212132113111113111.content:
Kitty just woke up and rubbed her stomach. She had gained a lot of weight the past time. Of course everyone else started to notice. Kitty hadn't told anyone else about her hunger attacks except for Kurt. Professor X, Beast and Storm did their best to not let anyone else notice her problem by giving her some extra food she could consume in her room without anyone else knowing it.

Why did this happened to her? Who did this. Was it really a telepath? Then where was he? At school? Or was it a telepath or something else? Perhaps a mutant? Maybe just a disease? That would probably be the best option. In that case she wasn't alone and it was obvious it wasn't her fault. And who knows? Perhaps they would find a cure. If there was a cure.
She stretched herself once and looked in her mirror. She really liked her mirror. She took it from home. It was a full length mirror so she could see her whole body in it. When she was a little girl she could spend hours in front of it. Dressing herself up. Many times in her mother's clothes, wearing her mother's make-up.

She took off her night shirt and looked at her naked body. Her new potbelly. But when she looked higher she noticed some thing. Her boobs. She slowly put her hands on them and squeezed softly a bit. They were bigger. A least a entire cup size. She looked carefully at her body. The extra weight at her butt made it more curvy. The same went for her thighs. Even her arms gained some of the weight.

She know some people gained around their waist and other in their butt and thighs but it seemed she gained all over her body. Well that wasn't so bad. But the more she looked at her body, the better she felt. Those extra pounds. It didn't look so bad at here. Gave her a bit more female look while her face was still as pretty as before giving her something… cute. All that eating made her gain weight but had that been a bad thing? It didn't look that bad at her. She never would have realized this if she would't have gained. Perhaps she would look even better with even more pounds. Would she really gain on purpose? That was crazy. On the other hand why not? She realized it didn't matter at all. She would gain anyway. On purpose of not. The calories of those huge meals need to go somewhere. She would gain anyway. But perhaps that wasn't so bad. Was fat unhealthy? Well tell that to those girls who smoked a dozen cigarettes each day. Or the boys who drank half a dozen beers each day. Or the ones who used drugs. It was all wrong. Well those beers weren't really bad as long if you didn't drink to much of it.

"Besides those health problems only come when your dangerously overweight. I'm not near that. I'm just a bit chubby. Well I won't be for long. I'll gain weight everyday. I might as well enjoy it. Why is becoming fat so bad? I mean, like, there's anorexia everywhere or people totally starving in Africa."

She softly stroke with her hands over her new curves.

"That's decided. I'm gonna gain weight. Well I was gonna do that anyway but now I'm gonna like it."

1552121321131111131112.title: Skip another week

15521213211311111311122.content:
Kitty was sitting on her bed, softly poking her finger in her belly. She really had gotten fat the past week. She kept eating huge meals, not really caring what it was. At least it stopped her from losing control and eat everything in sight. Some of the others thought it was a bit strange. It was obvious she gained a lot of weight in a short amount of time. But at the other hand she liked it.

Her wobbling butt, and her rubbing thighs. Also her upper arms got flabby. Her cheeks were now pink and puffy and she had a second chin now. Her chest was bigger and of course her belly had taken a lot of the weight. She stuffed her belly swollen, bloated and round at every meal. It always shrunk a bit after the food digested, but then there was more fat added to the rest of her body. And her belly was bigger then before the stuffing.

Softly she poked her belly button. Her deep belly button. Before she started gaining she didn't had such a deep bellybutton. She enjoyed her new deep belly button and her new flab. It was soft and squishy. Also were warm and felt kind of nice. It was even fun to play with. She liked playing with it but that was only after the food had been digested. That meant she would soon be hungry again. After she had eaten her belly was round and stuffed like a balloon and kind of hard and less fun to play with since it was usually too full to bounce up and down rapidly.

Suddenly the door opened and Storm walked in with a bag and got out three big pizzas.

"Here you go," Storm said. "This should be enough to keep you full until dinner. I hope."

"Thanks Storm. I really appreciate it. But I really need to eat. I mean if I don't eat my hunger takes over. And then another Kitty takes over. The only way to stop her from taking over is eating."

"I feel so bad for you. Before Professor X found me I lived on the street. I was hungry a lot of the time. I know it's not fun to be hungry. But what you have is even worse. You're hungry and gaining like crazy."

"Well, do Beast and Professor X have any idea what happened to me what caused this?"

"If they did they would have told you. Don't you think? They don't have a idea. Perhaps you're right and it does have something to do with you mutation. Being able to pass through walls and things. I never heard of something like that but at the other hand how many people can go through walls? But it does't make sense. Why would you mutation cause you to get a huge appetite, while all others have a normal appetite?"

"I don't know. Do you think I like it?" Kitty asked with a very full mouth.

"Well no. However you do seem less stressed and less sad about your weight gain. Perhaps it is possible someone else is doing this. The question is: who is it? and : Why does he do it? I don't seem why he would do this. Or perhaps it's just a prank. Did you make some enemies?"

"Not that I know of," Kitty mumbled with her still full mouth.

"Well I got some work to do. See you later."

"See you later Storm. And thanks for the pizzas."

She happily munched on her pizzas. She was fine with gaining weight now, but Storm didn't need to know that.

155212132113111113111223.title: Something else (your choice)

choices: On the way to the clothing store
1552121321131111131112232.content:
Kitty finally wolfed the last piece of pizza down. The next moment her pants button popped off, flying to the other end of the room. The next moment her zipper was forced all the way down, letting Kitty belly flow out like a river. Kitty smiled seeing how fat she had gotten she massaged her belly. This wasn't the first button she lost. She lost another pants button a day or two ago and a few on her blouses. She knew there was one thing that she needed to do. Go clothes shopping. She looked in her wallet. Just enough to buy about two outfits. But just to be sure maybe it was better to buy them a few sizes bigger. Then she had some room to grow. That was a good idea. Perhaps also look for some elastic clothing. That would, at least, last longer. She normally didn't wore much elastic pants but back then she was a skinny twig. It would be a part of her new lifestyle.

First she looked in the closet. She found one elastic pants that would fit around her tummy. She put her new pants on and walked out of her room. Downstairs there was suddenly a cloud of smoke and Kurt appeared.

"Hi Kitty. What are you up to?"

"Oh nothing special. Just going out. You know."

"You're really are in that gaining thing. If I wouldn't have been here the past weeks and I saw you, I would think you would be Kitty's twin sister who has troubles with her weight."

"Kurt you know I can't help it. If I don't eat enough I going totally crazy eating anything I can get my hands on. I emptied the entire fridge one evening. If I don't eat enough, at dinner I would eat my food and that of everybody else."

"But why didn't you tell anyone except me, Beast, Storm and Professor X?"

"Because… Well... they're adults. They're looking out for us. They wanna help us. Besides they're trying to find out what's wrong with me, and help me. But to do that they need to know about well the hunger. And as for you… well... you're my friend."

"I can understand that. I just don't get why you didn't tell the others. They will understand. Everyone has their problems. Now they just think you're a gluttonous pig. Not that you can't help it. However you are now fine with the wei..."

The next moment Kitty slapped her hands around his mouth.

"Do you want the whole institute to hear us? I don't want anyone else to know that. Now I going to the mall."

"Can I come with you?"

Kitty froze. Then she turned to him with a playfully mean grin.

"You wanna come with me... a girl... to the mall… to buy clothes?"

"Eh... I guess so. I just offered that."

"Fine. Why not? Sure you can come. But believe me. It's better if you put another face on."

Kurt pushed at his watch and his blue skin turned into a normal skin color.

"Now we can go."

155212132113111113111223212.content:
Both teens walked to the city. Kitty liked to be out of the institute for once. Just going to the mall to buy clothes like normal teens do. Nothing strange about that. Just being normal for once. Fine, the reason that she needed new clothes wasn't normal. But she really needed new clothes. If she didn't get bigger clothes soon, she would need to start wearing bed sheets and/or sumo sized diapers. And with her still gaining with no end in sight, that might happen.

But before they reached the clothing store, Kitty felt the familiar rumbly, gurgly feeling in her belly.

"Oh no!" She mumbled. "Please not now. I just ate several pizzas. Come on... hold on. Oh crap I can't."

"Something wrong?" Kurt asked.

"You won't believe it but... I'm hungry. Kurt I really need to eat something."

Kurt looked around and saw a fast food joint. He grabbed Kitty by her hand and dragged her in. He pushed her down on a chair went away to get some food. But Kitty's hunger started to take over. Suddenly she saw some other people left leaving a half eaten burger and some fries. Normally Kitty wouldn't think about this but this wasn't normal. She wolfed down the burger and the cold weak fries. Barely taking time to taste it.

She saw some other people looking a bit shocked at her. She smiled weakly, waving at them with mustard and ketchup smeared around her lips. They slowly waved back.

Kitty looked pained. That small bite didn't even came close to stopping her hunger. That was slowly starting to take over. She looked around. There must be a way. She couldn't just start eating the food of someone else. Where was Kurt? She saw him standing at the counter. She ran over to him. Kitty reached him just as the first food item was put on his tray. She grabbed it and pushed it in her mouth.

"Eh Sorry kid. But this man..." The man behind the counter started but Kurt stopped him.

"Oh don't worry. She's with me."

The man pulled up one eyebrow and lifted his shoulders and put the other food on Kurt's tray. Kurt walked back to their table with their tray while Kitty already started eating. He put the tray down and Kitty started eating like she hadn't eaten in days. Her gut told otherwise, while she ate all the food on the tray.

choices: The clothes don't fit. She needs to go to a plus size store
15521213211311111311122321221.content:
The tray was soon empty. Kitty looked with a sad look at Kurt. She felt a bit sorry for him that he was helping her with her problem. This problem was of course was totally different from most teenager problems. This had nothing to do with money, boyfriends or clothes. This was something totally new.

"I'm still hungry," Kitty mumbled softly.

"Still? Are you really still…" Kurt started but stopped when he saw Kitty's face. "Fine I'll get some more."

Kitty was really still hungry. But with some food in her belly and knowing Kurt would soon be back with more was probably enough to not start eating everything in sight. But if she wasn't totally full the hunger would probably start again. Hopefully this would be enough for her. Hopefully the next hunger attack would be at the institute. She had peace with her weight gain but the hunger attacks were still a problem.

"Here you are," Kurt said. "I hope it's enough because I have no more pocket money."

Kitty felt bad when she heard this. She realized Kurt has been paying for this food with his own pocket money. That you would pay for your female friend was fine but not when she was eating like a pig.

"Oh I'm so sorry Kurt. I'll totally pay you back. I promise! But that might take some time. I need to use the money I have now for new clothes because I'll, like, soon outgrew these. Then I need to wait again before I have more pocket money but I promise you I'll pay you back."

The next moment Kitty started stuffing her face. Kitty didn't leave a single crumb but when the last bite of food went past her lips she must admit she felt… full now. She slowly opened her mouth and…. "BUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRP!!!!"

Everyone looked up disturbed by the very loud and big burp.

"Oops! Excuse me." Kitty mumbled with a red face.

She bowed her head and saw that part of her tummy was poking out between her pants and shirt. Her shirt rode up a bit. It gave a good view at her belly button.

"10," Kurt said.

"What?" Kitty asked.

"I said: 10. You ate 10 large meals. I'm not sure Kitty but it looks like that hunger of yours gets bigger each day."

"Maybe you're right. Well better go get some clothes now. Now my belly is so totally full, I can, like, be sure the clothes'll fit around my big belly when it's full."

They walked out, getting some strange stares from other people as Kitty burped loudly every few minutes.

"Do *BBAAAURRRAAAPP* people maybe *OOOOUUUURRRRPPP* think I'm, like, pregnant?"

"No. People who are pregnant have big round bloated bellies. Also bigger boobs because they're gonna be filled with milk."

"I have a big *UUURRRRAAAPPP* round belly. My boobs also got *BBBBURRRRRPPPP* bigger."

"Just like your thighs, butt, arms and face. Those don't get bigger with pregnant woman."

They reached the clothing store. Kitty fast walked to the part she normally went but soon realized that those clothes wouldn't fit her anymore. But after looking a bit they found clothes for bigger woman. Kitty grabbed several clothes and took them to a dressing room.

"You need to stay here Kurt," Kitty said.

"I can understand you don't want me to see you undress."

"That too but you need to tell me which outfits look best at me."

"Wait…. Do I need to look at you in all those outfits and tell you which one looks best? But that's gonna take..."

"You wanted to go to the mall with a girl shopping for clothes. So you need to do that!"
15521213211311111311122321221.title: Full for now

She fails in finding anything that fits
155212132113111113111223212212.content:
Kitty went into the dressing room and started changing into the clothes she'd picked out. However, she ran into problems with each shirt, having decided to try those first. It took her five minutes to squeeze herself into an extra large t-shirt. And even after she managed to do so, it still exposed her bellybutton.

The other six shirts were the same. Either they were too tight that they nearly ripped open upon starting to go over her tummy or weren't big enough. Finally, Kitty decided to try the new pants she'd picked out, hoping they wouldn't be an issue.

She was wrong. The first pair didn't even make it to her hips before becoming too tight. She bounced up and down, trying to force them up, only to make her belly and boobs jiggle in the process. The second pair did slightly better, but were too tight on her big plump butt while the third pair was similar to the first. Finally, Kitty just pulled on her old clothes and came back out to Kurt, who'd been waiting for her to show him the clothes.

"Like, nothing totally fits me!" Kitty groaned in dismay. "Really? Nothing at all?" Kurt asked with concern. "No! Like, either I'm too big or they're not big enough or both! I'll, like, totally have to use a bedsheet and sumo-like diapers as clothes!" Kitty sobbed.

At that moment, a saleswoman came up. "Are you having a tough time sweetie?" she asked the sobbing Kitty. Kitty merely nodded and let out a hiccup.

"Why don't you try a new plus sized store that opened two doors down? It's called Big, Plump Girls. They should have some clothes that'll fit you there." the woman smiled gently. "Like, thanks." Kitty smiled as she handed the clothes over to the woman before she and Kurt went over to said store.

What next?

choices: She's gonna eat everything in sight
They meet a friend who wants to pay for them
1552121321131111131112232122121.content:
"Well here it is. Big Plump Girls. Clothes for larger girls," Kurt said.

Kitty didn't knew what to think. The gainer part of her liked that she was to fat for normal clothes. But there was another part of her that felt a bit embarrassed that she was to fat for regular clothes. However there was also a clothing store for fat girls. That was a good thing. When she was thin, she sometimes saw fat girls trying to squeeze themselves in the biggest clothes they had in the store. The only reason they took that clothes were because they were the only ones that fit them more or less. But to be honest Kitty didn't even would be found dead in those clothes. Perhaps they had some nice clothes for fat girls here.

"Looks like we're in the right place. I'm sure we can find some clothes for you here," Kurt mumbled.

Kitty looked around. She realized Kurt was right. There were a lot of fat girls around them. Some thinner than Kitty, some the same size and some even fatter.

"I hope I can find some nice clothes here."

"Kitty if they even have clothes for her," Kurt whispered and nodded to a girl that was easily three times as wide as a normal girl. "Than I'm sure they have clothes for you. Come on."

They soon found the place were there were clothes for girls of Kitty's age and Kitty must admit there were a lot of nice clothes. She picked several of them.

"Eh Kitty. I don't know how much money you have but I don't think it's enough for all of those."

"It's not. So I'm gonna try on all those clothes and the one that look best at me that are the ones I'm gonna buy. And to be sure they look nice at me... you tell me how they look."

"You're gonna try on... all those clothes. But that's gonna take ages," Kurt complained.

"You wanted to go to the mall with me remember? I asked you if you really wanted to come clothes shopping with a girl. You were fine with it."

"I believe I said: I offered it. But I didn't know we need to take ages to…"

"I'm a teenage girl! Teenage girls like clothes. If you really want a girlfriend Kurt then You need to do this with her... or me," Kitty said with a giggle and a jiggle.

Kurt sighed and went sitting on a bench knowing that he would be sitting here for a long time. Telling himself that he would never agree on going to a clothing store with a girl. But finally, after trying on many outfits, Kitty bought the ones that looked best. She probably would come back here again. She needed clothes for her growing body.

"Well Kurt I would say the shopping was, like, totally a success. I found a lot of nice clothes."

"I think it's time for us to go back to the institute."

"Good idea. We need be in time for din…" Kitty's voice trailed of when there came a loud rumbling sound from her belly. "Oh no."

"What? Kitty this is a problem I don't have any more money."

"Me neither. What am I gonna do? If I don't get some food soon, I'm gonna eat everything in sight without caring."
1552121321131111131112232122121.title: Nice clothes for a big girl

choices: They get back to the mansion. Kitty decides to eat dinner (gets a bellyache)
They come home. Kitty decides to lay down. (falls asleep)
15521213211311111311122321221211.content:
Kitty's large belly jiggled and gurgled again. "Like, I totally gotta eat something now!" Kitty wailed. "I know, Kitty. But neither of us has anymore money." Kurt protested with concern.
