Kitty whimpered as she eyed the food court. All that greasy, fattening and yummy food! Her belly rumbled and gurgled pleadingly. But she and Kurt didn't have anymore money.

"Maybe we can find a free samples cart." Kurt offered. Kitty nodded and they went over to the food court. Then, they noticed a large sign. "'All-U-Can Eat Day. All the food you can eat absolutely free'." Kurt read. "Vell… I guess you can get something to eat after all Ki-"

But Kitty was already at a burger stand. "Like, I'll take five double cheeseburgers, six jumbo chocolate milkshakes four extra large fries and, like, an extra large basket of onion rings." She told the girl behind the counter. Soon, she was carrying the large tray of food to a table and, as Kurt watched in disbelief, devoured everything single handedly. Kurt tried to take a french-fry, only for Kitty to nearly bite his hand. Soon, Kitty was slurping up the final milkshake.

*BBBBBURRRRAAAPPPP!* She burped loudly. "Like, excuse me." she smiled sheepishly. Then, she got up and went to a taco stand. Within minutes, she came back with four jumbo burritos and eight grande sized tacos. Kurt just watched in disbelief as Kitty devoured the next meal with ease.

And on and on it went. Kitty, following her Mexican food gorge, went to a Chinese stand, ordering a large amount of said food and destroyed that. Then, she ate about a month's worth of pizza from a pizza stand.

Following her pizza feast, Kurt thought for sure that Kitty would be stuffed, but was proven wrong when Kitty got up and, much more bloated now, staggered slightly over to a fried chicken place and ordered a Super Mega Jumbo bucket of fried chicken. Finally, after eating the last piece (not leaving a piece of meat on the bones), Kitty leaned back, rubbing her now evidently full tummy as it bulged against the table, now covered in remains from the feast. Empty Chinese take out boxes stacked in each other, greasy wrappers from her burgers, empty milkshake cups and more now littered the table.

"Are you alright, Kitty?" Kurt asked, watching his stuffed friend and teammate with concern. Kitty nodded after a moment. "Yeah. Like, I'm totally fine, Kurt..." Then, she stopped and her cheeks puffed up as her belly rumbled and gurgled ominously.

"Uh oh." Kurt said. Then, Kitty opened her mouth. *BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRPPPP!* And let out the biggest belch yet. Everybody turned to look at her in disbelief, awe and disgust respectively.

"Like, excuse me." Kitty mumbled in embarrassment, her cheeks turning bright red as she kept rubbing her tummy. "Vell, at least you shouldn't need to eat dinner." Kurt pointed out as he helped Kitty stand up. Kitty nodded and grabbed her shopping bags.

"Yeah. I think we shouldn't tell anybody about this pig out, Kurt. I'll just say I ate dinner at the burger joint we stopped at." Kitty decided as she staggered slightly, still getting used to how full her now very big belly was, grateful she had gone with a very stretchy extra-large t-shirt and her elastic pants for the pig out as she and Kurt left, leaving only two things behind: very shocked employees and costumers plus a very dirty table.
15521213211311111311122321221211.title: She's gonna eat everything in sight

choices: Kitty wakes up in the middle of the night hungry (time for a midnight snack)
She wakes up next morning hungry
Follow Professor X, Beast and Storm
155212132113111113111223212212112.content:
"Well at least I'm full for now," Kitty said.

"No surprise. Do you have any idea how much you ate?" Kurt asked.

Kitty bit her lip. She must admit that she didn't had a single clue what or how much she had eaten. The only thing she had cared about was feeding her tummy. The only thing she did remember was eating food. Well it was more wolfing down food then eating. She also knew that it was a lot. Her swollen belly was a proof of that. It was a good thing the clothes she bought were a few sizes bigger or else they might probably be tight already.

"No Kurt I don't. There're two Kitty's inside me. The one I am now, also the one that bought clothes, and then there's the Kitty that thinks about nothing else then food and stuffing her face. Like well you know. I don't like that other Kitty. Most of the time I'm able to make her shut up by eating large meals. By the way did it look bad?"

"Um you mean how you ate and left the table. In both cases... it was bad. Very bad. Most people there were shocked."

"Oh no!" Kitty moaned. "How could I embarrass myself like that. That's another thing about the other Kitty. She totally doesn't care about anything else except feeding her tummy. She doesn't care about what other people think of her. Nor does she care of other people go hungry. Just as long if she isn't the one who goes hungry!"

"Well that's a problem. But you ate a lot this morning and when we arrived at the mall. How is it able you were so hungry afterwards?"

"I don't know Kurt! All right?!?! I don't know. Perhaps the fact we walked to the mall. I mean that must cost some energy, right? I guess that made my body totally think that it might need some.extra fuel. But instead of a bit more, it became a lot more. Man if I keep this up, I won't be able to fit through the door!"

Some time later they arrived at the institute. Kitty went straight to her room with her bags. She plopped down on her bed which made cracking noises under her weight.

"I may need a new bed too soon too. Well I have some nice clothes but all that walking did, like, totally poop me out. I'll just close my eyes for a few seconds..."

The next moment she was out like a light. Kurt saw her and decided to let her sleep and poofed downstairs.

"Isn't Kitty coming down for dinner?" Professor X asked.

"Eh no. We went to the mall and ate some there."

"And you didn't have any problems?" Professor X asked.

"Eh... no not... " Kurt started.

"Kurt you know I'm a telepath. I know when you're lying. I rather have you tell me the truth."

Kurt sighed and knew lying wasn't a option. So he told everything what happened. Exactly how much Kitty ate.

"I see," Professor X said. "It seems like her hunger attacks are getting worse. We still have no idea what's causing this. I will talk with Hank and Storm after dinner."
155212132113111113111223212212112.title: Sleepy Kitty

choices: Kitty goes down for breakfast, only to be confronted due to the lack of food
Kitty ends up with a major bellyache
1552121321131111131112232122121121.content:
Kitty was sleeping soundly when her belly gurgled quietly, waking her up. Slowly, she sat up, rubbing her belly. "Like, what time is it?" She wondered, noticing it was dark outside and that Rogue was asleep in her bed. Looking at her alarm clock, Kitty saw it was currently 12:02.

"Like, midnight? I guess that totally makes sense since I ate a lot and fell asleep." Kitty decided. Her belly gurgled again, a little louder this time. "Okay, belly. Like, don't worry. I'll totally put some food in you." she whispered to it, patting it.

Quietly, Kitty got up and phased through the floor, straight into the kitchen. "Like, I'll just totally have a tiny snack..." Kitty told herself as she opened the fridge. And then, her hunger took control.

Kitty grabbed a box of doughnuts and poured them into her mouth at once. Chewing nosily and rudely, she grabbed a loaf of bread and started shoveling slice after slice of it into her gullet, almost before she'd finished her doughnuts. After the bread, Kitty poured 7 jars of jelly into her mouth, getting some on her face and a few globs on her new t-shirt. Without pausing, Kitty then grabbed a large container of potato salad and devoured that.

Kitty kept eating and eating, not slowing down. Her belly grew rounder and rounder as she cleared each shelf of the fridge. A huge head of lettuce was next, with Kitty chugging an entire bottle of ranch dressing to wash it down. She also devoured the apples, oranges, cucumbers, cabbages, peaches and other foods like ham, bacon, eggs, etc.

Kitty was just finishing the last of some leftover mac and cheese when she noticed a new cake Storm had made. It was five layers, with chocolate frosting. Kitty knew Storm wanted to save it for a cookout dinner they were having on Saturday, but the cake just sitting there was just torture for her. "Like, Storm probably won't notice if I take, like, just a tiny, eensy weensy bite..." she thought as she grabbed the cake and a fork. Needless to say, she didn't stop after the first bite. She inhaled the entire cake and licked the tray until it was spotless.

Finally, Kitty was sitting with her back against the fridge, panting heavily, the debris of her pig out littering the floor and fridge shelves. Her face was a mess of dressing, jelly, frosting, butter and other foods. Her t-shirt was also messy. Upon noticing some frosting on her shirt, Kitty promptly used her finger to lick it up. Then, after a moment, she opened her mouth.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPP!* Kitty burped so long and loud, she honestly expected everybody to come downstairs within seconds. To her surprise (and relief), they didn't. She then looked around and seemed to notice what had happened.

"Like, oh crap! I totally did it again! Ororo's gonna kill me when she finds out I ate her cake before the cookout! Not to mention I'm in deep trouble cause I, like, totally ate everything in the fridge!" Kitty whimpered, one hand on her large belly, which was now poking out from under her t-shirt, exposing her bellybutton as she managed to haul herself up and managed to clean most of the debris up as well as wash/lick her face and t-shirt off. Then, fatigue completely slammed into her.

"Like, there's totally nothing more I can do about it now... I'll have to wait until morning... Maybe Storm and the others'll understand. Storm did seem to be okay with me when I ate those two slices of cake awhile back." she thought as she phased back into her and Rogue's room and got changed into her pajamas, her pink t-shirt barely covering her bellybutton.

"I'm, like, so totally pooped now. That pig out totally wiped me out..." Kitty mumbled as she fell asleep again, her belly gurgling and grumbling quietly as it digested her enormous pig out, causing her to occasionally burp, hiccup and even fart in her sleep.
1552121321131111131112232122121121.title: Kitty wakes up in the middle of the night hungr...

15521213211311111311122321221211211.content:
Sunlight slowly crept over the institute waking everybody up. Kitty also woke up. Slowly she remembered what happened last night. She felt a bit bad about what happened. Especially about the cake from Ororo. She worked so hard to make it.

"Well I must admit it tasted delicious," Kitty mumbled. "Maybe Ororo fells better if I tell her that… but I seriously doubt it. Well I can at least wear some of my new clothes."

Smiling she crept out of bed and pulled her new clothes out of the bags and put them on. At least they still fit her. But she was worried that they would soon be to tight. To be honest that store had more nice clothes but she didn't have enough pocket money to buy new clothes every few days. To be honest she didn't wanna go back to the mall. Suppose she got another hunger attack? She'd already more or less ate all the allowance from Kurt. That all you can eat free was just luck. But she didn't thought that would be the same next time
.
She walked downstairs straight to the kitchen. She wasn't alone. In the kitchen were Storm, Wolverine and Spyke.

"If you want breakfast kiddo you're out of luck. Someone ate everything we had in the fridge," Wolverine said.

"He also ate the cake Auntie O made for the cookout," Spyke added.

"Oh really?" Kitty mumbled, stifling a large burp by turning her head and putting a hand over her mouth. "Any idea who was behind it?"

"Well according to everything that has been eaten it was more then one person," Spyke said. "That or the Blob. But I don't think he would come here just to eat."

"No, that would be very unlikely," Kitty agreed.

"But nothing else is gone," Wolverine said. "There's not a trace that anyone broke in. So the people who have done are probably students here."

"Kitty can you come with me for something?" Storm asked.

Kitty got a hollow feeling in her belly and that wasn't only from her developing hunger. Slowly she followed Storm. When they were far enough from the kitchen Storm looked at her.

"You don't have to say anything Kitty. I know it was you. Don't worry… I'm not angry. If someone under normal circumstances would have eaten my cake and everything in the fridge I would be angry, but that hunger of yours is everything but normal. I still have time to bake a new cake as long if you don't eat that one also."

"I'm really sorry Storm. It's just that I can't…"

"Kurt told us what happened yesterday at the mall. He also told about everything what you ate. Don't be angry at him. Professor X asked him and you can't lie to him."

"Er... Storm where are we going?"
15521213211311111311122321221211211.title: Empty kitchen

choices: Scott and the others agree to help Kitty overeat to curb her hunger
Rogue teases Kitty on the way to talk with the professor
155212132113111113111223212212112111.content:
"I am taking you to Charles, Kitty. We should let him know what happened in any case since the others will likely assume the same theories as Wolverine and Evan." Ororo explained as she led Kitty to Xavier's study.

A few minutes later found Kitty nervously standing in front of Professor X's door. Storm knocked after a moment. "Do not worry, Kitty. He will understand you could not help yourself." She told Kitty, who was nervously drumming her fingers on her belly. "Like, thanks Ororo." Kitty whispered as Professor X's voice told them to enter.

Kitty slowly entered the study behind Storm, biting her lower lip nervously. "Ah. Storm. Kitty. What can I do for you?" Xavier smiled upon seeing the duo. "Charles... it happened again." Storm said gently, nodding to Kitty, who was absentmindedly picking her bellybutton while determinedly not looking at them. Professor X quickly understood upon seeing this.

"Kitty? Could you please look at me?" He asked. Slowly, Kitty did this. "How much did you eat?" Xavier questioned gently. "Like, the entire fridge. I totally even ate that five layer cake Ororo worked so hard on for the barbeque this weekend! I'm so sorry, Professor! I went downstairs last night to get a light snack but then Hungry Kitty took control and I stuffed myself like Blob! I didn't mean to!" She sobbed, burying her face into her hands.

"Kitty. It is alright. Kurt told me about your excursion to the mall last night and how you went overboard then as well. Despite the fact that you had just eaten 10 meals beforehand." Xavier said gently. Kitty looked up, big fat tears running down her cheeks.

"Like, I just don't know what else to do! If I keep this up, I'm gonna, like, totally need to phase through the walls to get into a room cause my tummy'll be so round I'll get stuck!" She hiccupped before blowing her nose after accepting a tissue from Storm.

"Kitty, please listen to me. We will all help you with this. From what we've seen over the last few weeks, your plan to overeat has somewhat restrained your otherwise enormous appetite. I believe you may need to step it up slightly." Xavier said kindly.

Kitty couldn't believe her ears. "But, like, what'll the others say?" she asked. "I am sure they will be willing to help you Kitty. I will talk with Scott, Jean, Kurt, Rogue and Evan once you leave. I am certain even Rogue will be alright with helping curb your appetite more." Xavier smiled kindly. Kitty nodded and smiled as she stood up. "But, like, what'll we do for breakfast in the meantime?" she wondered. "I just sent Logan out to pick up groceries. He should be back before the others fully awaken." Storm smiled, coming back into the room. "Kitty, I will contact Scott and the others now." Xavier added as he began doing so. Kitty nodded and left the study.
155212132113111113111223212212112111.title: To Professor X

choices: After breakfast the other comfort Kitty
1552121321131111131112232122121121111.content:
Kitty walked to her room. Thinking about what Professor Xavier said. Maybe he was right. The others would likely be able to understand her more. All of them had troubles. That mostly had to do with the fact they were mutants but still. However she trusted professor Xavier. He was right most of the time. Without him this place wouldn't be around. It had been a real home for her and many of the others. She thought about it. She leaned back on her bed rubbing her belly.

Some time later she heard Wolverine coming back. She hurried down. She wanted breakfast. She wasn't hungry enough for another hunger attack but she would like some food regardless.

She faded right through the floor and dropped in the kitchen landing perfectly on her feet.

"Wow I'm getting good in this."

"Hey Kitty, there you are," Scott said and walked in. "We just talked with Professor Xavier. Kitty why didn't you tell us? You could have easily told us."

"Of course," Jean added. "Kitty we're here to help each other. You could have told us what was going on."

"At least now we know why we've started missing so much food," Evan said. "I thought we had mice."

"Really Evan?" Rogue asked. "Mice?"

"Um... really big mice?" Evan said, trying to save his face.

"Vell I'm glad everyone knows it now. It vas getting hard keeping it a secret," Kurt said relieved.

"So just so we understood it all right," Scott said. "For some strange reason you got a huge appetite. Now if you get such a... hunger attack you start eating whatever you can find. Not caring about anything else. However, if you eat big meals, you can keep you hunger attacks under control?"

"Most of the time. But not last night. I hate it."

"So that explains why you've started eatin' so much," Rogue said, starting to feel bad about her teasing. "I though you were just depressed."

"Got that right," Kitty said. "I'm depressed because of my hunger attacks."

"Don't worry Kitty," Jean said. "Now that we know, we're all here to help you."

"Of course," Scott said.

"Me too," Evan said.

"Well me of course," Kurt said. "I was already helping you."

"I guess so," Rogue mumbled.

"And I'm sure Storm, Beast and Professor X will help too," Scott said.

"And so will I," Wolverine said. "Charles told me before I went to get breakfast. Guess you're all hungry. Especially Kitty. You need to eat a lot."
1552121321131111131112232122121121111.title: We'll help you

choices: The instructors agree to the idea. Rogue's group covers lunch
The instructors are unsure of the plan
15521213211311111311122321221211211111.content:
Soon, Kitty Scott, Jean, Kurt, Rogue and Evan were getting breakfast. While Scott and the others selected modest helpings, Kitty didn't. As the five watched in disbelief, Kitty placed 10 pancakes, four cinnamon rolls, two biscuits, five strips of bacon and a heap of scrambled eggs onto her plate. As she sat down and picked up her fork, she noticed them eying her in surprise.

"What?" she asked. "Nothing. We're just... surprised that you're gonna try and eat that much." Scott said quickly as the others nodded awkwardly. Kitty shrugged and began eating. Using her fork, she managed to shovel five of her 10 pancakes into her mouth whole, bulging her cheeks out like a chipmunk's. None of the others said anything as they watched her with wide eyes. Kitty chewed and then swallowed loudly before doing the same with the remaining pancakes. "I can't believe that the K-girl can eat like that and not choke or anything, man." Evan whispered to Kurt as he ate a biscuit.

"Trust me. You should've seen her last night during the food court's All-U-Can-Eat thing. I thought she vas gonna eat the table at one point." Kurt replied with a slight smile as he drank some orange juice while they watched Kitty devour all four cinnamon rolls and then chug her big glass of milk, leaving a milk moustache as she forked all five pieces of bacon into her mouth before inhaling the large pile of scrambled eggs with record speed.

As she ate, Kitty felt the awful feeling bubbling in her belly. Hungry Kitty was coming out. "Oh no! Like, not now!" She thought pleadingly. However, it was too late. Before she could even think about what she was doing, Kitty grabbed Rogue's plate and poured it's entire contents into her mouth. "Woah! Hey Kitty!" Rogue yelped in surprise as Kitty licked the plate clean and then went for Scott's plate. Scott was so surprised, he couldn't say or do anything but watch his friend stuff her gullet.

"Kitty, take it easy! You're loosing control again!" Kurt warned with concern. Kitty just grabbed his plate and scarfed down the remaining contents before grabbing both Spyke and Jean's and doing the same thing. The X-Kids watched in disbelief as Kitty then went back to the breakfast bar and started reloading her plate, even more this time.

Finally, Kitty felt very stuffed. Panting heavily after her 19th plate, she looked at her surprised friends and the pile of plates next to her. Slowly, what happened hit her as she eyed these things.

"Oh no! Like, I totally lost control again, didn't I?!?!?" She wailed in dismay as she started bawling for the second time that day. "It's okay, Kitty. We know you didn't mean to. That's what we're gonna help you control." Jean smiled gently.

"Really?" Kitty hiccupped as she wiped her nose with a napkin. "Sure, Kitty. We agreed to help you before breakfast didn't we?" Scott smiled. Kurt, Rogue and Evan all nodded in agreement.

"Like, thanks guys." Kitty smiled as she rubbed her large belly. Then, her belly gurgled and rumbled. "Uh oh. I think I totally have a tummyache now." she groaned, clutching her big tummy. "I think I better lay down for awhile." Kitty told the others as she staggered to her room, burping and groaning as she did.

"Good thing the professor told us about her hunger. I still can't believe it. Bet she could even out eat Blob." Scott remarked in shock. "I know. I think I have an idea for us to help her get her hunger back in control." Jean smiled.

"How?" Evan asked. "Well, what if we each split into groups and, whenever Kitty's hungry, we either make her an enormous meal here or we take her to a buffet. We'll keep doing that each day or so until Kitty's so full or sick to her stomach, her appetite will go back the way it was." Jean offered. "It might work, but Ah think we should probably tell Ororo an' the other instructors first." Rogue advised as Scott and the others nodded in agreement.
15521213211311111311122321221211211111.title: Breakfast

choices: They try to find out why Kitty has hunger attacks
155212132113111113111223212212112111112.content:
A few minutes later they all walked to the office of Professor X. Beast and Storm where there too and Scott told them their plan.

"So how does that sound? We take shifts to help her," Scott ended their plan.

"Hmmm, I see the plan," Professor X said. "But I don't think this will work. It's good that you want to help her. Don't get me wrong. But those hunger attacks more or less appear suddenly. Don't they?"

"Well they do," Jean admitted. "I mean one moment we were just talking with her and the next moment everything was stuffed in her mouth."

"That's the point," Professor X said. "I'm afraid that when her hunger attacks start you don't have enough time to make a large meal or take her to a buffet. How are you planning to take her there in a few seconds?"

"Maybe Nightcrawler can teleport…." Evan tried.

"That teleporting isn't as easy as it seems!" Kurt said. "Getting her there is a great distance and anyone could see us. Then they'd know we're mutants."

"That don't matter," Rogue said. "They already knew we're mutants. The only reason they don't know you're a mutant is thanks to that device on your wrist."

"Besides that how do you think Kitty might feel when she devours a entire buffet?" Professor X said ignoring what the others said. "How would you feel Jean if you would be Kitty's new size and devour a entire buffet in front of all other people?"

"I would be embarrassed," Jane mumbled. "Of course! We only thought about the problem. We didn't thought about Kitty's feelings. Or how to solve the problem. Only doing something when the problem already started."

"Jean is right," Kurt said. "We're a joke. We think simple, but don't thought about the other part."

"I'm afraid it's better Kitty doesn't leave the institute," Professor X said. "Here everyone knows what's going on. That's better then getting nasty looks from other humans. However if you do make a huge meal then Kitty can eat it and perhaps get her hunger under control. So we'll make a extra big meal for her for breakfast, lunch and dinner. That might help stop her from getting a hunger attack."

"I understand but aren't those huge meals gonna ruin her figure?" Jean asked.

"Well if she doesn't eat huge meals she gets a hunger attack and eats everything in sight," Evan said. "That'll ruin her figure anyway so that doesn't really matter."

"I just wished I knew who or what is the reason for those hunger attacks," Professor X said.
155212132113111113111223212212112111112.title: A not so good plan

1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
A few hours later, Kitty was laying on her bed. She'd taken a long nap and felt a lot better now that all that food was digested. Her belly was now much rounder and bigger looking. Curious, she poked it, her finger sinking into her soft, warm squishy blubber.

Giggling slightly, Kitty pulled her finger out and rubbed her big fat tummy lovingly. Then, she looked at her alarm clock. It now read 12:00. "Wow. Like, I must've been sleepy. I totally slept until lunch!" Kitty remarked while stretching. Then, her belly gurgled hopefully. "Yeah belly. Like, totally time to go fill you again." Kitty giggled as she lovingly patted it. She then slowly phased into the kitchen again. To her surprise, no one was there making lunch or anything, though there was quite a few pots, pans and other items in the sink, so someone had to've been there.

"Like, that's weird. Where is everybody? Usually the kitchen's, like, totally full at lunch. I mean, I know the New Recruits are out for the day, but Scott and the others aren't here." Kitty remarked with concern. Then, she smelled something. Something tasty, greasy and deep fried. Her belly rumbled and gurgled in delight at the smell. "Yeah I totally smell it too, tummy." Kitty told it as she followed the smell to the dining room. Kitty couldn't believe it. The long table was covered with food. Fried chicken, hot dogs, French fries, hamburgers, corn on the cob, crawdads, biscuits and at least 16 pies. Kitty was drooling just looking at the deep fried feast.

"Like, who could've totally made all this?" Kitty wondered, wiping her mouth. "Ah did, sugah." Rogue said from behind Kitty. Kitty turned and saw Rogue wearing an apron. Scott and the others were beside her. "Why?" Kitty asked. "Well, we had an idea ta help ya curb your hunger. We were plannin' on either stuffing you here or takin' ya to a buffet until your attacks quit. But the professor said we shouldn't take ya in public for awhile an' we weren't exactly thinkin' about your feelings 'bout your hunger attacks." Rogue explained with a genuinely sympathy smile.

"But he did say we should make you big meals for breakfast, lunch and dinner." Scott added. "Rogue offered to make you lunch since she's been cooking since she was four." Jean added with a smile.

"Yeah. Where Ah'm from, ya kinda learn to cook either durin' or after you begin toilet trainin'." Rogue explained with a smile. "Well, like, thanks guys." Kitty smiled as she grabbed a large drumstick and took a bite. Flavor burst into her mouth and she began tearing into the food. "Good thing we ate beforehand. Otherwise I don't think we're gonna need anymore." Scott remarked as Kitty stuffed more chicken into her mouth, grease and sauce covering her face.

Kitty kept eating, each piece of food inhaled within seconds. Finally, Kitty reached the pies and, skipping the knife and forks, buried her face into each one, loudly gobbling it down. On and on it went, with Kitty eating each pie like she was a pig.

At last, Kitty leaned back, panting and very stuffed. Her face was a mess of sauce, grease, butter and pie fillings. "That... *BBBBUURRRRRRPPPPP* was so totally yummy, Rogue! Thanks for everything! Especially, like, those last 16 pies!" Kitty smiled as she managed to stand up and stagger out, burping and hiccupping loudly.

"I.. I don't believe it. She ate everything on the table!" Jean gasped as she eyed the huge stack of plates, trays, pie tins and other items. "Yeah. And she didn't even blink an eye!" Scott agreed in disbelief. "Vell, at least it vas not Hungry Kitty this time." Kurt pointed out gently.

"Yeah. But still man. K-girl's gotta cut back on the eatin'." Evan said with concern. "That's why the Professor's having us make her enormous meals for each course, Spyke. The question is, who's gonna make dinner?" Scott asked.

"I guess I can. I know a few of my grandmother's recipes that may help fill Kitty up more quickly." Jean offered. "Alright. Just remember to sit a few of them aside for us first." Scott advised.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Fast forward to lunch

choices: The dinner comes to a end without any problems
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
Kitty was at her room. She felt pretty good. Kurt had been right all along. The others were't mean to her nor did they tease her. Teasing someone because he or she is fat and eats a lot, that happens a lot. But teasing someone because of their weight while they can't help it... that's just low. Very low.

"Well now I at least don't have to hide my huge meals anymore. That's a good thing. And the other help me by making huge meals. At least this way I don't have to worry hungry kitten is gonna appear. Well even if she does the others would't make a problem of it. I just wish I would know why I have this huge hunger."

"Dinner Time!" She heard Jean yell from downstairs.

She just faded through the floor entering the kitchen.

"Oh there you are," Jean said. "I decided to cook. I used some of my grandmothers recipes. They're very filling. I thought it would be good for you. Since they are filling, you probably need to eat less to get full. When you eat less you won't gain so much weight."

"Yeah I really gained a lot of weight didn't I? Well it's not all bad. I mean my boobs did grew a few cup sizes."

Jean smiled. She was comfortable with her own cup sizes but understood very well that young kids of Kitty's age sometimes were very ashamed because of their body and wanted bigger boobs. She knew very well that some girls stuffed their bra with socks, toilet paper or tissues. She once met a girl that used chicken filet. Sadly enough enough for her people found out when she went to the swimming pool at school.

"I also got some more female curves, it does gives me a bit more female look," Kitty continued

"Kitty... don't get this the wrong way. It did gave you maybe some female curves... but It also gave you some curves at places… that shouldn't be curved. No offense."

"Some taken," Kitty mumbled.

The others walked in looking at Kitty.

"Well Jean cooked for you. All food that's on the table is for you," Rogue said.

"But what about you?" Kitty asked.

"Jean put some food aside for us," Scott said. "We know you can't help it and we do wanna help you, but that doesn't say we don't have to eat."

"Yeah I can understand that," Kitty said.

"But while you busy eating all that food we can eat without someones eating our food from our plate."

Kitty felt a bit guilty about eating their food at breakfast and not leaving a single crumb of food after lunch. She could have saved a few pies for the others. Well a bit too late to think about that now. At least now she could eat knowing that the others would have food also.

Jean gave Kitty a huge helping and put the rest of the food in front of Kitty and gave the others their helping. Kitty started eating her food fast, hoping Hungry Kitty wouldn't suddenly come up.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Dinner with help

choices: Next morning Kitty comes down for breakfast, finds an enormous one just for her
Kitty ends up with a very bad tummyache
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
But as Kitty finished eating, that familiar rumbly gurgly feeling emerged from her large belly. "Like, oh no! Not now!" She pleaded mentally. Jean quickly got wind of this via her telepathy. "Um, I think we better move." She said. "Why?" Evan asked, taking a bite of his chicken.

"Because Kitty's..." But before Jean could even finish her sentence, Kitty grabbed Kurt's plate and started scarfing down its' contents. "going into Hungry Kitty mode." finished a sheepish Jean as Kitty then licked the large plate clean before tossing it aside and grabbing hers.

"Kitty! Kitty! Snap outta it sugah! You're startin' ta loose control!" Rogue shouted as she barely moved her hand away in time as her best friend, teammate and roommate began scarfing down Rogue's helping of the chicken, mashed potatoes, green beans and gravy. After doing the same to Scott and Evan's, Kitty then started eating from the large bowls and tray themselves.

"Jean, I thought you said your grandmothers' recipes were very filling!" Scott said with concern as Kitty loudly gulped down the rest of the gravy from the gravy boat, spilling some on her t-shirt. "I really thought so, Scott! Hungry Kitty must've surfaced before Kitty could even start feeling stuffed." Jean realized as Kitty shoved the rest of the chicken into her mouth and swallowed loudly.

Finally, Kitty was leaning back in her chair, moaning and groaning loudly, her tongue lolling out of her mouth as she panted heavily. Her belly was so swollen, she looked like a pumpkin. Gravy was smeared around her mouth, which her tongue started lapping up.

"Okay. Now I think the stuffed feeling's working." Jean said. "Yeah. Good thing we ate most of our dinners before she got 'em." Evan agreed as the others nodded. "Kitty? Are you feeling alright?" Kurt asked gently.

"Nooooo… Like, I'm sooo full, my tummy's *BBBURRRRRRAAAPPPPP* like a lead ball. Why did I ate the entire chicken?" Kitty moaned, her face turning bright green as her belly gurgled and burbled in agony.

"I did warn you that my grandma's food was very filling." Jean said gently. "Yeah. But, like, Hungry Kitty didn't wanna listen so now I totally gotta stuffer her poopy mistake..." Kitty whimpered as she barely managed to heave herself up on her own.

"Do ya need help gettin' back to our room, Kit?" Rogue asked as Kitty stumbled slightly. "N-No. Like, I got it." Kitty groaned as she slowly regained her footing and managed to walk out, burping, moaning and whimpering in pain.

"Guess I should've doubled the meal's size." Jean remarked with concern. "Yeah. But what's done is done, Jean. You did your best and it was a good meal." Scott smiled gently. "You think the K-girl's gonna be okay?" Evan asked with concern. "I think so." Kurt said.

Then, they heard a large SNAP and a THUD! "Ouchie! Like, there goes my bed!" They heard Kitty cry in dismay. "An' we better tell the Professor that Kitty's gonna need a bigger and stronger bed." Rogue added. "Who should cover breakfast?" Evan asked. "I guess I can." Scott offered. "Vhat're you gonna make?" Kurt asked. "You'll see." Scott smiled.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Hungry Kitty strikes again

1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
The next morning Kitty was surprised why she was lying on mattress on the floor. She then remembered what happened yesterday. That she had gotten too fat for her own bed. This was probably one of the reasons why people did't wanna become obese. She must admit it did had his downsides. But she accepted the weight gain. But the part she hated was the hunger attacks. Also the fact that she ate the food of the others. Eating more then all the others was fine but eating their food... well that was just wrong. Especially since they tried to help her.
She slowly rolled of her mattress like a beached whale. She got up on hands and knees. With a bit help of the wall Kitty got up and waddled downstairs.
When she entered the kitchen she saw all others were already downstairs.

"Oh. Good morning everyone. How are you doing?"

"You slept so peacefully," Rogue said and smiled. "I just could't bring myself to wake you up. Besides that we need to do something else first."

"Like what?" Kitty asked.

"Having breakfast," Jane said. "Don't worry. We're not mad at you that you eat our food too. It also seems that it is't fun for you either. But well we also need to eat. So that's why we ate breakfast before you woke up."

Kitty felt a bit offended by that. But soon she realized that she ate their breakfast and dinner yesterday she must admit she could understand that they also wanted to eat and with hungry Kitty who seemed like she could appear at any moment it was wiser for them to eat while she was't around. But still…. it was no fun.

"We did had breakfast before you. However I did make you breakfast."

"Really. Oh that's so nice. I love you guys. I really do."

They took her to the dining room and looked surprised at all the food that was there. The table was filled with different kinds of food.

"You made this?" Jean asked.

"There a lot of things you don't know about me," Scott said with a smile.

"Like the fact he can use a Phone and order something," Evan sad with a grin.

"Does't matter," Kurt said. "All that matters is that it can stop hungry Kitty from coming out. I don't really like hungry Kitty. She does't think about anyone else besides herself. She dies't care about anything except filling her tummy."

"Yeah, yeah!" Kitty said annoyed. "I'm thank full for it Scott. Can I eat now? If I don't fill my tummy soon you know who comes out of me."

"Sure." Scott said. "Go ahead!"

The next moment Kitty started eating. The others blinked seeing how fast the food was disappearing into her mouth. She ate with knife and fork but still very fast.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Breakfast

choices: Storm, though unsure, agrees to the plan, making a ginormous feast for lunch
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
As Kitty kept wolfing down the breakfast Scott had gotten her, she felt a familiar rumbly gurgling in her belly. "Not again!" She whimpered to herself. Sure enough, Hungry Kitty was taking over. Within seconds, Kitty had shoved a giant forkful of pancakes into her mouth and swallowed them with a large gulp.

Looking around the table eagerly, she grabbed a tray of doughnuts and stuffed ten of them into her mouth at once, swallowing them after barely chewing them. After Kitty had eaten the last few doughnuts, she grabbed a platter of bacon and shoved handful after handful into her gullet, gulping loudly and loudly licking and smacking her lips.

The X-Kids just watched in disbelief. "Scott, I don't think your idea's working." Jean said as Kitty then guzzled down a very big pitcher of pulp-free orange juice, belching loudly after doing so before going back to scarfing down hash browns, sausages, scrambled eggs, ham, omelets, fruit and another tray of pastries.

Finally, "*BBBURRRRRRRRRAAAAUUUPPP!!*" Kitty belched loudly, her stomach pressing against the table due to how big and fat it now was. Slowly, she noticed her friends' expressions and quickly realized what had happened. "Like, I totally lost control again, didn't I?" She whimpered sadly. Scott and the others all nodded silently.

"It's alright Kitty. We know you didn't mean to." Jean said kindly. Suddenly, *SNAP!* Kitty's chair broke under her large girth, causing the now obese girl to plop onto the floor with a *THUD* "Owie! Like, that's the second piece of furniture I've totally broken in two days!" Kitty moaned, rubbing her hippo sized butt as tears welled up in her eyes.

"Kitty, we know it's not your fault. We told Professor X last night when you went to bed about your bed breaking and he guessed we'd likely need to order more chairs and things in case this happened anyway." Scott told her as he and Kurt heaved Kitty up.

"Like, I hope we find out what's causing this hunger soon. I don't wanna be immobile." Kitty whimpered as she went to get dressed. As she did, Scott and the others eyed the debris from her pig out.

"One meal down. Two or so more to go, depending on Hungry Kitty's appearances." Kurt said with concern. "Ah know. I hate ta say it, but Ah think we may need to... increase the meals' sizes." Rogue said gently. "What do you mean?" Evan asked.

"Look, the cookout's this weekend. That don't give us a lotta time to help Kitty. So Ah'm thinkin' we ask Storm to help us create meals so big, that even Hungry Kitty can't eat 'em all, startin' today." Rogue explained.

Then, Kitty waddled back in, wearing some more of her new clothes. Even though only two days had passed, she'd outgrown most of them. This was especially evident in her current jeans, which gave her a large muffin top belly. Before anyone could say a word, her pants button popped off with a loud *Ping* and would've socked Rogue in the eye if she didn't dodge in time.

"Like, I guess I'll totally need to buy new ones." Kitty whimpered as she held her pants up so the others wouldn't see her undies, grateful she'd bought the very stretchy underpants from the store that both she and Kurt had gone to two days prior.

As Kitty went to change into a large skirt she'd bought from the store as well before going go to buy more pants, Scott turned to the other X-Kids. "Okay. Rogue's right. With the cookout this weekend, we can't afford to have Hungry Kitty attack then. We'd better tell Storm now so she knows." He told the others as they set off to do so.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Another attack from hungry Kitty

1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
The whole group walked over to Storms room. Evan knocked at the door and after a: "Come in." All teens entered the room and looked at her.

"What's going on?" Storm asked.

"Well this is the thing," Scott said. "We been doing what the professor told us. We made huge meals for Kitty but for some reason she keeps losing control. Hungry Kitty appears and eats everything. Including the food of everyone else. We're not mad at her since we know she can't help it. However we need to perhaps well... make bigger meals. We thought you could help us."

"We also need to make sure nothing happens at the cookout," Evan said. "Especially since you practiced so much to make a perfect cake."

"Well I don't know," Storm said. "Kitty is eating huge meals all ready. You want to make even bigger meals.?"

"Well she has eaten everything we had previous lunches and dinners," Jane said. "Even while my grandmothers meals were very filling."

"I do believe she had a tummy ache afterwards because of the filling food," Scott said. "Hungry kitten does't listen to warnings."

"I think to hungry kitten it does't matter what she eats, or how filling it is as long if it is a lot. She also keeps eating until everything is gone," Rogue complained. "Sure we know she can't help it but we need to do something. We guess making even bigger meals might help her. We need to get her appetite under control. Especially with the cookout coming up."

Storm nodded slowly

"I understand what you mean," Storm said. "Kitty is losing control more often. You think bigger meals could help her. Well I'm not sure if it will help her. But at the other hand we can try. Nothing else have helped until now. So I guess I can try seeing if this helps. Then at least we have some kind of solution."

"Oh thanks auntie O," Evan said.

"It's Okay Evan," Storm said. "I'm always willing to help all of you. Even a hungry Kitty."

Some of the others smiled a bit since that sentence could mean two things.

"Well then, I better can start making lunch," Storm said and walked out of her room followed by all others.

Storm went straight to the kitchen. Put some pans on the stove and poured some butter in them. Grabbed some bread and made some peanut butter jelly sandwiches. She bakes some eggs and cooked some other and used the leftover eggs to make omelets. She took more break from the freezer and make toasts with cheese, ham or both. Also cut some fruit for a fruit salad. Backed some bacon. Some bread rolls with mozzarella and put them in the oven. She also made some spaghetti and tomato sauce with meat balls. She also made some wraps filled with salad, salmon, cheese or salad and mackerel. She also made some break with salad and fish or cheese. Also cooked some vegetables cutting them in tiny pieces baking them wit some bacon. She even made some cakes and pies. A few stacks of pancakes and more food.

When Storm was done she was exhausted. Sweat was dripping from her face. The kitchen was a total mess with dirty pots and pans. empty plates and empty boxes and bags But no matter how messy the kitchen was it was a huge meal. There was so much food on the table you could barely see the table.

"Will this be enough?" Rogue asked.

"I sure hope so," Evan said. "To be honest I hope it's more the she can eat. Then I can also take a bit of this food. This stuff is delicious."

"Well perhaps she leaves some," Kurt said. "But with hungry Kitty around… I'm not sure."

"Well maybe we're able with all this food to stop hungry Kitty from coming out at all," Jane said.

"Well we soon will find out," Scott said. "It's lunch time."
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: A huge lunch

choices: At the cookout, Hungry Kitty strikes a final time, resulting a massive bellyache
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
After a few minutes, Kitty came in, wearing some new jeans she'd just bought. "Like, hey guys. What's..." But she was cut short by a loud rumble in her belly. "Like, I need food now!" She told them. "Look in the dining room." Jean said with a smile. Kitty, surprisingly quick for a girl her size, raced in and squealed in delight at the ginormous meal for her.

"Like, yummy!" She cheered and with that, Hungry Kitty charged the food. First, Kitty started with the peanut butter and jelly sandwiches, stuffing two into her gullet at a time, chewing and gulping loudly. Then, she loudly scarfed down the eggs and omelets, licking each plate clean to make sure she didn't miss a single crumb. Then, came the tray of bacon and fruit salad.

The X-Kids and Storm all watched, nervously. Hungry Kitty wasn't showing any sign of stopping yet and she still had quite a bit to eat. They only had today to curb Kitty's appetite before the cookout and this, along with dinner, would be their final chance.

"Ya think this'll work?" Rogue asked as Kitty buried her face into the giant plate of spaghetti and meatballs, loudly slurping the noodles up as sauce coated her face before spearing all of the meatballs in one go with her fork and plopping them into her mouth after that.

"I really hope so, Rogue. Otherwise the cookout's gonna be a massacre tomorrow." Scott remarked as Kitty moved to the salad, salmon, cheese, salad and mackerel wraps, inhaling each one. By now, her belly was even plumper, starting to hang over her pants' waistband as she, with some difficultly, managed to cram the entire stack of pancakes into her mouth, stretching it rather wide as she chewed and swallowed with a very loud gulp.

Kitty then grabbed the veggie and bacon dish and wolfed that down with ease along with the bread. Now, came the pies and cakes. But just as Kitty picked up the first apple and cinnamon pie, Jean noticed something.

"Hey, I think she's slowing down!" she said excitedly. Sure enough, Kitty's chewing wasn't at top speed now. In fact, it was getting slower and slower. Finally, Kitty licked the tray clean and let out a very big burp.

"*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPP!* Oooohh… Like, too... much... foooooddd…" She moaned, turning bright green as her belly rumbled and gurgled deafeningly.

"I think it worked!" Scott shouted in excitement as the others cheered as well while Storm merely smiled. Kitty looked at her celebrating friends and quickly realized what had happened.

"L-like *Urp* you *hic* totally *hic-urp* filled Hungry *burp* Kitty *belch* early." She groaned between each burp and hiccup, her tummy still making alarming noises. "Yeah. Sorry to do this to you but we figured to make meals so big even Hungry Kitty couldn't keep up." Scott apologized as Rogue and Spyke helped heave the enormous Kitty up from her seat.

"Like, I guess it's totally okay. I think it may've worked this time." Kitty smiled, having calmed down a bit in the indigestion department. Then, she yawned loudly. "But, like, I'm totally pooped now. I'm gonna go lay down and digest before dinnertime." She told them as she slowly waddled away, still lime green and burping and hiccupping loudly. She even farted very loudly at least six times before she completely left the room.

"Well, at least she saved us dessert." Kurt pointed out as he and the others looked at Storm's remaining cakes and pies. "Yes. I can put some of them away for both dinner and the cookout tomorrow." Storm agreed with a smile. "Hey, Auntie O, could we have one since we didn't get dessert with our lunch yet?" Evan asked. "I suppose so, Evan." Storm sighed with an amused smile as Jean levitated a large chocolate cake over to her and the others while Storm set to work gathering the remaining ones.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Lunch for hungry Kitty

1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
With the help of Storm the others were able to make enough food to even make hungry Kitty feeling full. Problem was that hungry Kitty did't knew her limit causing Kitty to have belly aches after every meal. Lucky for her Kurt and Jane helped her by giving her tummy rubs that did fell pretty nice and also helped against the tummy aches.
But then came the day they all feared for. The cookout day.
Kitty woke up. Looking at her body that was bigger each day. If she kept gaining she needed to start wearing bed sheets. Or somebody who might be willing to make some big clothes for her. She rubbed her belly. She liked it when the food was digested. Then it was soft and squishy like a nice pillow. Downside about this was it meant she would soon be hungry. She really need to eat. Today was the cookout. She ran downstairs.

"Oh Kitty you're up," Jane said. "We made some breakfast for you in the dining room."

"Thanks. I would't want to have hungry Kitty at the cookout." Kitty said and ran over to the dining room.

The table was full of food. Sandwiches, omelets, baked eggs, omelets, boiled eggs, pasta, meatloaf, toasts, pancakes, waffles, wraps and a few buckets of chicken."

"Yummy. lets hope it's enough to shut up hungry Kitty," Kitty said.

She knew that lately it was getting harder and harder to get hungry Kitty under control. She could't do anything about it. It was like a sirens call. But at least then you could stuff your ears with wax or let someone tie you to the mast of a ship. That would help her since she would phase right through the ropes.
Kitty decided not to think about anymore and do why she came here for and started to stuff her face. She ate and ate Sandwiches omelets and baked eggs. It all tasted delicious. Especially the waffles. But the strange feeling she normally had did't happen. Was she finally rid of hungry Kitty? could it be?However she kept eating and eating. But a bit more slowly. She was already halfway done and still nothing from hungry Kitty. She finished of the meatloaf the went after the toasts and some of the other food. But suddenly she stopped eating. She let out a soft girly: "burp." and giggled."

"I'm full. No hungry Kitty. I did it. Better lay down for a while to let all this food digest."

She went up to her room and went lying on her new bed and soon fell asleep. A few hours later she woke up thanks to the sound of voices outside.
She looked out of her window. The cookout started. A lot of people showed up. Many parents and siblings from some of the other students joined the cookout. Many people were talking with each other and laughing. Students showed their family where everything was and introduced them to others. Also some other new people appeared to have joined the party. Perhaps some people who had a mutant child and were planning to put their child here but were't entirely sure. Or maybe some friends of others. But many people brought food.
Kitty went pale. She knew what was gonna happen. But she did't want this to happen. Not now. Not with all this people around. Sure the others knew what was going on, but not all new students did nor their parents.

"Oh all that food," Kitty mumbled when a familiar but unpleasant feeling appeared in her belly. "Oh no. Not now. Please not now."

That was Kitty's last thought before Kitty was gone and Hungry Kitty took full control. She faded right through the floor and as soon as she landed she ran straight through the wall the the garden were the cookout was.

"Oh hi Kitty," Rogue said who noticed her first. "Kitty do you feel all right? You have a strange look in your eyes. Oh no. Please don't tell this is..."

"HUNGRY!!!" Kitty yelled in Rogue's face.

"Yep. It's hungry Kitty," Rogue mumbled on a defeated tone.

The other started to notice her too and realized that it was hungry Kitty. Could't really miss it. Because Kitty ran at the table were Storm's cake stood and almost inhaled it. She ran over to another plate with pastries and stuffed them in her mouth so fast people almost could't keep track. Cinnamon rolls, steaks, hot dogs, hum burgers, cake, pies, fishes, squid, weenies, chili, pizza's and all other kinds of food. It did't really matter anything to Kitty. As long if it was edible and could fill her empty tummy. Hungry Kitty did't cared about anything else. She just stuffed everything she could find in her mouth. Kitty barely tasted the food. It did't matter to her. She ripped of pieces of the steak like a predator. Stuffed the hot dogs in her mouth two at a time.
Slowly all guests stopped with what they were doing or were talking about and started looking at the morbidly obese girl that was pigging out on the food for the cookout making herself even fatter.
Finally Kitty swallowed the last crumb and opened her mouth.

"BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!! Oops. Excuse me."

Then Kitty saw all the shocked faces of all the people and the all the empty plates and the realized what she had done. Her face got as red if a tomato from embarrassment. Her eyes got wet and the next moment she ran inside crying straight to her room. She jumped on her new bed and started sobbing in her pillow. Then she noticed something else. Her tummy. It felt awful. She had a terrible tummy ache. No wonder if you realized all the stuff she had eaten. Now she was in pain and could never show her face to the others ever again. This day could't get any worse.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Not now

choices: Amara, Jamie and Tabitha take Kitty for a shopping spree and a pig out session
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
After a few minutes, Kitty heard a knock on her door. "Kitty? May I come in?" Storm's voice asked. Sniffling, Kitty managed to sit up, despite her belly's protests. "C-c-come in." She whimpered, while wiping her eyes. Storm opened the door and slowly walked in.

Without a word, she sat down next to Kitty. "Are you alright?" she asked. Kitty shook her head. "No I'm not okay, Ororo! Like, Hungry Kitty attacked worse than ever! I totally thought she was under control again when she didn't strike during breakfast but then the cookout began and when she saw all that yummy food, she just snapped. Now I had a terrible tummy ache and I can't show my face to the others again! I'm such a big greedy selfish pig!" Kitty wailed, burying her face in her hands and sobbing anew.

"Kitty. It is alright. We all knew this might happen, remember? We honesty let our guard down after seeing how well breakfast went with you as well. Scott and the other upper classmen are currently explaining everything to the New Recruits right now so they understand too. The parents are freaked out a little as well, but they seemed to calm down when Charles told them after you left." Storm said assuredly. Kitty blew her nose loudly and sniffled as she looked up at her teacher.

"R-really?" She hiccupped, her belly gurgling slightly now. "Yes. Believe me, Kitty. The New Recruits will still like you no matter what. In fact, Jamie told me he, Amara and Tabitha would like to talk with you once your stomach calms down and the cookout ends." Ororo smiled as she gently hugged Kitty. "What about?" Kitty asked.

"They would not say. Tabitha wants it to be a surprise." Ororo admitted with a nervous look. Tabitha, or as she and the others called her "Boom-Boom", was often unpredictable and had often rebellious ideas. But she was a good person despite the rebellious side of her and got along with most of the other kids.

"Okay. Like, tell them I'll be down in a bit." Kitty smiled as she managed to stand up upon hearing her belly gurgle urgently. "Are you alright?" Ororo asked as she too stood up. "Yeah. Like, I totally just gotta use the bathroom." Kitty explained as she quickly raced into the bathroom. Storm watched with concern. Then she heard a giant fart, splash and Kitty sigh in relief. "It's okay! Like, I just totally had to take a poop!" Kitty called, somehow sensing Storm's concern as she let out another, longer fart.

Storm just smiled, relieved Kitty seemed to be feeling better, and went to inform Jamie, Amara and Tabitha that Kitty would be down soon to talk with them and hear Tabby's idea. She hoped Tabitha's idea wouldn't get the trio, or Kitty, in trouble.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Someone comes in

1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
Kitty washed her hands and slowly waddled downstairs. It was't as easy as it used to be. She remembered how she not to long ago ran up the stairs. But since some time her thighs were rubbing. Running was't gonna happen. Well she could still walk. Or more waddling to be exact. She was happy when she found out most other people left. She did't want them to see her. A girl who acted like a greedy pig. She sighed and walked further and saw Jamie, Tabitha and Amara. She patted Jamie on the back and the next moment there were four of him.

"Oh Kitty there you are," Tabithia said.

"Storm said you three… or six wanted to see me."

"Six. Well there are two of you. We have Kitty and hungry Kitty."

"True but were sharing the same body. It's only one at a time. And we act totally different while Jamie's copies are the same person."

"All right!" Tabithia said. "All right! Don't get you underwear into a wrinkle. Scott told us. You could't hep yourself. We understand right."

"Of course we understand," Amara said. "I mean come on. I almost made a volcano erupt. You're worried about that you ate to much?"

"But you seemed kind of upset." Tabithia said. "You know what always makes me feel better? Going on a shopping spree. We go and we want you too come with us. Besides I do think You need some bigger clothes don't you. Guess you need to go for a store for big sizes. But well that's no problem is it?"

Kitty remembered exactly were the store was for big sizes. She must admit it was a nice store. They also had some nice clothing. But she had two problems. She did't had any pocket money and what would happen if hungry Kitty showed up.

"I'm not sure you guys. I would love to go on a shopping spree with you. I really do. But I don't have any pocket money left and what will happen if hungry Kitty appears?"

"Well you don't have to worry about pocket money," Storm said who suddenly appeared. "Professor X told your parents about your hunger right after the first time you told us. So since the clothing problems are not really your fault he decided to send you some extra pocket money to buy bigger clothes. Don't forget to thank him."

"Well Kitty smiled weakly. That solves on problem. But I don't wanna sound ungrateful but what Do I do when Hungry Kitty appears?" Kitty asked.

However she ate so much at the cake out she did still feel pretty stuffed. But she knew very well that could soon change.

"There is a solution for every problem," Tabithia said. "We take you on a shopping spree and a pig out session!"

"Really guys? I wanna warn you I do eat a lot. I don't wanna drain you from your pocket money just to make me feel..."

"Don't worry." Tabithia said. "I have a idea. Don't worry."

"Well... all right then. I guess it would be nice." Kitty mumbled.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: What always makes me feel better

choices: The four reach the mall and the girls get new clothes
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
Soon, Kitty, Amara, Tabitha and Jamie were heading to Bayville Mall. They had considered walking there, but Kitty knew she'd likely get very pooped before they even reached the mall due to her girth. So, Tabitha, having "burrowed" Lance's jeep, decided to use that. For once, Tabitha actually drove pretty smoothly and they were soon heading for the mall.

"Like, I really don't wanna put you guys out of your money like I did with Kurt a few days ago." Kitty was saying from the backseat. She and Jamie were sitting there together while Amara was in the shotgun seat. "Hey. Don't worry, Kitty. I told you I've got an idea." Tabitha smiled as they drove.

Then, Kitty felt that rumbly, gurgly feeling in her tummy again. "Uh oh." She said. "What's wrong?" Jamie asked, his 11-year-old eyes wide with concern. "Tabitha, it's happening." Kitty groaned, clutching her stomach. "What?" Amara said with concern for her friend.

"Like, Hungry Kitty wants out!" Kitty whimpered as her stomach kept rumbling and burbling, getting louder and louder with each one. "Okay!" Tabitha called as she gunned the engine and drove the jeep to a new buffet.

"Are you sure about this, Tabitha?" Amara asked as they climbed out and Kitty nearly bowled Jamie over darting inside. "Relax, 'Mara. I told you I got a plan and we'll use it soon." Tabitha smiled.

The trio followed Kitty inside and found her already loading a plate with pizza, chicken, cake, cookies, pie, burgers, corn dogs, ham and doughnuts. "Uh, Tabby? What's your plan?" Jamie asked as he eyed Kitty's giant meal. Tabitha merely smiled, grabbed a plate and started loading it with the same amount of food as Kitty. Kitty seemed surprised for a second, but merely shrugged and took the extremely full plate to a booth. "C'mon guys! This buffet's got a deal: Eat all you can and you get all meals free for the rest of your life!" Tabitha smiled as she grabbed a rather giant drumstick from her plate and took a big bite. Amara and Jamie looked at each other doubtfully.

"Tabitha, I don't think we can eat all this food too." Amara said nervously. "Sure you can Amara! That's why I brought you!" replied Tabby, her cheeks bulging as she stuffed two cookies into her mouth while she kept eating her chicken. Kitty, meanwhile, was already mowing through her burgers, starting with one, then managing to stuff four more into her mouth at the same time before swallowing with a very big gulp, nearly choking as she did.

"Then why am I here?" Jamie asked Tabitha. "We need a cheering section, Jamie baby. You can eat some of you want." Tabitha explained as she finished the chicken and shoved two big slices of cheese and pepperoni pizza into her gullet. With a nervous look, Amara grabbed a plate and loaded it with the same pile of food as her friends had done.

Jamie watched as the three girls chowed down. Kitty was finishing her first plate and managed to get up and refilled it, this time with hoagies, roast beef sandwiches, and other foods. Jamie decided to take a few cookies to eat, not wanting to go overboard as he watched and encouraged his three friends.

As time ticked on Amara and Tabitha's bellies swelled up as they went back for seconds, thirds fourths and fifths. Kitty was already eating her 7th, 8th, 9th and 10th helpings, her belly starting to push against the table. During the third course, Tabitha had to unbutton her pants and loosen her belt so they didn't pop off due to her belly starting to feel restrained.

Amara only had to undo her pants button since her pants didn't need a belt to hold them up. Kitty didn't even bother to do either of these since she knew they'd give way to her girth anyway and this proved true when her button popped off and nearly put out Tabby's eye if she hadn't ducked in time.

Finally, the three girls swallowed their last few crumbs and leaned back, stuffed and happy. "Like, oh boy. That was totally worth Hungry Kitty's appearance." Kitty smiled, patting her enormous belly in delight before burping loud and long. "See? Told ya this'd pay off." Tabitha smiled before letting out a giant burp as she rubbed her own bowling ball shaped tummy.

"So, like, your idea was to go to this buffet, pig out with me and then I'll get meals here free for the rest of our lives?" Kitty asked in surprise, lovingly stroking her big belly as it churned all the food in it. "Yep!" Tabitha smiled, licking her fingers off.

"Amara? Are you okay?" Jamie asked, upon noticing said girl's pained face as she clutched her poor tummy in agony.

"I feel like I'm gonna explode." Amara groaned, letting out an equally jumbo burp, her cheeks bulging as she did. "Do you guys still feel like going to the mall?" Jamie asked as he eyed both the girls and the other diners watching them in disbelief, disgust and/or awe. "Yeah, Jamie baby. It'll give us time to- *URRRRRRRPPPP!* digest." Tabitha smiled, burping loudly again.

"Or loose our lunch." Amara moaned, hands on her head as she rested her chin on the table before burping loudly again herself, her face slightly green.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: On the way over there

1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
"Besides we need some bigger clothes. If you did't notice I needed to lose my belt and opened my pants button," Tabitha said.

"I did too but I still feel awful," Amara said burping loudly again. "I never have eaten so much. I also never felt so stuffed."

"Stop whining," Tabitha said. "Be happy. We did it. With a lot of help from hungry Kitty but you must admit we put in a lot of the work too."

"Besides Amara you were always stick thin," Kitty said. "I think some extra pounds will look great at you. Give you some female curves. They will look great at you."

"O really?" Amara mumbled on a bored tone.

"Really," Tabitha confirmed. "Of course I already have perfect female curves but making them a bit bigger would be great. What do you say Amara. Don't you want a hot body with female curves where all men will drool over?"

"I'm not sure if it's worth this pain," Amara moaned. "Let's go look for some new clothes. I don't think my old clothes will fit me any more."

"Oh I know a place!" Kitty yelled excited. "I've been there one time before with Kurt. It is a place with clothes for girls with a few extra pounds on them. Like me. It's a cool place. Not far from here."

"Well then I suggest will go there." Tabitha said and stood up. "Kitty lead the way because well you know where it is."

"Wait if it's a place for girls can I enter?" Jamie asked.

"Sure, as long if you don't look in the changing rooms," Tabitha said on a sweet tone. "Besides we need some advice how our outfits look. We of course need the opinion from a boy because one reason we dress nice is because we want to get attention from nice guys."

"If you want to get attention from guys all you have to do is show your naked boobs or walk around naked," Amara mumbled. "Believe me then you get enough attention from men."

"Yeah but that's not really the attention we want," Kitty said.

After a few minutes Kitty saw the store. Big plump girls. Clothes for larger girls. The four entered the store and looked around.

"I must admit that they do have nice clothes here. Amara said.

"Yeah they really do," Tabitha added. "I did't know they had this much nice clothes for bigger girls. That fat girls at our school normally Always wore tasteless clothes. To be honest I would't even wanna found dead in them. But those at the other hand."

"I wanna be found alive in them. So people see how good I look in them," Kitty said.

All three girls started grabbing clothes and started trying on clothes. Poor Jamie was place on a chair and told not to move and tell them any time how good the clothes looked at them.

Finally Amara bought some black with red clothes that looked really good at her and remembered the other three at her magma form. Tabitha got some jeans and purple shirts. Kitty was wise enough to buy clothes a few sizes bigger then her current size and made sure they were elastic. At least this way her clothes would last for longer the just a few days. She also bought a new bikini since it had been pretty hot the past days.
They all four left the store with a few bags filled with clothes. Kitty must admit that Tabitha had been right. This did cheer her up. She barely thought about her binge at the cookout. She also felt happy that she had some new clothes. She also was surprised how nice Tabitha was to her. Normally she was a rebel at hart who did nothing else then causing problems for herself and the others around her. But nothing of that hat happened today. At lest not as far if she knew.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Nice clothes

choices: The girls have a giant pig out session, ending up very bloated as they go home
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
As they started to leave, Kitty felt the rumbly, gurgling feeling in her belly again. "Oh no. Not again!" She whimpered, clutching her tummy in agony. "Hungry Kitty?" Tabitha guessed in concern. Kitty merely nodded as she felt said persona taking over.

"I need food now!!!" She cried desperately. "Okay! C'mon, guys. We gotta get her to the food court!" Tabitha shouted, taking Kitty's arm. Quickly, the four raced for the food court. Upon reaching it, they were in for a nasty shock.

Almost all the booths were closed.

"Why'd they close down? It's still afternoon." Amara remarked. Kitty blushed as she realized the reason. "Because, like, I totally demolished their food supplies last time I was here." She confessed with a blush.

"Blue did mention that." Tabitha remembered, using her nickname for Nightcrawler. "Well, what're we gonna do?" Jamie asked as Kitty doubled over again due to the rumbly, gurgly feeling in her gut.

Tabitha was quiet and then got an idea. "Over here!" She said, pulling Kitty over to a large mall restaurant nearby. Amara and Jamie quickly followed. A bright chipper waitress came up after a moment.

"Hi. Welcome to Big Belly Bomb. Table for how many?" She smiled.

"Hi. Table for four and could you make it a booth please? Our friend really needs food now!" Tabitha said quickly, nodding to Kitty. The waitress seemed to understand after eying Kitty's agony and quickly led them to the biggest booth in the place.

It was so big, you probably could've fitted everybody from the mansion in it and still have room for some of Jamie's duplicates left over.

A second later, the woman returned with menus for them. "What'll you have to drink?" she asked. "Um, I'll have an Orange soda." Amara said politely. "I'll take four chocolate milkshakes." Kitty said. "Root beer for me and Jamie." Tabitha added as Jamie nodded.

The waitress nodded. "And have you decided what to order?" she asked. "No. Have any suggestions?" Tabitha replied. The waitress smiled politely. "Well, we have Jumbo Gut Bombs... we also have some awesome lasagna... turkey... hoagies... and every kind of dessert you can think off!" the waitress smiled.

At that Kitty, Tabitha and even Amara's tongue's practically flopped onto the table in delight. "Sounds great! Like, give us four orders of everything!" Kitty squealed. "You must really be starving in order to order that much." remarked the waitress in surprise as she went to fill the order. Once she did, Kitty, Tabitha and Amara all tied napkins around their necks eagerly.

"Could I get some of your guys' food?" Jamie asked gently. "Sure thing babycakes." Tabitha smiled as they waited. "It better not take too long. Otherwise I'm gonna start eating other people's food." Kitty warned. "Yeah, Kurt told me about that cold burger you ate during your first public pig out." Jamie admitted. Kitty blushed sheepishly.

"Like, normally I wouldn't do that but I was so hungry. Luckily, the people who bought that meal had left beforehand. But, like, it was still totally humiliating." Kitty said as her stomach let out a giant rumble, causing several people to look up in surprise.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Another hunger attack

choices: Tabiha has a legal way to pay
Tabitha has a illigal way to pay
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
They soon got their drinks. Kitty was happy now she finally got something in her stomach. Even if it was more liquid then food. But soon their food was ready. As soon if the waitress put the plates down Kitty started stuffing her face like if she had't eaten in days.

"Wow, you really were hungry,"The waitress said. "I get the rest of your food."

Kitty was't the only one. Tabithia was also pigging out. Amara also was eating pretty fast but Kitty noticed she was doubting. She ate fast but was mumbling.

"I really shoud't be doing this but I'm really hungry. But I don't want to feel sick again.

Kitty focused on her lasagna. It was richly filled with sauce and meat and delicious cheese on top. It tasted pretty good. Also Jamie took a tiny piece of it however it was't much to what the girls were eating.
After the lasagna was gone the girls attacked the tukey's. it were pretty big ones but the girls did't care and ripped the meat of the bones like starving Komodo dragons. Jamie was able to get one leg.

Strange they call thing things legs," Amara said who got her own Turkey leg.

"Why do you think it's strange?" Tabitha asked.

"Well it is't really a leg but a thigh. Let's be realistic. A bird leg does't have any meat on it. That's just bones with skin. But the thigh. That's were the meat is."

"You're right!" Tabitha yelled and stood up. "The meat is on the thighs." She slapped her one big thighs to proof her point.

Kitty smiled. That was really Tabitha. So sassy and confident and at the same time did't really cared. But she was sometimes what irresponsible. That sometimes caused problems. It drove others, (especially Scott) crazy.
The girls soon turned the turkeys in noting more the a pile of bones. Totally licked clean. There was't the tiniest piece of meat left. But the girls did't bother and started on the hoagies.
Jamie just laid back. He had enough. He looked at the girls and must admit he liked watching them eat. He then noticed Tabitha undid her belt and opened her pant button just like Amara.

"I should't do this. I know I should't but still…"

"Oh look there are the desserts," Tabitha said while their table was filled with different kinds of dessert. Cakes, pies, ice cream. It all looked delicious. All three girl licked their lips.

Amara suddenly did't care anymore. "Ah what,screw it,I gonna eat myself stuffed like a turkey at thanksgiving."

All girl were eating dessert until there was't a crumb left. Only four burping girls.

"Oh men," Amara moaned. "I really have a tummy ache... again. But considering how good those desserts were… it was totally worth it."

Kitty looked at the table filled with the remains of all their food. Suddenly Kitty realized something.

"Eh... girls. How are we gonna pay for all of this?"

"Don't worry," Tabitha said
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Three hungry girls

choices: Kitty and Tabitha finish the sundae and the four go home (girls sleepover time)
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
"I have a plan." Tabby smiled. "What?" asked Amara, before belching loud and deep. "When the waitress comes over with the check, I'll ask if we can have the one dessert we didn't try. If we eat all of it, or at least most of it, we'll get this meal free too." Tabitha smiled.

"What's the dessert?' Kitty asked with interest. She did have some pocket money left over and it could cover at least most of the feast, but she also knew Amara and Tabby barely had any left over after the shopping spree. "It's a 50 pound ice cream sundae." Tabitha smiled. At that, Magma turned dull green. "Tabitha... I don't think I can eat that. I'm too full." she moaned, her belly gurgling.

Kitty and Tabitha looked at her. Amara really did look ready to burst or throw up or both. "It's okay, Amara. I think Kitty and I can handle it." smiled Boom-Boom. Kitty nodded. "Totally." she smiled. So, when the waitress came up with the check, Tabitha put the request down. Needless to say, the waitress was very surprised. These girls had just eaten four orders of everything, including desserts and now they wanted the 50 pound sundae.

Though surprised, she agreed and went to inform the staff. "Are you guys sure you can eat all that, Tabby?" Jamie asked, eyeing his obese female teammates and friends. "Yeah Jamie baby. Kitty and I can destroy that sundae, no problem." Tabitha smiled.

Kitty nodded eagerly. "Tabitha's right, Jamie. My tummy's a lot roomier now that I've started eating bigger meals and I do have some of Hungry Kitty's hunger left over from our late lunch. This shouldn't be a problem." She smiled, ruffling Jamie's hair playfully. "On that subject, I think I better go make some room." Tabitha said as she got up and went for the ladies room.

Soon, the waitress arrived with four guys carrying the sundae. It was very big, with scoops of chocolate, vanilla, strawberry, blue moon, mint chip, rocky road, cookie dough and peanut butter ice cream, a generous amount of hot fudge, a mountain of whipped cream and a cherry on top.

"Ready Kitty?" Tabitha asked, grabbing a spoon. "Yeah, Tabby. Like, let's totally do this!" Kitty cheered as she grabbed a spoon herself and the duo started eating at top speed as Jamie and Amara watched in both surprise and encouragement as their friends ate and ate and ate and ate.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Tabitha has a legal way to pay (free meal)

choices: Some girls are to tired for a sleepover
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
Amara watched in surprise. Sure she knew Kitty could eat huge amounts of food thanks to that hunger attacks but that wasn't the case with Tabitha. It looked like Kitty's eating habits had rubbed off on her. On herself too she must admit. She was a normal girl with a small waist and normal appetite but today she ate more then she'd ever ate before. She had a huge tummy ache to prove it. She looked at her friends destroying the sundae.

"Man you could lose a hand in there," Amara whispered. "Be careful you two don't choke."

It was supposed to be a joke but if you saw how they were eating, it could become reality.

"Take it easy," Jamie said. "Or else you get a brain freeze."
