Kitty and Tabitha were busy eating when both spoons suddenly hit a empty bowl. The bowl was empty. They had done it. Two girls had ate a huge sundae. Both were sitting rubbing their bloated bellies.

Kitty opened her mouth and: "BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!!! Oops. Excuse me."

"Ah come on," Tabitha said. "That was nothing. BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!!!!!!!!!!!! See that's a real burp!"

Both burps were so loud some other people looked up disturbed and a bit disgusted. However Tabitha didn't seem to care. At all.
However the waitress came over at their table not looking happy.

"Fine you did it. You ate that entire sundae so it's free. But can you two just GO!?!? You're disturbing our other costumers. And they pay for all the food they eat, and they don't burp so loud everyone in a ray of 100 yards can hear them."

"Fine," Tabitha said. "We'll go. It's getting late anyway. Come on girls and boy."

Kitty and Tabitha struggled a bit to get up which caused the waitress to make a soft sound in disgust before walking away. The four teens walked or in some cases waddled to their car and drove back to the institute.

"That shopping spree lasted longer then I thought," Tabitha said. "I think we're too late for dinner. That's too bad."

Amara turned a bit green hearing this.

"Please don't tell me you two are still hungry!" Amara said. "You can't be. We went to a buffet and we just ate all that food, especially you two with that entire sundae."

Kitty giggled. "Don't worry Amara. I must admit even I am pretty full. I don't need dinner. Or at least not right now."

A few minutes later they arrived at the institute and got inside.

"You know what?" Tabitha said. "I think we should finish this shopping spree with a girls sleepover!"
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Three stuffed girls

choices: Jean and Rogue manage to eat as much as Tab and Kitty (all four get tummyaches)
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
Soon, Kitty, Tabitha, Amara, Jean and Rogue were all gathered in Kitty and Rogue's bedroom. Tabitha had decided to keep the sleepover between the five "Bayville Sirens" members this time.

Jean and Rogue were surprised to see how round Amara and Tabitha now were due to their eating, but quickly shrugged it off. Per Kitty's suggestion, they had brought a ton of snacks in case Hungry Kitty struck again.

Pizza, snack cakes, candy bars, popcorn, doughnuts, cupcakes and even more snacks were ready for the girls. Each girl was now wearing their pajamas. Jean wore her usual blue nightshirt with yellow collar and cuffs. Rogue wore her normal orange and light green long sleeved pajama shirt and matching pants. Kitty had changed to her new extra-large, stretchy pajama t-shirt and shorts. Amara wore a big t-shirt and stretchy sweatpants and Tabitha wore a sleeveless t-shirt and big pajama pants.

"So Tabitha... how do you like your new... um... plumpness?" Jean asked awkwardly. "You kiddin' Red? I love it. I mean, I already had curves, but this blubber makes 'em even plumper!" Tabitha laughed as she slapped her big jiggly thigh.

"How 'bout you, Amara?" Rogue asked as she eyed Magma's large brown belly. Amara was quiet for a moment before she answered.

"I guess I like it too. Like Kitty said, I've always been pretty skinny and now I do have some curves." Amara admitted. She still felt somewhat queasy, but had felt well enough to come to the sleepover.

At that moment, a low, loud rumble filled the room. "Like, I don't believe it! I'm totally hungry again!" Kitty said as she patted her belly. Then, Tabitha's stomach gurgled in agreement. "Me too." She said.

"I'm kinda hungry myself." Rogue admitted as her stomach grumbled and she put a hand on it. Jean's own stomach rumbled as well. "Good thing we have a ton of food." Jean smiled.

"Like, I'll bet you guys can't eat as much as me and Tab!" Kitty suggested with a giggle. Jean and Rogue looked at each other thoughtfully. After a quick (and telepathic) conversation, they turned to the younger girls.

"You're on!" Rogue smiled as Jean nodded. Amara watched as her four friends started pigging out on the ginormous mountain of junk foods. She had to admit she felt peckish, but her belly was still pretty rumbly and yucky feeling. So, she just decided to sit back and watch the feasting.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: The girls sleepover

choices: They all fall asleep, time to digest the food
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
All four girls grabbed a pizza slice and started eating. Kitty was the first one done, grabbed the remaining two slices placed them on top of each other and stuffed them in her mouth. The other girl noticed this and did the same with the other pizza.

Amara, for some reason she didn't understand herself, liked watching this and made a list in her head how much each girl was eating.

Next were the cakes. There were six. Each one grabbed a cake. Stuffing them in their mouth like a starved animal. Both Kitty and Jean looked at the two remaining cakes. Kitty went to grab one but Jean's mind was faster. The two cakes floated in the air and each cake broke in two equal sized pieces.

"So this is fair," Jean said and took a big bite of her cake, smearing frosting over her mouth.

Next there were four bags of popcorn. A least that what the box said. But when Kitty grabbed a bag it seemed pretty small.

"Does this bag contains popcorn?" Kitty asked. "It does't feel like popcorn. It's kind of hard."

"Pass me one bag," Amara said.

Kitty handed here one bag but as soon as Amara grabbed it they heard popping sounds inside the bag. It started to swell and a minute later it was turned into a big bag of popcorn.

"Here you go. You just needed to pop them first," Amara said and handed Kitty the bag with a smile.

"Don't forget the other bags too," Tabitha said and threw the three other bags to her friend.

Amara sighed and also heated the other three bags until the were filled with popcorn.

The girls almost inhaled the popcorn. They didn't pause except to taking sips from one of the bottles of soda. Each girl liked how the fizzy drinks made their bellies swell even more.

It turned into a real competition. However they made it fair. Each girl was given the same amount of food. They equally shared the doughnuts. the candy bars and all the other food. Every girl was so busy in eating all of the food the didn't notice how stuffed they were or how big their bellies were getting. However Amara noticed how their bellies were swelling. But then suddenly the last bite of food was gone.

"That was it," Kitty said on a sad tone. "BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!!!"

"Ew that's gross," Jean said.

"No it's not," Tabitha said. "This is gross. BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"

Rogue opened her mouth. "BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!"

"All right. It seems like Rogue wins," Tabitha said.

"Not yet," Rogue said. "Jean still needs to burp."

"No not really you guys I...."

All four started to cheer: "Jean! Jean! Jean!"

Jean knew there was no way out of this. She opened her mouth and: "burp!"

"That was all?" Tabitha said. "What a disappointment."

"I'm not just a belcher," Jean said. Then she felt a horrible pain in her belly. "And I don't know about you but I have a serious tummy ache."

"You too?" Rogue asked, turning pale green. "I thought it was just me."

"Me too. I just kept eating. I didn't noticed how full I got." Tabitha admitted, her own face also taking on a greenish hue.

"Same here. Even with hungry Kitty inside me I also have a tummy ache." Kitty said as she too turned green as her belly gurgled and rumbled ominously.

Amara looked a bit amused at her four friends who were all moaning in pain from their over stuffed bellies.

"Wait a second," Rogue asked. "Who won?"

"It was a tie," Amara said. "I saw the whole thing. You split everything equally. You all ate the same amount. It was a tie. But I can tell you it was a lot. You were acting like real gluttonous pigs."

"You're not so skinny yourself chubby," Kitty moaned, barely clamping a hand over her mouth in time as she burped ominously, her cheeks bulging.

"Touche," Amara admitted. "But what now?"
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Four stuffed girls

choices: The girls wake up and enjoy a very big breakfast before deciding to go shopping.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
Then, Tabitha let out a giant yawn. "I don't know 'bout you ladies, but I'm pooped. I need to sleep." She sighed, her eyes struggling to stay open. "I'm not surprised, Tabitha. You did eat a lot, both now and earlier." Amara pointed out with a giggle.

"I'm kinda pooped mahself. Ah guess Ah kinda understand what ya go through after your hunger attacks, Kit." Rogue yawned as she kept nursing her very sore belly.

"A goodnight's rest might do our tummies some good." Jean agreed with a very big yawn as she licked the last bit of frosting off her nose with her tongue.

"Like, I'm so totally pooped, I wouldn't be surprised if I..." Kitty began but trailed off as she slumped over on her bed and began snoring softly.

"It is pretty late anyway." Jean remarked, eying Kitty's alarm clock. It read 12:50. "We better get some sleep. Good thing Logan said we could take it easy this summer and agreed not to run any Danger Room exercises until school starts in August." she added, fluffing her pillow and crawling into her sleeping bag.

"Yeah. I gotta say Ah was pretty surprised by his willingness to do that, but now Ah'm really glad." Rogue agreed as she plopped onto her bed and was out like a light a second after turning her bedside light off.

Tabitha yawned loudly as she crawled under her sleeping bag and fell asleep almost instantly. Amara just smiled as she listened to her friends' snoring or gentle breathing and the gurgling/rumbling of their very big bellies as they digested the large feast.

Without a word, Amara climbed into her sleeping bag and fell asleep too. Though she was occasionally awoken briefly by her friends burping, hiccupping or farting in their sleep.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: They all fall asleep, time to digest the food

choices: On the way to the mall
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
Kitty woke up next morning due to soft talking. She opened her eyes and saw Amara, Jean and Rogue were talking with each other. Softly whispering. Tabitha was still asleep in her sleeping bag. Kitty yawned. Then went sitting up straight and stretching herself once. This got the attention of the other three girls.

"Oh look who finally woke up," Amara said. "Morning sleepyhead."

"What? I'm up right? It's not strange I was sleepy after last night. Besides Tabitha's still sleeping."

"I still don't get it," Amara mumbled.

"What? I was sleepy. It got pretty late."

"Not that Kitty," Jean said. "We were having a conversation short before you woke up."

"Really. About what?"

"Well it seems like you're not alone anymore," Jean answered. "Kitty you must have noticed what we ate yesterday wasn't normal. You have Hungry Kitty inside of you. But what we ate yesterday... Well, it's way more food Rogue and I normally eat. While we did have dinner. And we may believe Amara that you and Tabitha both also ate awfully a lot in the mall. She did too. Both of you. Not just you. And now we."

"Wait… do you think I got something to do with it?" Kitty asked in disbelief.

"No they don't," Tabitha said who clearly had woken up. "But what Jean means is what has happened to you… is now also happening to us. That's not your fault. At least I don't think so. But well I'm hungry. Lets get dressed and get down for breakfast."

All girls agreed and went to their own room to get dressed.
Kitty must admit some part of her felt… a bit better. At least now she was not alone. The others did help her and now she had some friends who seemed to have the same problem. It was more fun to have a problem with friends then just on your own. Now you could lean a bit on each other. She was happy she bought those new clothes.

A few minutes later Kitty, Jean, Tabitha and Amara were all in the kitchen making a big breakfast for all of them.

"Hey where's Rogue? She needs to help too," Tabitha said.

"Here I am," Rogue said and waddled in.

Rogue wore what she normally wore but between her pants and shirt you could see a stroke of her belly. A bit of her belly peeked out from between her pants and shirt. It seemed like all the snacking yesterday did took a toll on her body. Perhaps she also did eat a bit more during the day. She didn't know since she hadn't gone to the mall with Tabitha, Amara and Jamie like Kitty did.

"All right since we're all here let's start making breakfast!" Jean said.

All five girls started making breakfast. It was pretty easy since Amara could defrost, toast, cook and bake things in less then a minute. Finally the table was covered. with sandwiches, baked eggs, omelets, boiled eggs, fruit, toasts, sausages, some pasta, wraps an a lot of other food. All girl looked at it almost drooling a bit.

Kitty felt a unpleasant feeling in her belly.

"Uh-oh. Seems it's time for Hungry Kitty!" She warned the others.

But as soon as hungry Kitty started eating so did the others. Even Amara. All five girl started stuffing their faces. Not having a care in the world except filling their bellies making them fatter by the day. Most of the girls didn't really notice what they were eating. They didn't really care either as long if it was edible. It was hard to believe how fast the food was gone. But after not to long all girls were leaning back in their chairs with swollen bellies. Kitty, Tabitha and Amara wore the clothes they bought yesterday.

But Kitty could clearly see that Rogues belly was exposed now. Her shirt wasn't able to even cover her bellybutton. But Kitty must admit she liked seeing it.

Jean stood up and stuck out her arms and stretched and the next moment there was a loud: RIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIP!!! Her light purple pants split. Both legs ripped at the sides. Jean stood there a bit in shock and embarrassment as the next moment the remains of her pants fell down revealing her tight pretty pink panties.

The other could help it and burst out in laughter. Jean, with a head as red as a tomato, grabbed the remains of her pants and tried to cover herself with it.

"OK!" Kitty said giggling a bit. "You two need new clothes. So I suggest... we need to shop!"
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Fattening breakfast

choices: Hungry Kitty strikes, forcing a trip to the buffet for an all morning pig out
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
A few hours later found the five girls at the mall. Kitty happily led the way to Big Plump Girls. Jean and Rogue were somewhat uneasy by the idea of shopping at a plus-sized store. But they realized that the stores they normally went to wouldn't likely have larger sizes.

Jean was wearing a pair of Tabitha's new plus sized pants since none of her skirts or pants would go over her hippo butt anymore.

Rogue, meanwhile, was thankful her pants and current shirt were still able to handle her size somewhat. She hoped Big Plump Girls had a gothic section for her.

"Okay. Like, here we are!" Kitty smiled as they entered the shop. Jean and Rogue looked around in surprise. There were quite a few large girls shopping and several clothes they'd enjoy.

"Okay, ladies... let's help our friends look good and fat!" Tabitha smiled as she dragged Jean over to a rack. Kitty and Amara led Rogue over to another nearby.

A few minutes later, Kitty, Amara and Tabitha were sitting in front of the dressing rooms waiting for Jean and Rogue to show off their new clothes. So far, the duo had each tried on 8 different styles.

Jean and Rogue felt a bit embarrassed being put on display for their friends while overweight. But they got over it and began doing so, figuring they might as well do it since their friends were willing to help them.

Jean went first with a blue t-shirt reading "I'm a big cute piggy" and a large beige skirt. That got a thumbs up from Kitty and Amara and Tabitha gave it a playful "Oink" of approval.

Rogue's first choice was rather surprising. She went with a red t-shirt with the words "Gimme my food or I'll sit on you!" and navy blue shorts. That got a big thumbs up from all three mock judges.

On and on it went, with Jean and Rogue taking turns in trying out new wardrobe ideas. Some (like Jean wearing a large muumuu reading "Got pie?" and large light blue jeans) got a big thumbs up, others (like Rogue wearing a hot pink t-shirt reading "Will you be my feeder?" and kaki pants) got a big raspberry, a thumbs down or both from the three younger girls. Other times, both Jean and Rogue would look so funny, the trio would laugh until they cried and/or (in Tabitha and Kitty's cases) fall onto the floor.

Finally Jean slowly came out of the dressing room she was in for the final time. She wore a bright pink extra large t-shirt that read "I'm a big, fat girl and proud of it!" and large dark blue jeans. "Well?" Jean asked. Tabitha smiled. "I like it." "Totally." Kitty agreed. "It's really cute Jean." Amara beamed.

Rogue then came out, wearing basically an extra large version of her normal clothes. "Like, you totally look nice Rogue." Kitty smiled with a blush. She still felt something for Rogue ever since seeing her pale tummy poking out of her shirt at breakfast. She couldn't explain why but she really felt turned on by it.

"Thanks, Kitty. Ah like it better than that last one Tabitha made me try." Rogue replied, glaring at Tabitha, who giggled. Tabitha had made Rogue try on a fluffy white sweater with a cat on it that, as Kitty put it, "totally looks like a giant, poofy marshmallow" and cargo shorts.

"A lot of this stuff isn't really cheap, is it?" Jean remarked as she eyed her 4 new t-shirts, 5 pants and new bra and panties. "Don't worry. We still have some money leftover from yesterday. We can loan it." Tabitha smiled. Rogue smiled and grabbed her clothes.

"Well, since we got what we came for, Ah say we head on home an' see if the others are up yet." she remarked as she headed for the checkout, followed by her friends.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: At the mall

1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
"Oh no!" Kitty said when she felt a familiar but unpleasant feeling in her belly. "Girls... I guess I need to eat something."

"Hungry Kitty," Jean asked. "Again?"

"Take her to the buffet. Since last time we're able to eat there for free." Tabitha said.

She and Jean helped Kitty over to the buffet. Rogue looked at Amara.

"You can eat there for free?" She asked.

"Well it has a deal," Amara said. "Eat all you can and you get all meal free for the rest of your life. We went there yesterday. I guess if we go there anyway I might also grab a bite to eat. All that shopping made me hungry."

"Yeah me too." Rogue must admit. "Be careful Perhaps I have a hungry Rogue. Well Kitty was sometimes able to keep hungry Kitty under control by eating enough. I guess we can better do that too. By the way you three can eat there for free. Jean and Ah first need to eat all we can. But with our appetites that shouldn't be a problem."

Kitty waddled as fast as a girl of her size could to the buffet and filled her plate with chicken, burgers, corn dogs. Tabitha wasted no time and filled her own plate. Jean was doubting for a moment. She put a hand on her belly and also grabbed a plate. Rogue and Amara followed. about two minutes later they were all sitting at a table stuffing their faces.

"So you four were all hungry too?" Kitty asked between two large bites of chicken.

"Well I'm not sure we were hungry," Amara said eating large spicy meat balls. "But we could use a bite. Besides if we don't eat enough you'll maybe meet hungry Amara. Or hungry Rogue."

"Well better hope we never have to deal with our hungry versions," Jean said while pushing a huge meatball sub in her mouth. "But perhaps they come out in the near future. But at least we have each other."

Kitty pushed a corn dog in her mouth and realized she felt kind of happy eating with friends who understood her because they almost were going through the same thing."

"But eh Kitty I have a question," Rogue said between eating some chicken fingers. "What is causing those hunger attacks?"

"I don't know. If I knew what was going on don't you think I would have done something about it!" Kitty yelled biting a fat sausage in half.

"That does make perfect sense," Amara said taking a bite of tofu. "But when we're back at the institute we might tell professor X that what happened to Kitty is well also happening to us?"

"What is it?" Jean asked, taking another bite of her sub. "Does it only happen to mutants or not? Also why does it only happen to girls? I mean, can it also happen to boys?"

"I don't know!" Kitty said stuffing fries in her mouth. "I don't know anything more then you. You get hungry you eat more and gain. Besides I'm gonna go get some more."

"Yeah that goes for me too. "Tabitha said.

"And me three." Rogue said.

Jane and Amara looked a moment doubtful at each other. Then they lifted their shoulders and both grabbed their plate for another round.

And after that another. After the third round Amara stopped. Saying she was feeling full. You could see a small sliver of brown flesh just under her shirt.

However the others went for another round. After that Jean and Rogue were also done, rubbing their bloated swollen bellies. But Kitty and Tabitha went for another round before they were full too.

"Man. That was a nice meal," Tabitha said. "I'm really *BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!!!* full."

"Yeah." Kitty added. "Me too. *BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!!!!!*"

"I must admit, feeling this stuffed and eating what you like does feel nice," Rogue admitted. "You don't have to care. *BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!!!!!!*"

"Well you all ate more then me?" Amara said. "I wonder why that is? *BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!* Excuse me."

"Now you Jean, come on." Tabitha said. "We wanna hear you."

"No you girls," Jean said. "It's just not my thing."

Kitty suddenly put her chubby hands on Jean's tight belly and started massaging it, rubbing and pushing. Jean made soft moaning sounds of pleasure. But then suddenly: "*BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!!!!!!* Wow! Did that just came out of me?" Jean asked in disbelieve.

"Congratulations Jean." Tabitha said. "That was a nice one. Now how about we're going back to the institute?"
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: A big buffet

choices: The girls eat a massive lunch made by Storm and the guys
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
When the girls got back to the Institute, the five girls put their bags away and went to see the Professor. They found him in his study. "Um, Professor? Do you got a moment?" Jean asked, knocking on the door.

"Yes, Jean. What can I-" Professor X started, but he stopped upon seeing the bloated Jean, Rogue, Tabitha and Amara with Kitty. "We think what's affectin' Kitty's also happenin' ta us now." Rogue explained, poking her belly and watching her plump finger sink into her pale white flesh.

"Yeah. Amara and Tabitha both ate two really big meals with me yesterday and then we, like, totally had a pig out session last night during our sleepover with Jean and Rogue. Then we had a really big breakfast before we went to the mall and now we, like, totally had another feast at the buffet." Kitty added.

"But for some reason, I can only hold so much before my tummy hurts." Amara added, rubbing her ball shaped belly.

"We were wondering if maybe it only affects mutants. Or at least girl ones. I don't know if it can affect the guys or not." Jean added, stifling another burp after saying this.

"I honestly do not know the answer myself, Jean. It may only effect female mutants since Scott and the other boys have been eating normal meals and snacks. Though, given Kurt's appetite, I wouldn't be surprised if this was affecting him as well." Professor X smiled.

The girls giggled at the remark. Kurt was well known for his own appetite throughout the mansion.

"Girls, I believe for the time being, we may have to double your own meals like we've done with Kitty. I will talk with Hank and we will try to solve this as soon as possible." Professor X smiled assuredly.

"Okay. Thanks Professor." Jean smiled as she and the other girls left.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Back at the institute

choices: All five have a terrible tummy ache
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
"So this sucks," Rogue said lying on her bed.

All five girls were sitting in the room of Rogue and Kitty. wondering what to do now.

"Well at least we have each other," Jean tried to cheer them up. "It would really suck if you would be the only one. No offense Kitty."

"Some taken," She mumbled. "But you're right. It does suck. But well at least you accepted me. It would be worse if you wouldn't accept me because of my appetite."

"Come on," Jean said," Of course we accepted you. Everyone here has problems being accepted because we're mutants. Burt we're still people. In a way. So you had something that was different. Just like we are also a bit different. But we look out for each other. And now we know how you feel."

"I admit it does feel better not being the only one with this problem," Kitty said. "Else it would really suck."

The next moment there was a knock on the door and Scott looked inside

"I hope I'm not interrupting but, there's a huge lunch down stairs. So if you're hungry…"

The next moment four girls almost ran over him except for Kitty who just faded though the floor. When she saw what was on the table she was having trouble not to drool. The table was covered with fries, hams, bowls of chili, chicken, sausages, hamburgers, fried bacon with eggs on bread, spaghetti with sauce and meatballs, steaks, baked potatoes, fried chicken and much more.

The others soon entered and looked at all the food. It only took a few seconds before all girl started eating. Well it wasn't really eating. The girls were more devouring the food like a bunch of starved animals. All four totally forget to use manners.

They attacked the food like a pack of wolves and devoured the food like a couple of pigs. Kitty pushed fries in her mouth with two hands, while Amara devoured a whole ham. Tabitha and Rogue tore into a turkey that Storm was bringing in.

Jean in the meantime ate the fried bacon with eggs on bread. Pushing it into her mouth causing it to smear yellow egg all around her mouth. Not only yellow egg. Kitty had grease smeared all around her mouth. Rogue who after the Turkey was gone (what was soon gone by the way, only leaving a couple of bones), started on the hamburgers smearing grease and sauce around her mouth.

Amara devoured another ham smearing more grease around her mouth as well. Tabitha covered hot dogs with mayonnaise and Ketchup and both sauces were smeared around her face dropping on her shirt. It was the same with the shirts of the other girls who were covered in food stains. Kitty stuffed so much food in her bulging cheeks she looked like a chipmunk. All the girls were focused on eating food and didn't notice the boys.

"Looks like Hungry Kitty is busy again," Scott said.

"Well Hungry Kitty is but not she alone," Kurt said. "Also Hungry Tabitha, Hungry Rogue, Hungry Amara and… isn't that Hungry… Jean?"

"What?" Scott yelled and looked back at the table seeing his Jean slurping spaghetti like she hadn't eaten in days. The extra weight around her waist told otherwise.

"I believe I saw eating like this once in a documentary," Kurt said.

"Was that about girls?" Scott asked.

"Er no. I believe it was about Komodo dragons."

"Wow," Evan said. "Auntie O told me that some other girls were also having big appetite's but this is..."

"Hey anyway they're still our friends," Jamie said. "We need to help them and be there for them."

"Do you girls taste the food?" Storm asked a bit irritated, since she put a lot of work into making the food.

"Oh yeah. It's delicious," Amara said guzzling down a bowl of chili.

"Best food I ever tasted," Kitty managed to say between bites of sausages and baked potatoes.

Next moment there was a sound in the hallway.

"What is that?" Evan asked.

"New recruits," Scott said.

Indeed a group of new recruits walked in but stopped when the saw the show of five girls devouring a entire feast.

"I wonder if there's any food left for us with them around?" Jubilee said.

The four girls were finally able to finish everything until the last crumb. Except for what was smeared around their mouth and what was on their shirts. All four girls had swollen bloated bellies and were softly moaning.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Five fat and hungry girls

choices: The girls enjoy a large dinner and Tabitha, Jean and Kitty have a large eat off
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
After a few minutes, Kitty's belly let out an almost deafening gurgle as her hands immediately flew to it, causing her to clutch it in agony. "Guys... I, like, totally don't feel so good." She moaned, turning apple green.

"Me too.." Jean groaned, her own face turning pale green as her tummy let out an equally big gurgle. Suddenly, Tabitha's own belly rumbled and gurgled as her face took on a deep green hue. "I think I'm gonna be sick too." she groaned, clutching her belly.

After a moment, both Rogue and Amara also went green and their bellies started to rumble and gurgle. "Ah think either Ah ate too much or Ah ate it too quickly." Rogue managed to moan before letting out an ominous burp, her cheeks bulging threateningly.

"You guys gonna be okay?" Bobby asked. "Yeah. Like, I think we totally just need to *URP!* digest." Kitty moaned, letting out a big burp of her own as her tummy rumbled even more, causing it to jiggle like a big bowl of Jell-O.

"Or explode." Amara groaned before a thunderous belch of her own escaped her lips, causing her tongue to flop out of her mouth.

Without another word, the four girls slowly managed to stand up and started waddling to Kitty and Rogue's room. Jean, Tabitha and Amara were too full to try and make it back to their rooms right now so they decided to rest in said room.

"Man, I feel like my belly's gonna blow." Jean moaned as she laid on her back, rubbing her large tummy in agony. "Me too. I can't believe how much we ate." Amara groaned, laying on her large belly before quickly switching to her back when it became apparent her belly was too upset to lay on.

"Really, Amara? We just *burp* ate two big meals *belch* before this *hiccup* and now *urp* you're *hic-urp* in *burp* disbelief over *hic* how much *belch* we ate?" Tabitha moaned as she lay beside Rogue, who was also laying on the floor, her tongue lolling out of her mouth as she rubbed her now large pale tummy.

"Like, I'm sick to my belly but I gotta admit, that Storm's cooking was totally the best yet!" Kitty smiled despite her stomach pains from beside Jean. "Yeah. Ah've never had a turkey as awesome as that one." Rogue agreed with a slight smile herself.

"And those hot dogs and burgers..." Tabitha agreed, licking the remaining ketchup, mustard and mayo off her face and lips.

"Please stop!" Amara moaned, clutching her belly. "My bellyache's bad enough as it is without you guys mentioned all that, admittingly yummy, food!"

"Sorry, 'Mara. We forgot." Tabitha smiled. At that moment, there was a knock on the door. "Come in." Kitty called.

The door opened and in came Scott, Jamie, Kurt, Spyke, and Storm. "How're you guys feeling now?" Scott asked. "Still stuffed like turkeys before Thanksgiving." Jean replied, wincing slightly as she sat up despite her still sore tummy.

"What do you guys want?" Rogue asked as she, Kitty, Amara and Tabitha also managed to heave themselves up into sitting positions.

"Vell, ve wanted to see if we could give you belly rubs to help calm your stomachs down." Kurt explained. "Uh... sure." Jean said as the others nodded.

So, the five set to work. Scott took Jean for obvious reasons. Jean moaned in delight as he gently rubbed and pressed on her tummy. It was so soothing and relaxing that Jean caught herself starting to doze off.

Kurt offered to rub Tabitha's belly. As he did, Tabitha sighed in contentment as his three fingered hands gently went over her large gut, occasionally causing her to giggle as his fur tickled her belly.

Storm, wearing gloves, covered Rogue. The southern goth moaned happily as Ororo's hands lovingly stroked and pressed her pale, marshmallow belly while she relaxed.

Jamie took Kitty. He seemed a bit embarrassed to be doing so since Kitty was a few years older than him and he'd briefly harbored a crush on her earlier this year. Kitty noticed and smiled kindly.

"Like, it's totally okay Jamie. I don't mind you rubbing my tummy." she told him. Still blushing furiously, Jamie slowly began rubbing her large belly. Kitty sighed in blessed delight as he did so.

Nearby, Spyke was rubbing Amara's large brown belly. All four girls sighed in relief as they felt their bellyaches fading away.

Then, Kitty got a weird expression on her face. "Are you okay?" Jamie asked, upon noticing this. "Yeah. Like I just feel like I'm gonna..." Kitty started when a giant, smelly fart escaped from her big butt. *BLURRRAAAAPPPPP!!*

"Whoa K-Girl! Stink city!" Spyke yelped as the others all looked at her in surprise. "Like, sorry!" Kitty blushed.

Then, Tabitha got a smirk on her face. "That's pretty good, Kitty, but not as good as this!" And then, she let out a bigger fart.
*POOOOOOOOOURRRRRPPPPTTTT!!!*

"I guess that's vhy we call you 'Boom-Boom'!" Kurt joked as he fanned the stench away as Tabitha laughed.

"That's kids' stuff, Tabitha! Here's how a real southern gal does it!" Rogue jeered with a smirk as she also unleashed a doozy of a fart. *BBRRRRAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!*

"Woah! I didn't know the Rogue had it in her!" Bobby remarked as they all stared at Rogue. "Like, totally awesome fart, Rogue!" Kitty giggled as even Storm looked impressed.

"That's nothing! Check this out!" Amara smiled as she started to strain and grunt. After a few moments, *BBBBBBLLLLLOORRRPPPPPPPTTTT!* A pretty impressive fart escaped her rear end.

"Okay, Jean! It's down to you!" Tabitha giggled. "Jean, you don't have to-" Scott started when Jean smirked and began straining.
She strained so much, her face went as red as her hair.

Then, *PPPPPPPPOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT!* Jean let out the biggest fart any of the X-Kids or Storm had ever heard. They could smell everything Jean had eaten since that morning.

"Oh mein gott, Jean!" Kurt coughed as the stench reached his nostrils. "Jeez! Not cool, man!" Spyke agreed, plugging his nose. "Wow! Jean, what did you eat this mornin'? Baked beans?!?!?" Rogue agreed, coughing and hacking like the others.

"Sorry. I probably should've mentioned this sooner, but chili tends to make me gassy." Jean apologized with a smile.

"So we've gathered!" Tabitha wheezed in amusement.

After Scott and the others left to get some air fresheners and other air cleaning things, the five girls laughed.

"Man, Jean! Like, I totally thought my farts smelled yucky at times but yours are totally the bomb!" Kitty giggled.

"Yeah. Who'd think Miss. Perfect has a slobby side?" Rogue joked.

"Could you teach me that for when school starts up again?" Tabitha asked.

"Sure. At least our bellyaches are gone. Guess I'm both a big burper and a big farter." Jean giggled along with the others.

Then Kitty felt something wet in her pants. "Um guys? Like, I totally don't know about you... but I think I totally pooped my pants." she squeaked. "Yeah. Ah think mah fart did that ta me too." Rogue agreed as the others nodded sheepishly.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: All five have a terrible tummy ache

choices: Follow the boys preparing for the bet
The girls ate all the food (swollen bellies)
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
All five girls cleaned them selves first also whipping of their mouth and took new clothes. New pant and shirts since their shirts were covered with food stains. Jean an Rogue at least now had a good reason to show their new clothes. The fitted their fatter bodies perfectly and looked pretty good at them.

"Those clothes look really good at you," Kitty said and yawned. "All that eating made me tired. Perhaps I take a small nap."

"I believe Amara beat you to it," Jean said with a smile.

Indeed the dark girl was already fast asleep softly breathing.

"I must admit I'm sleepy too." Tabitha said. "Oh. Jean is also gone."

A minute later all girls lay passed out in the room. All five were deep asleep while their bellies gurgled and groaned digesting their huge meals, adding more fat to their bodies. But while the girls were in dreamland, they were thinking about one thing. What was for dinner?

"I think it's time for you to wake up."

Kitty opened her eyes and saw Amara standing over her. She blinked a few times and looked at her alarm clock.

"What? Is it 5:55 already!?!? It's almost time for dinner!" Kitty yelled waking up all the others.

"Dinner sounds great." Rogue said. "I'm starving."

"Me too," Amara said. "That's what was waking me up. That and the rumbling of my and your tummies. But I guess they have a big meal prepared for us. I can smell something delicious."

Tabitha put her nose in the air and sniffed. "She's right. I smell it too. Let's go."

The girls ran down stairs except for Kitty who like normally faded right to the floor and was first to reach the table. Kitty looked with big eyes at the feast before her. The table was covered with mainly junk food. Pizza's, fries, burgers, corn dogs, hot dogs, croquette's, minced meat hot dogs, milkshakes and other stuff that was dripping from the grease. Kitty couldn't help it and drooled a little.

Scott entered while he was chewing on something.

"Oh you noticed. Go ahead. The others already ate so…"

He didn't need to say anything more. All girls started to attack the food like if they hadn't eaten in days. Soon their cheeks were so stuffed with food they looked like chipmunks. It was almost unbelievable. The girls started stuffing their faces. Kitty crammed about five corn dogs in her mouth at once. Jean did the same with the hamburgers. Tabitha took a pizza and was spinning it on her finger taking bites out it and soon the pizza was gone. Amara stuffed croissants in her mouth. She was going pretty fast but slower then the other four. Rogue wolfed down hot dogs.

Scott looked from a distance. He was afraid one of them might choke and he need to help them. But Lucky for him they were always able to swallow the food down without choking.

Kitty placed two pizza's on top of each other and ate them like they were a huge cookie. Tabitha stuffed several minced meat hot dogs in her mouth and the ends were hanging out of her mouth. The girls were eating so fast you would ask yourself if they tasted the food. However they seemed to like it. Amara shoved hamburgers inside with both hands. Rogue grabbed one of the plates of fries and emptied the plate in her mouth. All girl were eating like there was no tomorrow. At this moment they were all taken over by their hungry versions. Kitty smashed her head right into the fries almost inhaling them. Amara stuffed herself full with corn dogs while Tabitha started on the croissants.

"Well. I thought girls were always so worried about their figure," Evan said. "But it seems like those girls only think about filling their tummies. Can tummies pop?"

"I wonder who can eat most." Jamie said.

"Well I guess Kitty," Evan said. "She already had those attacks before the others."

"True but don't you remember Jean's fart?" Kurt asked. "I bet she also burps louder then the others so she probably also eats the most."

"Well I think Tabitha is wilder and is most likely to let herself go." Jamie mumbled.

"Rogue? Probably, but I don't think she eats more then the others." Kurt said. "She started at same time with Jean but...

"Amara? I don't think so." Evan said. "For some reason the hunger seems to have less effect on her then the others."

"Hard to say since we don't know how much each girl eats," Kurt said. "We should split the food in five equal parts and sees who eats the most. But I still think it's Jean."

"Wanna bet on that?" Evan asked.

"Oh sure I'll take that bet," Jamie said
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Junk food dinner

choices: The girls all tie, forcing the boys to pamper them and do each other's chores.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
"Alright. How 'bout this? We'll each bet on the girls. Whoever's girl eats the most gets to hand their chores over to the other four losers for a month." Spyke offered with a smile.

"I'm in!" Jamie said promptly. "Me too." Kurt smiled. "I'll take that bet!" Iceman agreed. They turned to Scott. "Well, Fearless leader?" Kurt asked. Scott was quiet for a moment, then sighed and nodded. "But we better tell the girls first so they don't feel like trophies." He advised. "Yeah, good call." Evan agreed.

The guys slowly came up to the five girls as they took a break. "Um, guys... we were wondering if you'd like to have a contest." Kurt said. Kitty, Tabitha, Jean, Rogue and Amara all looked at each other.

"Okay. What's the challenge?" Jean asked. "We're wondering who can eat the most out of all five of you." Spyke explained. "So we decided to have each of you eat a pile of food. Whoever eats the most will win the bet." Scott added.

"Like, what do we get?" Kitty asked. "Well, if one of us wins, we get out of chores for a month and the losers take on the winner's chores as well as their own." Bobby explained. "What about us?" Rogue asked. "What'd you girls like?" Jamie asked.

The five girls were quiet for a moment as they thought about it. "Like, I'd totally love belly rubs while being fed by the losers and getting out of our own chores." Kitty smiled. "Oh that sounds heavenly." agreed Tabitha as she pictured her large belly being rubbed and pressed on.

"That does sound cool, Kitty." Jean agreed as she pictured Scott feeding her numerous grapes, bananas and other foods while rubbing her own boulder sized tummy.

Amara and Rogue also nodded their agreement. "What about the losers of the eatin' challenge?" Rogue asked. "Well, aside from a likely tummy ache, the losers won't need to do extra chores." Scott suggested. The girls eyed each other again.

"Like, I'm totally in!" Kitty cheered. "Me too." Amara smiled. "I'm game!" Tabitha whooped. "Ah guess it'd be interestin'." Rogue shrugged. "Okay, it's a deal, Scott." Jean beamed.

"Alright. Let's choose the girls!" Spyke smiled. Scott picked Jean while Kurt picked Tabitha, Spyke took Rogue, Bobby picked Amara and Jamie chose Kitty.

"Awesome! Now let's bring on the grub!" Tabitha shouted. Quickly, the guys set to work bringing out the remaining food.

Soon, there was five large piles of junk food on the table. They consisted of doughnuts, cupcakes, regular cakes, pie, ice cream sandwiches, pizza, hamburgers, chocolate bars, hot dogs, corn dogs and cinnamon rolls.

"Alright. Everybody's clear on the rules, right?" Scott asked. The girls and guys nodded. "Like, we can only eat from our own piles and we can't leave any crumbs." Kitty smiled. "Yeah. And we also can't hide any food in our pockets or down our shirts." Tabitha added as Amara, Jean and Rogue all nodded in agreement.

"Right. Just wanted to make sure." Scott smiled as he readied his stopwatch. The girls grinned as they tied napkins around their necks and got ready for the upcoming pig fest.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Follow the boys preparing for the bet

choices: First give the girls belly rubs then decide who has won
It's a tie so no one has won and no one needs to do anything
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
The next moment the girl started. What the girls did wasn't eating. It was devouring. They ate like starved animals.

Kitty grabbed a doughnut's on in each hand and stuffed them in her mouth. She barely chewed them once before she stuffed another two in her mouth. Tabitha noticed this and didn't wanna be left behind, and did the same. This didn't go unnoticed by the other three girls who also tried to eat faster.

"I'm not sure if it's wise if they eat fast. It may sooner cause a tummy ache," Kurt said.

"True," Scott said. "You're free to tell them. But do you really think they will listen to you?"

"I bet that when you're sitting on the table they come at you they start eating and after that there's nothing left from you except a skeleton," Evan said with a smile. "That would make a great horror movie."

The girls were done with the doughnuts and Kitty and Jean already started on the cupcakes. Jean used her powers to put ten cupcakes on top of each other and stuff them in her mouth. Kitty just rolled onto her back, opened her mouth and stuffed cupcakes into it. The girls stuffed them in so fast they had barely time to chew the food but they didn't care right now. Amara was a bit slower then the others. But she as well was starting eating the cupcakes very fast, Just like Rogue and Tabitha who were both stuffing cupcakes in their mouth with both hands. All the girls had bulging cheeks what made the look like a bunch of chipmunks. Chipmunks the size and appetite of hippo's and eating like pigs.

Kitty grabbed a large apple pie holding it in both hands eating it like a huge cookie. No matter how fast she was eating she seemed to enjoy it. The other five also reached the pie's. Jane grabbed one and took a few bites and stopped. She looked a bit worried. She opened her mouth again and : "BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!! Oh that feels better."

Tabitha smiled. After eating two pies she also opened her mouth: "BUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!!!! Hear that Jean? That's how you burp."

Rogue put no attention to this. She was too busy eating. Amara as well. But she didn't think she would be able to win. All this time she was eating slower and less then the other girls. But she wasn't planning to lose this bet. She wanted those belly rubs more then anything else. So she stuffed another pie in her mouth.

Kitty reached the ice cream sandwiches. She first held her head back and: "*BUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!!!!!!!!!!!* That's how you burp and…" She bent down and *POOOOORRRRRRRRRPT!!!* Let out a huge fart. After that she started stuffing ice cream sandwiches in her mouth. So much at once she could barely close her mouth. Rogue was able to stuff twelve ice cream sandwiches at once in her gullet.

"If they're gonna eat the ice cream this fast they gonna have a tummy and a head ache." Jamie remarked with concern.

Amara saw the ice cream. She remembered what Jean did with the cupcakes and used her own power to melt the sandwiches just a tiny bit so they went down easier.

Rogue suddenly opened her mouth and "*BUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRP!!!!!!!*" But at the same time: "*BRRRRRRAAAAAAP!!!!!*" A loud fart escaped her rear.

"Wow," Jamie said. "Like my grandmother told me when you can burp and fart at the same time you have no soul!"

"That's nonsense," Bobby said. "However…." He grabbed a towel and tied it around his nose and mouth.

"Yeah good idea," Kurt agreed. "He disappeared and appeared a few seconds later. with towels for everyone.

Jean suddenly went sitting up straight and: "*BLUUURRRP!!!*" Then she opened her mouth: "*BUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRP!!!!!!*" The next moment she grabbed a pizza and tried to stuff as much in her mouth if was possible. Amara put two slices on top of each other and ate them that way. Suddenly she paused for a moment.

"*BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!* Did that just came out of me?" she asked surprised.

All girl had undone their buttons and had undone (if they had one) their belts. There was grease, ice cream and frosting around their mouths and as well some stains on their clothes but the kept eating. After the pizza's were gone Rogue reached the hamburgers and corn dogs. Rogue stuffed hamburgers in her mouth one by one before swallowing them. Kitty and Tabitha tried to stuff as much in their mouth as possible. Jean used her power to make the food just float to her mouth and eat it. Amara grabbed one hand full of corn dogs and another full of hamburgers and stuffed it in her mouth at once.

"Good thing not one of them has elastic skin." Kurt said.

Amara crawled further. Suddenly she stopped and and: "POOOOOOOOOTTT!!! That does feel better. I can still fit more in my tummy."

The next thing were cinnamon rolls. Most of them started stuffing them in their mouth several at a time. Tabitha was smarter and just grabbed the plate and poured all cinnamon rolls in her mouth, making her cheeks bulgy and lumpy and started on the next food. The other four paused for a moment wondering why they didn't think about that. All four grabbed their plates and poured all cinnamon rolls in their mouth. All five girls were burping and farting then they started on the hot dogs. Each of them were heavily covered with mayonnaise, ketchup and mustard. After that, the girls started stuffing as much into their mouths as was possible.

*BUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRP!!!!!!!!!!!!* *POOOORRRRRT!!!!* *BRAAAAAAP!!!* *BUUUUUUURRRRRRRP!!!!!!* Were all sounds that could be heard from all five girls as they ate the hot dogs and started on the chocolate bars which went in pretty easy after all the other food. Especially for Amara who just melted them and drank the melted stuff.

"Not one of them's stopped," Evan said.

"What does that mean?" Jamie asked.

"I'm not sure but I guess we find out soon."

Amara got a head lead thanks to her ability to melt the chocolate, but now came the cakes. 5 four layer chocolate cakes. Kitty wasted no time and smashed her head right into it inhaling it. Tabitha just broke lumps of it stuffing them in her mouth as fast if she could. Jean made the cake float over to her as she ate it in mid-air. Rogue went over to the cakes on hand and knees and started eating like a pig. Then a few seconds later at the same time five huge long belches could be heard and that was it. All the food was gone.

The five girls looked at each other. All, of them had a green face. All five were burping and farting and a lot of moaning. Grease, sauce, frosting and other stuff around their mouths. Their bellies bloated, swollen and hard as a rock. Their shirts covered in food stains and some clothes started to rip at the seams.

The guys slowly walked over to them.

"Who won?" Kurt asked.

"I believe it was a tie," Scott said.

"So what happens now?"
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Eating contest

choices: The girls eat a big breakfast and Professor X learns the cause of the hunger
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
"Well, since it was a tie, I don't think anything happens now." Scott replied after thinking about it. "So, we still have to do our own chores?" Jamie asked in dismay.

"I'm afraid so, little dude." Bobby said with a understanding smile. "But it was pretty awesome to see you guys eat like that." Spyke offered to the girls with a smile.

"Glad you *urp* liked *hic* it Evan *burp*." Jean groaned in between burps and a hiccup as she kept rubbing her sore tummy, still green as a lettuce leaf.

"Oh god. My tummy, like, totally hurts!" Kitty whimpered in agony as she rubbed the aching orb of flesh. "Mine too." Amara moaned as she tried hard not to vomit as she burped ominously.

"Mah belly's so stuffed, I think Ah'd explode if Ah try an' put one more thing into mah mouth." Rogue moaned in agreement as she laid against the wall so she was sitting up.

"I'm with you, Rogue. After that grub fest, I don't think I could eat another bite until breakfast." Tabitha groaned as she slowly messaged her jumbo tummy with both hands.

None of the guys said anything for a moment as they watched their female teammates burp, groan and moan in agony. They felt bad for their friends and wanted to do something that would cheer them up.

Jamie had an idea. "Hey, why don't we at least give them a belly rub? That helped at lunch when they had bellyaches." He offered. "Worth a shot." Scott agreed as Kurt, Spyke and Bobby nodded.

So, the five guys went over to their girl and knelt down. "*Urp* Scot? What *belch* are *hic* you *burp* *urp* doing?" Jean moaned as she felt her boyfriend's hands slowly start to rub and press her giant belly. Slowly, she felt its hardness fading and becoming soft again, lessening her pain.

"We're giving you guys belly rubs to help with the pain. It was Jamie's idea." Scott explained with a smile. Sure enough, Kurt was rubbing Boom-Boom's belly, Jamie was gently rubbing and pressing Kitty's while Bobby took care of Amara.

Evan, meanwhile, was gently messaging Rogue's orb of a belly while wearing cleaning gloves. "Feeling better?" He asked as he kept rubbing, pressing and pinching her belly.

"Oh mah god yes..." Rogue moaned in relief as the hard rock feeling in her tummy went away, replaced with soft squishy blubber.

"Totally." Kitty agreed as she smiled at the blushing furiously Jamie while he kept working away on her belly.

"Soooo gooooodddd..." Tabitha moaned in bliss as Kurt's furry fingers kept stroking hers gently.

*I agree." Amara smiled as Bobby's fingers ran over her brown skin, partially chilly to help dull the pain in her belly.

Then, all five girls' tummies rumbled loudly. "Like, now what?" Kitty asked nervously.

The guys all knew. "Not again!" Kurt groaned as the X-Boys quickly retied the towels around their noses just in time.

After a few more minutes, *PPPPPOORRRRRRTTTTTTTT!!!* Kitty let out another big fart. "Now I totally feel better." Kitty sighed in relief as the pain in her hippo belly lessened greatly after that big toot.

Then, "That's not fartin', Kit. This here is fartin'," Rogue smirked as her belly rumbled again.*BBBBLLLLOOOORRRRRPPPPP!!* A bigger fart slipped from her booty as she smirked again. Kitty playfully stuck her tongue out at her roommate, best friend and teammate.

"Both of you guys can't fart. Like Blue said this afternoon, this is why they call me 'Boom-Boom'!" Tabitha laughed as she strained hard. *FFFFFFFBBBBBBBBRRRRRRTTTPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!* Out came a fairly decent fart from her pants.

"Please! I thought we did this hours ago, Tabitha!" Amara giggled as she took a deep breath and strained hard. After a few seconds.

*PPPPPPOOOOOORRRRRAAAAAAPPPPPPTTTTTTTTTTT!!!!!!* A big, long fart escaped her large butt.

"Once again I see I gotta teach you girls how to make a stink!" Jean laughed as she began straining very hard. "Like, plug your nose!" Kitty shouted, quickly pinching hers closed as Rogue quickly grabbed a clothespin and clamped it on hers while Tabitha and Amara both tied some spare napkins around their noses just in time.

*BBBBBLLLLLLOOORRRRRRRAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!* Jean's fart was big, loud and really long. Soon, the entire dining room smelled awful. "Open-ack- a window!" Kurt choked. Even though he and the other X-Guys still had their masks on, Jean's stench was still able to get in their noses. Scott quickly ran over and threw the windows open, letting fresh air in.

"Aw, man! Jean, what did you eat last round! There wasn't any chili!" Rogue groaned in disgust. "I guess it was all the grease and stuff that can do it too." Jean shrugged with a smile.

"Feel better now?" Scott asked with a slight smile. "Yeah." Jean smiled as she and the others stood up. "Good. See you girls later." Spyke smiled as he and the other guys left.

"Well, that was quite a gorge." Rogue smiled as she rubbed her now completely soft tummy. "Yeah. But, like, I think I totally pooped my pants again with my farts." Kitty blushed as she felt that now familiar wet and smelly feeling.

"Not again!" Rogue groaned as she looked in her pants and saw the same thing as Jean, Amara and Tabitha all discover this mess in their panties and pants as well. "Like, maybe we should totally buy plus-sized diapers for teens." Kitty suggested, causing the girls to giggle at the idea.
