15521231.content: What kind of foods does she enjoy?
15521231.title: Yes

choices: Kitty goes back the next day
155212312.content:
Kitty was walking towards the Xavier Institute after a day of shopping at the Bayville Mall. As she walked, she noticed an old fashioned bake shop. Curious, Kitty decided to check it out.

As she entered, Kitty saw it was very old fashioned on the inside. It had old chairs and tables that, despite their age, were still in very good shape. Though there weren't many people, despite it being the middle of the day, there was a fairly decent sized line.

Kitty got in line and looked at the glass case. There were cupcakes and slices of normal cakes for fairly decent prices. After a few minutes, Kitty's turn came. A plump redhaired girl around Kitty's age was working the counter.

"Hi and welcome to Schulz Bakery, where we've been pleasing customers for 100 years. My name's Brittney. How may I help you?" asked the girl in a cheerful voice. Kitty looked at the options again and decided.

"Like, I'll take one of the Choco Creamed cupcakes." Kitty smiled. Brittney nodded and pulled one of said cupcakes out. It was a large chocolate cupcake with chocolate cream filling inside and white frosting and colored sprinkles on it.

"That'll be three dollars please," Brittney smiled. Kitty handed over the money, telling Brittney to keep the change. As she left, Kitty unwrapped the cupcake and took a bite. Upon contact, her taste buds erupted into singing. It was basically the best thing she'd ever eaten. Kitty wolfed down the cupcake quickly and licked her fingers to make sure she didn't miss any crumbs, frosting or filling.

"Like, that was totally the best cupcake I've ever eaten! I've totally gotta hit that place again!" Kitty smiled, letting out a gentle burp before giving her fingers one last lick to make sure she'd gotten all the frosting filling and crumbs.
155212312.title: Cake

1552123121.content:
Kitty went straight to Schulz Bakery the next day since she was dying to try more of their cakes. Besides, it was the closest shop to the mall anyway. As she entered the shop, it was empty of people, which Kitty guessed was fairly common since it was pretty early.

What Kitty didn't know was that she'd put on a little weight from the cupcake yesterday. It wasn't noticeable, ten pounds at the most, bringing her weight from 90 lbs. to 100. Instead of Brittney, who had worked the counter yesterday, there was another girl. She was slightly plumper than Brittney and had ginger hair pulled into a ponytail.

"Hi. I'm Rachel. Welcome ta Schulz Bakery. What c'n I get a'fore ye, lass?" she asked in a Scottish accent, smiling and showing her double chin. Kitty looked over all the cakes before deciding.

"Like, I'll totally take the chocolate cake," Kitty said, pointing to the cake behind the case. "Okay. We be havin' a special deal today. Buy one an' get four a'fore free," said Rachel smiling.

Kitty thought that was a weird offer but took it anyway. She sat down at a table and started eating all four cakes, leaving no crumbs. She was soon licking globs of chocolate off her fingers as Rachel came up to her.

"Woah. Ye really enjoyed the cakes, didn't ye, lass?" Rachel remarked, surprised that Kitty had managed to eat all four cakes.

"Yeah. They were, like, totally amazing. Like, I'm Kitty by the way." Kitty smiled as she and Rachel shook hands.

"Well, we be havin' a job opening for a new taste tester. The owner's takin' interviews in the back." Rachel shrugged.

"Like, that'd totally be awesome." Kitty smiled, figuring she could use the extra money. With a quick nod, Rachel went to the back before returning a few minutes later.

"Miss. Schulz'll see ye in the back," Rachel said, helping Kitty up. What Kitty didn't know was that now she had ballooned from 100 pounds to 110, giving her a chubby belly due to the four cakes adding ten pounds to her weight.
1552123121.title: Kitty goes back the next day

choices: Kitty's friends start to notice something
Dani's next phase of the plan
15521231211.content:
Dani Schulz was in her office, thinking over her plans. She was a attractive 20 something year old woman with long brown hair. She had only taken the bakery over a year ago from her late parents. However, more modern bakeries were getting the attention nowadays. But, Dani had developed a plan to stop this. "I'm so close to my plans for world dominance. Once everyone gets addicted to my cakes, they'll all be too fat to stop me! It'll teach them to ignore my family's business. " She smiled.

Her thoughts were interrupted by a knock on the door from Rachel. "What is it, Rachel?" Dani asked with a fake smile as the young girl waddled in with Kitty behind.

"Hey, Dani. This' Kitty. She's here about the position." Rachel said, pointing to Kitty before leaving the two. Dani took a moment to look Kitty over. It was clear she'd enjoyed the bakery's cakes, judging from her chubby belly and the chocolate smeared around her mouth.

"Hi miss..." Kitty began but was cut off by Dani waving her hand, hitting her dark brown hair.

"Please, call me Dani. I hate the whole formal thing." Dani said, rolling her eyes with a smile.

"First I'm gonna ask you some questions and you just answer them to see if you get the job." Dani added with a smile. In reality, it wasn't a food taste tester she was looking for, but someone who would promote her cakes and it looked like Kitty fit the bill, but she needed to make it look like an actual interview.

"So, first question: Have you ever worked in a bakery before?" Dani asked.

"Well, no. But, like, I totally make cupcakes sometimes." Kitty said, a little nervously. Dani just gave her a warm smile.

"Very good. When would you be able to work?" asked Dani, tapping her fingers on the desk.

"Like, I can totally come in everyday after school. I usually have a ton of free time then." Kitty offered. That was true. Aside from missions and training, Kitty usually did have everyday after school free.

"Excellent. Now for the final and most important question: How do you like our cakes?" Dani asked, even though she already knew.

"Like, they're totally awesome! The best cakes I've ever had!" Kitty smiled, rubbing her chubby belly in delight.

"Ok. I think I've heard enough. Welcome aboard." Dani said, standing up with Kitty as they shook hands. Kitty was feeling pretty proud about getting the best job in the world in her mind.

"Like, when do I start?" Kitty asked, ready to start eating some of those yummy cakes.

"Right now." Said Dani, quickly calling Rachel, who waddled in carrying Kitty's new uniform. It consisted of a red t-shirt, a red visor hat and stretchy black pants. Rachel was also holding what looked like a thick diaper. Kitty grabbed both, looking at Dani in confusion.

"Oh, I forgot to mention that all employees are required to wear diapers so we can have 100% of our employees' time." Dani explained. Kitty nodded after a moment and ducked into the bathroom to change. A second later, she came out in her new work clothes, the t-shirt already stretched tightly across her belly. "You look perfect." Dani smiled.

"Thanks. Like, I totally can't wait to try more cakes." Kitty smiled as her belly rumbled, wanting more cake.

"Alright. Go take a seat near the counter. I'll have Rachel bring you the first batch." Dani ordered. Kitty nodded and walked to the front. Dani went to the kitchen, where six cupcakes with pink frosting were all ready for Kitty. Dani then injected a brainwashing serum into them. It would take a few weeks to kick in, but she could wait. "Rachel, the first batch is ready." Dani called.

"Got it boss." said Rachel as she grabbed the tray and took it out to Kitty, who was waiting patiently. "Here you go." said Rachel, setting the tray down.

"Thanks." Kitty said as she began to eat. She ate cupcake after cupcake until they were all gone. Then, Rachel brought out four large chocolate birthday cakes, with Kitty eating them all up. She was so focused on eating that she didn't notice she pooped her diaper as she sat back, rubbing her full, large belly.

A few weeks later...
15521231211.title: The interview

choices: Rogue and Jean manage to snap Kitty out of it
155212312111.content:
A few weeks had passed since Kitty got the job and there had been quiet a few changes with her. The first thing was that she had completely fallen under Dani's brainwashing. Also, her size had increased quite a bit. Her belly was becoming as round as the rest of her, causing her to resemble a sumo wrestler. Her shirt stretched over the large tummy, which now looked like a wrecking ball.

She'd also been going around school, telling everybody about this amazing bakery. This led to quite a few students and teachers becoming fat. With the exception of the other X-Kids, everybody was becoming bigger. Kitty walked into class late due to finishing her third cake of the morning. "Like, sorry I'm late." Kitty said, taking her seat, causing it to crack under her diapered girth.

"It's fine," said the teacher, not really caring as she stuffed a cupcake into her mouth, causing a button on her shirt to pop off. Kitty then pulled out a large cheesecake with whipped cream from her bag and started eating it. This concerned her friends, who'd noticed her increased size. Kurt decided to speak up.

"Hey Kitty, maybe you should cut back on the cakes. You're getting pretty big." Kurt said, leaning from his desk and poking her in her large belly. "Like, I totally have no idea what you're talking about. Besides, tasting the cakes is really good money." Kitty said. Thanks to Dani's brainwashing, Kitty was oblivious to her weight unless ordered otherwise. After that, the X-Kids gave up.

During lunchtime, the X-Kids were sitting together except for Kitty, who was off doing something. All the X-Kids were eating their lunch while the rest of the school was eating cakes.

"Something wrong's going on here. Kitty's been getting really fat since she started working at that bakery and she's acting really strange." Scott said with a concerned expression on his face.

"Yeah and everybody else is getting fat too. Even the football players and cheerleaders." Jean said, nodding to the table where said students were sitting. The jocks did look fat and the cheerleaders were rather chubby. In fact, everybody else in the cafeteria also ranged from chubby to fat size wise.

"This has gotta be connected ta Kitty an' that bakery." Rogue said with a thoughtful look on her face as she crunched her apple.

"Man, I dunno 'bout you guys, but I think we should investigate that bakery an' see what's happenin' with the K-girl." Spyke suggested with concern for his fellow younger X-Man, earning nods from the others. The rest of the day went by fairly normally, aside from the fact that Kitty was absent for that time.

After school found them sneaking to Schulz bakery, which was now a factory due to increase in demand for their cakes. All five snuck into the factory and saw a whole group of obese, diapered girls making cakes while in the middle of it all was Kitty. She was sitting at a table with Dani watching her while Rachel handed more cakes over for Kitty.

"That's right, Kitty. Keep eating. With your help, soon the world will be under my control!" Dani laughed evilly as Kitty pooped her diaper, the stench carrying around the factory. The X-Kids decided to make themselves known after this.

"Step away from our friend!" Kurt shouted as they appeared from behind a bunch of boxes. Kitty didn't even stop eating her cakes. Dani rolled her eyes and turned to Kitty.

"Kitty, please help us deal with these fools. Attack." Dani ordered. Kitty quickly stopped eating her latest cake and charged at her friends surprisingly quick for someone of her girth. Rogue got knocked out almost instantly by Kitty's large belly, being caught off guard for said attack. The others soon followed suit as they didn't want to use their powers out of fear of hurting their friend. Dani looked over the knocked out X-Kids and suddenly had an idea.

"Kitty, I want you to tie these two up, change them into the company uniform and diapers and force feed them. Rachel and Suzanne, help me take those three to be frozen." Dani ordered, nodding to Jean and Rogue and Scott, Kurt and Spyke respectively as she, Rachel and a large African-American girl with black hair tied in a ponytail grabbed the latter three and drug them to the factory's enormous freezer.

"Yes," said Kitty nodding as she grabbed two uniforms and diapers for Jean and Rogue. She quickly changed them and tied them up to two chairs. When Rogue and Jean woke up, the first thing they noticed was the diapers and that they were tied up. Before they could even speak, they were being force fed numerous cakes. As time passed, Jean and Rogue started to become fatter and fatter, their bellies becoming rounder and they had no choice, but use their diapers, causing Kitty to laugh.
155212312111.title: Kitty's friends start to notice something

1552123121111.content:
Dani, Rachel and Suzanne quickly finished freezing Scott, Kurt and Spyke, making them look like blocks of ice. Dani smiled at the handy work. "Alright. With that taken care of, I will be in my office. I have some work to go over." Dani said, heading to the office while Suzanne went back to work with the other girls.

"Rachel, don't forget to lock up the antidote cupcake!" ordered Dani, who had made said cupcake in case she ever accidently ate one of her cakes. "Aye, lass." Rachel said as Dani went into her office. Rachel went over to lock up the cupcake, when the timer went off for some other cakes. "Och. Dani will kill me if I let the cakes burn." said a worried Rachel, waddling to the ovens.

Unknown to either Rachel or Dani, Scott's optic beam was charging up and a second later, he had freed himself, causing him to fall to his knees and hands. "Finally." remarked Scott as he got up and quickly began freeing Spyke and Kurt. Within minutes, the duo were freed.

"Thanks man." Spyke said as Scott helped him up. "Vere are Jean und Rogue?" Kurt asked, looking for said duo. "I dunno but I overheard Dani talking about an antidote cupcake that can destroy the brainwashing. We just need to feed it to Kitty, then we'll try and find Rogue and Jean." Scott replied, earning nods from the duo as he grabbed the large pink frosted and rainbow sprinkled cupcake as they left.

The trio started looking around the factory and what they saw a few minutes later shocked them. There was Rogue and Jean, tied up, donned in the bakery's uniforms and diapers and being force fed cake. The duo had put on quite a bit of weight, the t-shirts riding up above their bellybuttons. Kitty was still force feeding them, often swiping bites from the cakes herself.

"Kitty, stop!" Kurt called, startling Kitty as Scott quickly used his optic blasts to free Rogue and Jean, who quickly used their new weight to pin Kitty down as they tackled her.

"Quick! Get this in her mouth!" Scott called, tossing the cupcake to Rogue, who quickly stuffed it into Kitty's mouth. Kitty, out of habit, ate it and then burped loudly. It took a couple of minutes for the antidote to take hold.

"Errg. Like, what happened?" Kitty asked as Jean and Rogue managed to get off her. Then, all the memories of her time mind controlled came flooding in. "Like, oh man guys. I'm so totally sorry." Kitty said, feeling awful for hurting her friends.

"It's okay, Kit. Ya can make it up by gettin' Dani for us while we try an' free Rachel and her friends." Rogue smiled as she helped Kitty up. Kitty nodded and took off fairly quickly despite her weight and full diaper. Soon, she reached Dani's office and phased through the door, shocking Dani.

"Kitty? What is it? I told you to force feed those brats!" Dani commanded. "Like, I'm totally me again, Dani! My friends're like, totally freeing Rach and the others now." Kitty smiled, nodding to the screens. Dani turned in time to see, to her horror, Jean using her telepathy to free Rachel and the other girls, who now looked surprised and confused.


"NO!!! Those freaks'll pay for this!!!" Dani snarled as she grabbed a tube filled with red liquid. "Once I make them drink this, your idiot friends will be addicted just like you were!" she laughed. "Like, no way!" Kitty shouted, tackling Dani and pinning her under her gut. Quickly, Kitty grabbed the vial and forced it's entire contents into Dani's throat. Within seconds, Dani swelled up into a sumo version of herself, knocking Kitty off.

"Must have cakes... gotta have cakes..." Dani moaned as she ran towards the nearest large box and started wolfing them down as the X-Kids and her former employees watched in amusement.

A few weeks later, Kitty, Jean and Rogue were having a victory party in Kitty's room. Dani had been arrested and the girls, due to being brainwashed, had been cleared of charges. Rachel, meanwhile, had taken over the bakery and was doing a good job running it.

"Like, good thing we totally decided against using the cure to loose this blubber." Kitty smiled to Jean and Rogue as they ate their way through junk food heaps. Jean was eating numerous creampuffs, Rogue was chomping down on peanut butter, snickerdoodle and chocolate chip cookies and Kitty was eating numerous cakes. They were also clad in only t-shirts and diapers.

"Yeah. I can't believe we ever hated being fat. We're still pretty active and agile even with our current sizes and we're really strong!" Jean smiled before stuffing six big creampuffs into her mouth, smearing powdered sugar and frosting on her face and mouth.

At that moment, Kitty, eating a large cake with her hands, pooped her diaper. "Oopsie!" She blushed as the stench filled the room. "Good thing we also decided ta keep wearin' and usin' diapers!" Rogue joked, causing them to laugh as they continued their party.
1552123121111.title: Scott frees himself

1552123131.content:
Kitty was on her way home when she noticed a new doughnut shop. Since she'd never seen it before, she decided to go inside.

When she walked inside, Kitty noticed the shop was very retro themed. As she walked up to the counter, she rose an eyebrow at some of the names since they were all stuff like "the gut puncher" and "the stuffer". "Like, those are totally strange names for doughnuts." Kitty thought to herself as she was brought out of her thoughts by the woman working behind the counter.

"Hello. Welcome to Doughnut Heaven. How may I help you?" said the woman in a much too cheery tone for the job she had in Kitty's opinion. Kitty looked at the menu and took a few seconds before making her mind up.

"Like, I'll have two gut punchers," Kitty said. The woman nodded and pulled two gut punchers out from the display case. Kitty was surprised by the size of them. They were as round as her head with pink and blue sprinkles on them. The woman put them into a to-go bag.

"Ok miss, that'll be two dollars." said the woman in her cheery voice. Kitty was surprised by how cheap the doughnuts were given their size, but nevertheless handed over a ten and told the woman to keep the change. Once out of the shop, Kitty pulled one of the doughnuts out and took a bite. Her taste buds exploded, it was the best thing she'd ever tasted and she kept eating as she walked. By the time she got back to the mansion, she had finished both doughnuts and rubbing her bloated belly.

"Like, I totally need to go there again!" Kitty said to herself, letting out a jumbo burp,still rubbing her belly.
1552123131.title: Doughnuts

155212313132.content: It had been a month since Kitty had first entered the doughnut shop and she had been going twice a day for the last month, her orders getting larger and larger and that wasn't the only thing getting larger. Kitty had put on quiet a bit of weight due to her new diet. She was quiet round as you could see her belly through her tight cream t-shirt and her blue jeans looked painfully tight showing her round butt. She was in the middle of eating a doughnut when she was called to go on a mission. So she changed into her X-Man uniform, though it wasn't fitting as well either, showing off her round. She also seemed oblivious to her weight gain. As Kitty was about to zip up her uniform, it...
155212313132.title: Noticably rounder

1552123131322.content:
Kitty was tugging at her navy blue and purple uniform when she heard a loud ripping sound. She looked down to see her uniform had ripped down the side, letting her love handle spill out. "Oh man. Like, I must've totally shrunk it in the wash." Kitty muttered, still completely oblivious to her weight gain as she quickly pulled the uniform off and placed it in the bin, promising to get a new one.

"Like, I'm totally sure the others can handle whatever threat's come up," Kitty said, tugging on her civilian clothes with a lot of effort. Once she got her clothes on, her belly rumbled and she decided it was best to grab some doughnuts and waddled to the doughnut shop. When she arrived, she found there weren't too many customers, which wasn't surprising since it was still pretty early.

"Hello, Kitty. I see you're in again," smiled the woman behind the counter. Kitty had been in the shop so often, she was on first name basis with most of the employees who were always cheerful.

"Hey, Becky. Like, can I totally get my usual order?" Kitty asked. Becky nodded and stuffed 12 doughnuts into a box. Three were of different kinds since Kitty's taste in doughnuts had greatly improved. she quickly thanked Becky and waddled out of the shop, her belly jiggling as she did so.

By the time she'd reached the mansion, Kitty had eaten six of her 12 doughnuts, sprinkles and powdered sugar covering her mouth as she flopped onto the living room couch, making her belly jiggle as she laid on her back, using one hand to rub her belly and using the other to eat the rest of her doughnuts.
1552123131322.title: It rips

15521231313222.content:
Scott, Jean, Kurt, Rogue and Spyke were all sitting around. There wasn't any missions or anyone needing help so they decided to just have a relaxing day. But Scott noticed someone was missing. "Hey, where's Kitty?" He asked, picking some loose fabric from his blue sweater, the dark lenses of his glasses watching the door.

"She's probably at that doughnut shop again," Jean said, rolling her eyes as she tucked some of her red hair behind her ear. "And if you ask me, I think she's spending too much time there. I think she's getting kind of..."

Before Jean could finish her sentence, there was a loud cracking sound. A second later, they saw Kitty waddling up to the door while using one hand to eat one of the doughnuts. But as she got up to the door and tried to go through, she found that she was stuck. Her big love handles pressed against the doorframe. She tried to free herself but couldn't. After a minute, she gave up, huffing and puffing and her round face slightly red.

"Like, hey guys. Can you help me?" Kitty asked, waving her flabby arms, half a doughnut in her mouth. "Kurt, you teleport and push from behind while I pull," Scott said. Kur nodded and teleported behind Kitty and the duo started to push and pull. It took a couple of minutes until Kitty was completely free.

"Like, thanks guys." Kitty said, shoving another doughnut into her mouth. "Maybe you should cut back on the doughnuts," said Kurt, clearly concerned for Kitty as she waddled to the couch. "I'm, like, totally fine." Kitty said, flopping on the couch, causing her whole body to jiggle and repositioned herself so she was laying on her back, making her burp loudly. As she made herself comfortable, the other moved away to talk about her for a few minutes.

"Guys, Ah'm worried about Kitty. She's gettin' huge and Ah bet it's somethin' ta do with that doughnut shop she's been going too." Rogue said with a worried look.

"You're right. Maybe we should go check the place out." Jean said with a shrug.

"Alright. Kurt, Jean and I'll go check it out while Rogue, you and Spyke keep an eye on Kitty to make sure she doesn't get any bigger." Scott said. Kurt then grabbed Jean and Scott's shoulders and teleported them to an ally behind the doughtnut shop. They looked around and saw an open window.

"Well, that's lucky." Kurt said as they all climbed through the window when they saw...
15521231313222.title: A month later

choices: Kitty is rescued by her friends
155212313132221.content:
As Scott, Jean and Kurt entered the shop through the window, they saw a middle aged man that had a whole mad scientist look about him, seeing as he was talking to himself. Jean signaled for them to hide behind some barrels and they listened to the mad scientist talking to himself. "Yes. My test subject is coming along perfectly, now that Miss. Pryde is growing huge. Soon, I will release my doughnuts around the world and everyone will be too fat to resist me taking over the world!" laughed the mad scientist. The trio decided it was time to make their presence known.

"Not if we stop you," said Kurt as he, Jean and Scott revealed themselves. "Ah, I see Kitty's little friends have come to put a stop to my plans." said the mad scientist with a huge smirk on his face.

"We will stop you," said Scott. But as soon as he stopped talking, a strange mist filled the room, making Scott, Jean and Kurt pass out. The scientist walked over to them smirking. "Don't worry you will all wake up soon with a little soreness." He smirked.

This current situation had put a big dent in his plans. He would need to put his off hand monitoring and take on a more practical approach. Grabbing a large bag of doughnuts, he left for the X-Mansion. Upon showing up, he saw Rogue and Spyke arguing over something in the kitchen while Kitty was still laying on the couch, holding an empty bag of doughnuts. Smirking, the mad scientist went to the front of the mansion and started saying through an open window, "Come on, Kitty. Don't you want some tasty doughnuts?" said the mad scientist, waving the large bag of doughnuts back and forth."

"Doughnuts..." Kitty said in an almost trance like state as she managed to get up and waddled to the door, turning sideways so she could get through. She then followed the mad scientist, with him feeding her doughnuts as he led her to his mansion, which took awhile to get to. Once there, the scientist helped Kitty onto a large king sized bed as she munched on her doughnuts.

A few days later, the scientist ran into a problem. Kitty seemed to have entered an eating trance, an unforeseen side effect of having nothing to eat but doughnuts, though the scientist didn't mind this side effect, it also brought out another side effect. Due to being in an eating trance, Kitty didn't noticed she was peeing and pooping her pants due to forgetting about going to the bathroom. The scientist struggled to find away to fix this before deciding on putting her in diapers to deal with the problem.

Taking advantage of Kitty snoring softly, he put her in a large thick diaper, taking time to lovingly jiggle her big belly and love handles. This diaper wasn't like normal ones. It was able to be cleaned after each use, even the wettest pee or stickiest poop couldn't stain it and it never wore out. It wasn't long before this task was done and he went back to his main mission of spreading his doughnuts around the world.

A month later...
155212313132221.title: A bad guy

1552123131322211.content:
It had been a month since Kitty ended up in the mad scientist's care. Though Kitty didn't seem to notice the passing time since she spent most of it eating or sleeping or, in some occasions, sleep eating.

The mad scientist was quiet happy with how much Kitty had grown. Her belly was now so big, it hung over the waistband of her diaper while her face was like a blob of dough with a double chin, plus her arms and legs were squishy and flabby, her fingers, hands, feet and toes were all plump and her boobs had swollen considerably as well.

In order to see if Kitty was still mobile, the mad scientist did an experiment in which he had her waddle to the living room. He found that, though she was able to do so, Kitty was left very out of breath and was quite slow. She then started eating the very big doughnut left for her.

After the experiment, the mad scientist quickly changed into a smart suit. He had a meeting with a high ranking government official to get his doughnut franchise spread around the world. After checking to make sure that Kitty was still in an eating trance and had enough doughnuts to make her full, he started to leave, only for a thick cloud of smoke to appear in front of him.

As the smoke clear, he saw it was five mutant teenagers, three of who he recognized from the month before when they broke into his shop. All five were very shocked to see Kitty fat and diapered while Kitty started on another doughnut.

"Wow. Kitty's as big as a pig," Rogue remarked, looking at her obese teammate and best friend. "Why did you make our friend fat?" Scott asked, glaring at the mad scientist.

"Oh, your friend is just helping me with my plan to conquer the world," smirked the mad scientist as he unleashed a pink mist. However, he was left confused by the fact it didn't have any effect on the five teenagers. He was even more shocked by the effect it had on Kitty.

"Hey. Like, where am I? What's goin' on?" Kitty asked, looking around in confusion at her friends and the mad scientist. When she looked down, she couldn't see her feet. Just her big ole belly. "Like, why am I so totally fat?!?!?" She asked, shaking her belly and thus causing it to jiggle and bounce.

"Vell explain later," Kurt said as he and the others began fighting the mad scientist. Despite their efforts, the man was quite slippery and managed to avoid their physical or telekinetic attacks. As he got near Kitty, she saw her chance and threw herself at him. Before he could move, Kitty belly flopped on him, knocking him out cold. Scott and Kurt quickly heaved her up while Jean and Spyke quickly tied up the mad scientist.

"Thanks guys. So, like, what happened?" Kitty asked, still getting used to her girth.

"Basically, you were used as a test subject by the scientist dude who wanted to make everybody fat so he could rule the world." Spyke explained, having been told of the man's plan by Scott, Jean and Kurt after the trio had returned to the mansion a month prior.

"Like, okay," Kitty said, clearly still confused over the whole ordeal.

"Uh, Kitty... are ya wearin' a diaper?" Rogue asked, trying and failing not to laugh at how silly Kitty looked in the extra large diaper. "Like, I totally don't know why." Kitty said in embarrassment, her round cheeks blushing deep bright red as she poked the undergarment.

"We'll figure that out later," Kurt smiled as he teleported the gang home, leaving the mad scientist to the authorities.

A year later found Kitty heading to Bayville Mall to hang with her friends. Though she had dropped most of the weight, returning her face, boobs, arms, feet, legs, butt, hands, toes and fingers to normal, she nevertheless sported a rather large belly that hugged her shirts and sweaters. She also retained her jumbo appetite as well. Despite this, she was happy this way and her friends knew and supported it. Kitty was still able to go on missions and was actually still fairly agile despite her remaining fat.

However, unknown to the other X-Kids, Kitty also still wore the thick, cleanable diaper she'd been introduced to by the mad scientist. She did so because she found it very comfy and it made her feel safe.
1552123131322211.title: Kitty is rescued by her friends

1552123132.content:
Kitty and her friends were sitting in an ice cream parlor in one of the booths. They'd decided it would be a nice treat to go get ice cream together. They were looking through the menus together, trying to decide on what each of them wanted. "Wow. Like, these flavors look totally amazing!" Kitty smiled, showing a picture of a bowl of strawberry ice cream with chocolate sauce, earning a hungry stare from the other X-Kids.

"Yeah, I know. Not to mention they have very large ice cream sundaes here. They look incredible." Scott agreed, showing the others, who licked their lips in hunger as they eyed the image. This gave Rogue an idea as she stared at the menu.

"Hey, Kitty. Ah dare ya to eat an entire sundae by yourself without any help from us. If ya do, Ah'll give ya 5 bucks." Rogue offered with a smirk. Kitty thought about it. On one hand, the picture made the sundae look massive. But then, on the other, 5 dollars was 5 dollars.

"Like, that five dollars is totally mine!" Kitty smirked back as she closed her menu. After waiting a few seconds after Scott got up to place their orders before returning to take his seat next to Jean. A few minutes later, a waitress arrived with five bowls of ice cream: mint for Jean, chocolate for Kurt, strawberry for Scott and two butter pecans for Rogue and Spyke. Then, she turned to Kitty.

"I'll bring your order in just a second," smiled the waitress as she went back, leaving Kitty to watch her friends eat their ice creams. A minute later, the waitress arrived and placed a massive sundae in front of Kitty. It had large scoops of ice cream, which were drenched in hot fudge sauce, a generous amount of whipped cream and a huge red cherry on top. Kitty's mouth was watering and her friends were shocked by the size of the sundae.

"Ha! There's no way ya can eat all'a that!" Rogue smirked, already gloating.

"Like, nope! That five dollars is totally mine!" said Kitty, grabbing her spoon and digging in. Her taste buds exploded with flavor. She kept eating and eating until a half-hour later, the sundae was gone, leaving a very green looking Kitty clutching her bloated belly, her face filled with pain.

"Kitty? Are you alright? You don't look so good." Kurt said with concern for his friend.

"Like, I'm totally fine..." said Kitty. She was then interrupted by herself slapping her hand over her mouth as she felt bile raising in her throat while feeling herself starting to gag, making her cheeks puff up, but Kitty managed to swallow it down, releasing her hand and letting out a large burp. "Excuse me." said Kitty and then she turned to Rogue. "Like, pay up." Kitty said with a smug smile, despite her belly's pain.

"Ah still can't believe ya managed ta eat it all," Rogue said, rolling her eyes as she forked over the money and Kurt and Scott helped Kitty out of the booth.

"Like, yeah. But it totally tasted amazing! I have to, like, totally do this again," said Kitty as she followed her friends out of the shop.
1552123132.title: Ice cream

15521231321.content:
It had been a whole week since the group of mutant teens went to the ice cream parlor and unbeknownst to the others, Kitty had been going back once a day to get a cup of ice cream, resulting in her putting on a little weight. Nothing major, just five pounds. None of her friends noticed this because they spend 99% of the time together.

One day the gang decided to visit the ice cream parlor again for another treat after a busy week as they took their seat in a booth. "I still can't believe you managed to eat a whole sundae last week," Jean said with a giggle as she looked over the ice cream menu.

"Yeah. But it tasted totally amazing," Kitty said, licking her lips as she imagined the sundae despite the fact that she'd almost thrown up all over the table the last time she'd had it. Scott then had an idea.

"Hey, Kitty. I'll bet you 40 dollars that you can't eat two of those sundaes," said Scott with a smug grin, remembering the state Kitty had been in after eating just one last week. Kitty thought about it. Two sundaes were a lot to eat, but her appetite had been increasing over the past week. Plus, she could use the 40 dollars to buy something. After a couple more seconds of thinking, she decided.

"I accept your dare," Kitty said with a smirk. Jean went over and placed the order and returned a minute later. After ten minutes, two waitresses came to the table. One was holding the rest of the group's orders while the second held Kitty's two large sundaes similar to the one she'd ordered last time. After saying thanks to the duo, the rest of the group ate their ice creams while watching Kitty as she devoured the first sundae, getting hot fudge all over her face. But as she started the second one, she slowed down, starting to feel full. But she still ate and ate until the last sundae was gone, leaving Kitty looking very green.

"I can't believe I lost 40 dollars," sighed Scott as he handed Kitty the money. Kitty was about to retort but she then felt bile raising in her throat. She quickly got up, grateful to have chosen to sit next to the booth's opening, and ran off to the bathroom surprisingly quick for being so bloated like she was.

Upon reaching the bathroom, she entered the nearest cubical and threw up straight into the toilet, brown liquid hitting the water. After a few minutes, Jean and Rogue entered.

"You okay, Kitty?" Jean asked, looking at her bloated friend bent over the toilet.

"Yeah. Like, I totally think I got it all out of my system." Kitty said as Rogue helped her up and back to the rest of the group.
15521231321.title: A week later

155212313211.content:
It had been a whole month since Kitty had done her second sundae dare. Ever since that day, Kitty had been making multiple trips to the ice cream parlor daily, mainly getting ice cream cones. This had led to a massive change in her weight and appearance.

Her belly now hung over the waistband of her way too tight pants, her boobs had gone up at least two cup sizes while her face had gotten a bit rounder with chubby cheeks and a double chin coming in. All her friends had noticed Kitty's change in weight, but had decided against saying anything that might hurt their friend's feelings.

But there was something her friends didn't know. Due to having accidents in her pants, Kitty had resorted to wearing diapers, which had two benefits in her mind. One was she didn't have to stop eating when she needed to use the toilet plus it made her feel more comfortable. One day, Kitty was back in the parlor with her friends when Jean had a small smirk on her face.

"Hey, Kitty. I bet you can't..." Jean began, but was interrupted by Kitty.

"Like, let me guess... you totally wanna bet that, like, I totally can't eat a whole sundae." Kitty said, rolling her eyes. Eating a whole sundae had become such an easy task for her at this point, she could probably finish two and still have room for at least one ice cream cone.

"Actually, I was gonna bet you couldn't eat a whole banana split," Jean said, pointing to a picture on the menu, making Kitty drool slightly.

"Like, bring it on!" said Kitty with a confident smirk as Scott went to place their order and returned to the group. After a few minutes, two waitresses carried the banana split over and placed it in front of Kitty, who was surprised by the size of it. It had three bananas, several scoops of chocolate, vanilla and strawberry ice cream, hot fudge and a big spray of whipped cream on top, complete with a cherry on top. Suddenly, Kitty didn't feel confident about eating it, but nevertheless, Kitty grabbed a spoon and started to eat.

A half hour later, Kitty had managed to eat half of the banana split before she started to rub her belly. Seeing that their friend needed help, Spyke and Rogue started cheering her on.

"C'mon K-girl! You can do it!" Evan said encouragingly to Kitty. "Listen ta him, Kit! Ya can't let that oversized dessert beat ya!" Rogue agreed with an equally encouraging smile. Feeling a bit better and having freed up some room in her belly due to using her diaper, Kitty grabbed her spoon and started to eat the rest of the banana split.

Once she was done, she leaned back, rubbing her belly with hot fudge sauce on her cheeks and bits of ice cream on her shirt and sweater. "Wow. I can't believe you actually ate all that," Jean said, a little surprised by how much Kitty had eaten.

Kitty just smirked, still rubbing her swollen belly and thinking that she was getting very good at this eating ice cream thing as Kurt helped her up from the booth and she waddled after her friends.
155212313211.title: A month later

1552123132111.content:
Another three weeks had passed and Kitty had been visiting the ice cream parlor even more often than before and most of the time she would end up ordering a sundae maybe two if she was extra hungry.

A lot of changes had happened to Kitty. She put on even more weight. Her belly had grown bigger along with her boobs and butt and she had fully developed a double chin that wobbled as she talked and a third one was sneaking up on her. She also had to upgrade her wardrobe due to popping the button of her pants while eating one of her sundaes. She had also gotten a bigger sweater and t-shirt, but they still seemed very tight, highlighting her belly and love handles.

She even had to get bigger diapers to contain her growing butt, though Kitty still seemed pretty oblivious to her massive weight gain. She thought it was only a few pounds at the most.

Kitty was lying on the couch watching TV, the remote control laying on her belly when suddenly her belly let out a massive rumble. "Wow. Like, I totally better grab something to eat. It's totally almost dinnertime." thought Kitty as she got up and waddled to the kitchen to start making herself dinner, even though it wasn't anywhere near dinnertime.

Along with her visits to the ice cream parlor, her appetite at home had grown as well, making her eat more often and larger amounts. Kitty finished making her dinner, which looked like it could feed three people and started to eat it quite messily, with some of it getting on her clothes and face. Kurt walked past and rose an eyebrow, but didn't say anything.

Later that night, Kitty was laying in bed, trying to sleep, but she was feeling too hungry to sleep. Rolling over, she saw that her clock read midnight. "Hmm... Like, I totally guess a quick midnight snack totally couldn't hurt." Kitty thought as she got out of bed, her pink pajama t-shirt clinging to her belly and her matching shorts looking like they were going to burst at any minute.

Kitty waddled out of her room, going slow as possible to try and not wake anyone up. When she got to the kitchen, she started to make a sandwich with cheese, ham, tomato, lettuce, mayo, five pickles, lots of ketchup and an olive on top while also grabbing a carton of milk.

Rogue was awakened by creaking floorboards and quickly jumped out of bed, following the sound and found a light in the kitchen. Peeking her head in, she saw Kitty gulping down her massive midnight snack and downing a carton of milk.

"Alright. This is gettin' outta hand," Rogue said quietly, rolling her eyes as she left Kitty to enjoy her midnight snack. The next day, Rogue met her friends in the kitchen, except for Kitty, who was still sleeping. "Hey. Is it me or is Kitty gettin' really fat lately?" Rogue asked as she grabbed a cinnamon roll.

"She is getting pretty big. Yesterday I walked by and she was eating a meal that would feed three people," Kurt said, a little worried for his friend.

"An' last night Ah saw her eatin' a large sandwich and downin' an entire carton of milk," Rogue said.

"Do you think we should say something?" Jean asked just as they heard the sound of creaking floorboards and a few minutes later, Kitty waddled in. "Hey guys. Like, what're you talking about?" She asked, waddling over to the fridge and opening it.

"Kitty, we need to talk to you about something..." Scott started, trying to find a nice way to say that Kitty was getting fat, but was interrupted by Rogue.

"Kitty, you're gettin' fat an' eatin' a ton," Rogue said, poking Kitty's belly, her finger sinking into Kitty's belly fat, which caused Kitty to slap her hand away.

"Like, what're you guys talking about? I'm totally not getting fat. I, like, only put on a few pounds at the most," Kitty said, in denial of her about her weight.

"But you are getting fat and you've been eating everything. You really need to cut back," Kurt said, earning nods from the rest of the group.

"Like, you guys are totally just being mean," Kitty said, grabbing a bag of Cheetos and waddling away in a huff, leaving her friends very confused and all promising to help Kitty loose weight.
1552123132111.title: Three weeks later

choices: Everyone at school notices her weight gain
Everybody doesn't notice her weight gain
15521231321111.content:
It had been a whole week since Kitty's friends had confronted her about her weight gain and her diet had taken an even bigger turn. Every day for breakfast, she would have a stack of pancakes covered in maple syrup and a whole box of doughnuts with mixed kinds.

She usually also had a bunch of snacks to tie her over until lunchtime where she had three PB&J sandwiches, 12 chocolate chip cookies and a large soda to wash it all down. And when dinnertime arrived, Kitty usually ate fourths of whatever was being served except for fruits and vegetables, which she wouldn't touch. During one meal, Scott decided to speak up.

"Kitty, you really need to cut back on the meals, plus all the junk food you've been eating." said Scott, causing Kitty to pause in the middle of eating her fourth plate of pasta.

"I agree with Scott. You really do need to cut back like we told you last week. You're getting even bigger." said Jean, who was sitting closest to Kitty and was poking her finger into Kitty's much bigger belly, her finger sinking into the flab. Kitty slapped her hand away.

"First of all, I'm, like, totally not fat and second of all, I'm totally not addicted to junk food." Kitty said, grabbing her plate of pasta and waddling away, eating her pasta as she did. As she reached her room, she was slightly out of breath. As she laid down on her bed, she noticed a leftover chocolate bar poking out of her underpants drawer. This gave her an idea.

"Like, if my friends totally have a problem with me eating junk food, I'll just, like, totally hide it in my room." Kitty thought to herself as she started picking places to hide her junk food. She then waited until midnight when everybody was asleep and then waddled down to the kitchen, grabbed several types of junk food and then carried them back to her room.

A few days later, the gang walked into Kitty's room while she was out. They were looking for a couple of study notes Kitty had agreed to let them look over for an upcoming test. After a couple of minutes looking, Rogue grew bored and decided to sit on Kitty's bed.

As soon as her butt touched the bed, she felt something crumpling. She quickly jumped up and pulled the blankets back to reveal a smooshed banana cream pie. "Okay. That's just plain gross," said Rogue, lifting the destroyed pie up to show the others.

"You think Kitty's been hiding junk food?" asked Kurt, raising an eyebrow. "Looks like it. We can't let her keep it. We need to find the rest. Start looking." Scott ordered. Everybody started to look. After a few minutes, Jean found a massive stash. There was several types of junk food. Spyke grabbed a bag and started putting the junk food in the bin just as Kitty waddled in and saw her friends destroying her junk food supply.

"Like, what're you guys doing?!?!?!?" Kitty shouted, shocking that her friends were doing. Kurt decided to speak up since he was the more diplomatic of the group.

"Look Kitty, ve are doing this for your own good. You've got a junk food problem and ve are just trying to help you." Kurt said in a calming tone, trying to get his friend to understand.

"NO YOU'RE NOT! LIKE, YOU'RE DOING THIS TO HURT ME!" Kitty screamed, stomping her foot and causing her whole body to jiggle like jelly. "You know what? Forget you guys! Like, I'm totally going to school!" Kitty screamed, waddling away to school.

What next?
15521231321111.title: A week later

choices: Kitty finally admits she has a problem
155212313211111.content:
Kitty finally made it to school. It took a bit longer than usual because she had to keep stopping to catch her breath. When she got into the building, she waddled straight to her locker where she grabbed a package of cookies she'd been hiding in her locker and started to eat them.

Kitty didn't notice that most of the school had been looking at her. Everybody had noticed her weight gain by now. Most didn't care and went about their own business but some were laughing behind her back as the bell rang.

Kitty made her way to class, bumping into a few classmates with her huge belly, which she was completely oblivious too. When she got to class, she spent most of it sneaking bits of food from her bag. She did this for every class until lunchtime.

There, she got herself three trays of food from hamburgers to pizza slices to corn dogs and ate them, causing several of the students to stare in amazement at how much she was eating. After half an hour, Kitty had finally finished eating, leaving herself covered with sauce and bits of pepperoni and she had also used her diaper while she was eating.

Luckily for her, she always kept a few spare diapers in her bag. She was going to change once her bloating went down and she was starting to feel slightly sick. After ten minutes of rubbing her belly and trying not to throw up, two cheerleaders came up to the table with mean looks on their faces. Kitty noticed them. "Hey." said Kitty, covering her mouth with her hand to stop a big burp.

"Wow, Pryde. You've really turned into a fat pig, haven't you?" said one of the cheerleaders, poking Kitty in her large squishy belly. Before Kitty could respond, the second cheerleader spoke up.

"Yeah. You've turned into a right whale," laughed the other cheerleader, causing the other one to laugh and Kitty to blush. "Like, you guys are totally just mean," Kitty said, getting up and waddling away, the cheerleaders laughing behind her.

Kitty made her way to the toilets where she spent another half hour sitting on a toilet seat before she finally felt like her food had digested enough for her to actually change her stinky diaper. Once she was changed, she suddenly got a craving for ice cream again.

After a few minutes of thinking it over, Kitty decided to give into her cravings. "Like, I've totally only got two classes left away. Plus, I can, like, totally get notes from Jean and Kurt anyway." Kitty thought, wadding out of the toilets and down the quiet hallway to the exit.

After a half hour of waddling, Kitty arrived at the ice cream parlor and ordered one of every flavor of ice cream cones and two sundaes. The waitress working there was shocked by the order for one person, but nevertheless, she told Kitty the first part of the order would be out in a couple of minutes. Kitty smiled, showing off her double chin and waddled off to one of the booths, where she squeezed herself into one.

A few minutes later, a waitress came up with a tray holding six different types of ice cream cones which Kitty instantly started to dig into, not caring that they were dripping onto her clothes. "Like, oh well. They're totally already dirty from lunch," said Kitty, loudly licking a chocolate ice cream cone.

Once she was done, two waitresses walked over, carrying both sundaes. New ones with huge bananas, chocolate, vanilla, strawberry and mint ice cream with hot fudge and whipped cream with a cherry on top. Kitty dug in with glee. Half an hour later, Kitty was left feeling sick with two empty sundae bowls in front of her.

She was brought out of her thoughts by her friends showing up. "Hey, Kitty. Are you alright? Ve heard about vat happened at school." said Kurt.

"Like, I'm totally fine." Kitty smiled. Then *GGGURGGGGLLLEEEEE* went her large belly. "Like, oh poops. I so totally don't feel so go..." Kitty said before throwing up all over her friends. "Oops," Kitty blushed, seeing her friends covered with barf.

"Let's just get you home," Rogue said, rolling her eyes as she wiped Kitty's vomit out of her hair while Scott and Kurt helped Kitty up and then home.

Later that night, Kitty went for a midnight snack. When she saw some ice cream that was on the floor after eating a lot, she figured "what the heck" and licked it up. She was just starting to dip some chocolate into a pot of gravy she had made when her friends came inside.
155212313211111.title: Everyone at school notices her weight gain

1552123132111111.content:
The X-Kids looked at Kitty in shock as they saw her bent on her knees, licking ice cream from the floor and with a chocolate bar in her hand. Kitty looked up at her friends and blushed with embarrassment at them seeing her doing this.

While looking down, she saw her belly touching the floor. For the first time, she realized just how big she really was. Kurt could see his friend was embarrassed by the whole thing and went over to help her.

"Kitty, are you alright?" He asked gently, helping Kitty to her feet, which was a challenge as Kitty was twice his size now. "Ok. Like, I totally may've put on a little weight," admitted Kitty, only to be given a look by her friends. "Okay. Like, maybe a ton of weight." Kitty said, looking down and making her double chins visible.

"Now admit ya've got a junk food problem." said Rogue, rolling her eyes.

"Like, I still don't have a junk food problem." Kitty insisted, crossing her bloated arms over her chest.

"We literally just saw you licking ice cream off the floor." Jean said, raising an eyebrow.

"Alright. Like you guys totally have a point." Kitty said.

"Don't worry, Kitty. We'll help you get through this." Scott said, earning nods from the others.

That night had happened a few months prior and Kitty's friends had helped her loose a great deal of weight, though she still retained a large belly that was visible through her shirts. Her junk food habit had been tough to break, but they managed to do it.

However, one thing that hadn't changed was her usage of diapers. She was currently sitting on her bed in only a thick diaper and a red t-shirt. After a moment, she let out a giant fart as she pooped her diaper and smiled. "Like, I totally love using my diaper." She giggled, laying on her back and poking her tummy, causing her burp loudly as she then enjoyed her sticky and smelly diaper rubbing it's poopy load against her still large behind.
1552123132111111.title: Kitty finally admits she has a problem

1552123133.content: What other foods could it be?
1552123133.title: Others

15521231331.content:
Kitty and Jean were walking back home from school when they walked past a sweet shop. "Come on, Jean! Let's, like, totally get ourselves a treat. We totally earn it after since we did great on that test." Kitty said, dragging Jean into the small shop.

"Okay. Why not?" Jean said as they started to look around the shop. It had many types of sweets and candy. From M&Ms to large chocolate bars. The duo kept looking through the options until Kitty found one that looked pretty good.

"What about this?" Kitty asked, holding up a large chocolate bar in a blue wrapper with orange writing on it. "BIG CHOCO PUNCH Bar" it proclaimed on the wrapper. "Like, it looks totally nice." Kitty said, handing it over to Jean to look over.

"It looks pretty big, but it'll do." Jean said as she and Kitty walked over to the counter and placed the bar on the counter. The cashier then told them there was a special deal that would allow them to get 40 bars for free. The two girls shrugged at each other. Free chocolate is free chocolate.

As they exited the shop, Kitty picked a bar out of the bag and broke it in half, both her and Jean eating part of it. "Wow. This' amazing!" Jean said.

"Like, it totally tastes awesome!" Kitty agreed, taking a bite. Both girls were unaware that, by the time they got home, they had eaten 10 chocolate bars apiece between them.
15521231331.title: Chocolate bars

choices: Kitty nearly eats the ticket but Jean stops her.
Jean nearly eats the ticket, though Kitty manages to stop her in time
155212313311.content:
A week had passed since Kitty and Jean had started eating the Big Fat Coco Punch Bars. They'd eaten all sixty bars by Wednesday and so went back for more. By now, they were much bigger in size and weight.

Kitty and Jean's bellies now hung over their pants' waistbands, their boobs had gone up at least two cup sizes, their faces were rounder and sported double chins, their bodies were fat overall and they both had bigger and plumper butts.

There was also something else about them that was new. Per Jean's suggestion, they now also wore and used thick diapers. Kitty had to admit that this idea was pretty good since it allowed them to eat nonstop without needing toilet breaks and they did feel comfy.

Right now, the duo were in Jean's room, eating more of the chocolate bars. Scott, Kurt, Rogue and Evan knew of their friends' weight gain but didn't say anything since they didn't want to hurt their friends' feelings.

"Like, I can't believe we'd never heard of these candy bars before until last week." Kitty smiled as she stuffed two very big pieces into her mouth, swallowing and burping loudly, chocolate smeared over her mouth.

"I know. They're so delicious. I really love 'em." Jean agreed with a smile as she managed to inhale three bars at once.

The duo kept eating until dinner and then resumed this afterwards. The next day, they went to the store again. As they came up to it, Kitty noticed a sign in the window.

"Like, 'Want a free tour of where your favorite goodies are made? Then find a Choco Extreme Factory's golden ticket in a Big Fat Choco Punch Bar for the experience of a lifetime'!" She read aloud to Jean. The two girls looked at each other in delight. They had the same idea.

Quickly, they ran over to said bars and started grabbing as many as they could carry. Luckily, they had been there enough that their massive amounts of candy were now free of charge. Wobbling slightly from the weight of the giant stacks, the two X-Kids headed for the institute with their precious loads.

Once there, the duo went into Kitty and Rogue's bedroom and set to work eating the chocolate bars at top speed. Neither of them talked much, nor did they stop. Not even when they both wet and pooped their diapers. They just shrugged at each other after noticing their lumpy diapers and kept pigging out. They were determined to find that ticket and thus go on the tour.
155212313311.title: A week later

1552123133111.content:
After almost an hour of eating, Kitty and Jean were starting to get discouraged about finding the ticket. Wrappers of already eaten candy bars laid scattered all over the room and the duo's diapers were very full by now as they were starting to itch and feel uncomfortable due to how full and wet they were.

"Like, this is totally starting to seem impossible, Jean. Besides, my diaper's totally filled to the waistband with my poopies." Kitty sighed after wolfing down her 120th bar. "I know, Kitty. But we can't give up now. Let's just keep eating." Jean smiled gently as she ate her 121st bar. Kitty moaned slightly but nevertheless grabbed bar #121 from her pile.

She unwrapped it and was just about to sink her teeth into the rich milk chocolate when Jean let out a yelp. "KITTY! DON'T EAT THAT CANDY BAR YET!" She yelped, tackling the surprised Kitty off the bed, the duo landing with Kitty on bottom and Jean on top in only t-shirts and extremely full smelly and itchy diapers.

"Owie! Jean, like, what was that totally for?!?!?" Kitty protested as her older friend and teammate rolled off her, allowing Kitty to sit up, still holding the bar.

"Look at the back of the candy bar." Jean said slowly and gently. Kitty frowned slightly, but did so anyway. Then, as she slowly turned the bar over to look at its' back, a flash of gold hit the light. She gasped as she pulled out the gold ticket.

"You did it, Kitty!" Jean squealed as she and Kitty hugged tightly, their bodies squishing against each other. "Yeah. I guess I, like, totally did!" giggled Kitty in delight.

Jean took the ticket and began reading the message aloud. ""Greetings to the lucky winner or winners of this gold ticket from Mrs. Garcia. With this ticket I invite you to tour my factory for one whole day. You may bring one person with you on the tour. You will get to see how you're favorite candies are made and afterwards, when it's time to leave, you will be sent home with all the sweets you and your guest can ever eat'! Be sure to bring this ticket with you when you arrive. The tour will begin at your earliest convenience'." She read to Kitty. "So, we could, like, totally go tomorrow since we don't have school?" Kitty asked hopefully.

"Sure thing, Kitty. Let's go ahead and clean up the wrappers and then we can change our yucky diapers." Jean smiled as she and Kitty started to do so, their diapers sagging so much, you could see their butts poking out if you were going past the room at that moment.

The duo finished cleaning up and then changed their diapers, pulled their pants on and then went for dinner. Scott, Rogue, Kurt and Spyke didn't say anything as they watched their two obese teammates pig out as usual. Though the four were surprised when Kitty and Jean went to bed two hours later, simply stating they felt sleepy from their dinner and candy binge as they did.

Kitty and Jean spent half the night dreaming about the tour the next day. Jean dreamed about eating more and more while being fed her candy by Scott while only in a bra and a large diaper.

Kitty, meanwhile, dreamed about eating everything in sight since it was candy flavored or made of sugary goodies. When Rogue came up to bed not long after, it was to find Kitty chewing on her spare pillow. The southern goth merely smirked as she went to bed.
1552123133111.title: Kitty nearly eats the ticket but Jean stops her.

choices: Jose shows them the Edible Diaper Room. The girls change and pig out.
15521231331111.content:
The next day found Jean and Kitty arriving at the Choco Extreme Factory. It was a very big warehouse-like building. The duo didn't say anything as they approached the doors.

A moment later, a handsome looking tour guide came out. He wore a purple tailcoat, a black bowtie, kaki pants and black shoes. Upon seeing the overweight and diapered girls, he smiled at them.

"Hello. You must be our lucky winners of the tour. I'm Jose Garcia, Mrs. Garcia's son and heir to this factory. I will be your tour guide today." He said to the duo. "Yeah. I'm Jean Grey and this is my friend Kitty Pryde." Jean smiled back as Kitty waved to him.

"Alright. Follow me then. Let's get this tour started." smiled Jose as they headed into the factory. The entrance seemed to be the same as any old warehouse. Jose then led the duo towards a large set of metal doors. "This room is the heart and soul of my mama's whole factory. It contains some of her old and new creations." He told Jean and Kitty, who watched as he unlocked the doors and opened them.

"Ladies, I give you: the chocolate room." He grinned as the doors swung open to reveal a large room filled with numerous types of candies and other sweets. Jean and Kitty couldn't believe their eyes as they took in this wonderful sight.

"Like, this is totally like Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory!" Kitty squealed as she licked her lips. "Feel free to eat as much as you desire!" Jose smiled.

Well, he didn't have to tell those two bloated X-Kids twice. They tore down the steps and began their pig out. Jean went first, grabbing a massive gummy bear and sinking her teeth into it while Kitty split open a large candy pumpkin and started eating it's chocolate inners with her hands.

Jose smiled as he watched the two girls making pigs of themselves. It was clear that the duo loved his mother's candy and were happy to be here. His family had been making sweets for years but had only started the Choco Extreme company a month ago due to moving to the US a year prior following his father's death.

Meanwhile, Kitty was eating a large handful of jelly beans while Jean inhaled a long roll of taffy. The two girls noticed each other's actions, but beamed brightly at each other. The candy was really yummy and they just couldn't help themselves.

So, they kept on eating and eating and eating, their bellies bulging over the waistbands of their pants and diapers by now. Finally, the duo decided to take a break, Kitty licking a lollipop as big as her head while Jean kept chewing on a giant glob of saltwater taffy. "Like, this is totally the yummiest candy I've ever eaten!" Kitty groaned in delight, patting her belly with her free hand as she crunched down the last of her lollipop.

"Tell me about it, Kitty. I don't see how this day could get any better!" Jean agreed as she sucked up the last of her taffy and burped loudly, wiping her mouth with the back of her hand.

A little latter, the duo were following Jose over a massive vat of melted chocolate. Several employees were tending to it, making it ready for when it was needed for a recipe.

They were a little ways from above the vat when Kitty's nose twitched. "What is it?" Jean asked. "Like, is it me or does this walkway totally smell like gingerbread?" Kitty replied. Jean leaned over and sniffed the railing herself. "You're right. It does smell like gingerbread." she realized in shock.

"Like, I'm sure Jose totally wouldn't mind if we eat a tiny bit." Kitty smiled. Jean looked up. Jose was busy talking to an employee at the edge of the walkway. "Okay. But just a bit." She agreed. With that, Kitty starting to nibble the floorboards while Jean chewed on the railing. After a few minutes, "Okay, let's go." Jean whispered. But just as they started forward, the floor gave way under them.

"Kitty, how much of the floorboards did you eat?!?!?" Jean screamed as they plummeted towards the vat. "Like, I totally didn't think it was that muuuuccccchhhh!!!!" Kitty screamed back in alarm. Then *KER-SLOOPPPSSSSHHH!!!* The duo landed in the chocolate.

Hearing both the screams and the splash, Jose looked over in alarm. "Ladies?!?! Are you alright?!?!?" He called. When there was no answer, he quickly ordered the employees to stop the chocolate's flowing throughout the factory in case the X-Girls ended up in danger.

When he reached the bottom, a female employee used two hooks to fish Jean and Kitty out. After a nerve wracking minute, the hooks surfaced, pulling the two girls out. They were covered head to toe in sticky, gooey chocolate. "Are you two alright?" Jose asked in concern.

"Yeah. We just, like, totally got carried away with tasting the walkway." Kitty explained sheepishly as she started lapping the chocolate from her arms and fingers with her tongue. "Here, let me help. Then you can do me." Jean offered. Kitty stood still as Jean started licking her clean, beginning with her face. "J-Jean! That, like, t-t-t-totally tickles!" Kitty giggled as Jean's tongue ran over her tummy and into her bellybutton a few minutes later. Once Jean had cleaned Kitty up the best she could, the youngest X-Man did the same for Jean. With some help from some wash cloths, the rest of the cleanup went by fairly quickly.

Then, *PPPORRRRPPPPTTTT!!!* Kitty farted and her diaper immediately bulged and sagged. "Like, did you bring any diapers for us in case we made a poopy or wet ourselves?" Kitty asked Jean. The redhead blushed sheepishly.

"No. I figured we'd be okay and I left them in the X-Van for after the tour." Jean admitted as Kitty frowned slightly. The brunette just sighed and smiled.

"It's okay, Jean. Like, I guess I can totally wait until we get back to the X-Van for a diapee change." She said kindly. Jean smiled and then, *BBBOOOORRRRRCCCCHHHHH!!!!* Out came a giant fart and load of poop from her big booty.

"Oh crap." Jean sighed. "Well, at least I totally have company in my misery." Kitty giggled as she hugged Jean, who just giggled and smiled as well.

At that moment, Jose came up. "Pardon me, ladies but I could not help but overhear your little problem. If you will follow me, I think I can help you." He smiled. The two girls shrugged and followed Jose farther into the factory.
15521231331111.title: The next day

Kitty was walking down the street when her stomach started rumbling. She'd had to skip breakfast that morning so she headed towards main street where most of the fast food restaurants were located. She saw a McDonald's, Burger King and Wendy's but she noticed a KFC at the end of the street. "Hmm. I haven't had KFC in awhile "said Kitty as she headed towards the fast food joint. She noticed a sign in the window advertising a meal deal: a whole bucket of chicken and fries and a whole bottle of coke for 3.99. "Like, that's totally a good deal." said Kitty as she walked into the restaurant. It looked like a normal KFC apart from a huge painting of chickens on the wall. Kitty walked over to the counter where a employee was standing "Hey I would like your meal deal please "said Kitty with a smile.

"Sure it'll just be a few minutes." said the employee a couple of minutes later Kitty's order was ready. "Here you go. That'll be 3.99." said the employee handing over the bucket of chicken the fries and the coke. Kitty handed over the money, took her order and started to dig into the bucket of chicken her taste buds exploding with flavor. She got so caught up in the taste she didn't notice until she finished that she had eaten the whole bucket and fries and drank all of her coke "Hmm. I gotta to do this again "said Kitty rubbing her bloated belly

It had been a month since Kitty first went to kfc and it had a bit of an effect on her waist line giving her a sight pot belly not that she seems to notice she had been making many trips to kfc at most of the staff knew her by name Kitty woke up one morning her belly rumbling she got out of bed scratching her belly making it jiggle a bit she walked in to the kitchen and looked into the fridge only to find it empty at only made her belly rumble even more "well it looks like it kfc for breakfast " laughed Kitty to herself as she quickly got changed into some slightly tight clothes and made her way to the kfc and entered she was greeted by one of the employees at the counter

15521231333121.content:
The next morning Kitty walked into the KFC and walked up to the counter. She was really hungry but decided it was better to wait until after the interview and then have a bucket of chicken. It was a different employee from the one from yesterday. "Hey I'm Kitty. I'm, like, here for an interview." said Kitty, trying to ignore the rumbling in her stomach and hoping to get this over and done with soon.

"Yeah sure. The manager's office is just at the end of the kitchen." said the employee, pointing to the door past the kitchen. Kitty nodded and said thanks and wondered through the kitchen, trying not to drool at the smell of cooking chicken and fries. She somehow managed this and knocked on the door. It opened to show a middle aged woman wearing a red work shirt.

"Ah you must be Kitty. I'm Miss. Johnson." said Miss Johnson shaking Kitty's hand. Kitty then took a seat and Miss. Johnson asked Kitty a bunch of questions which Kitty answered honestly. "Ok you got the job. Will you be able to start today?" asked Miss. Johnson.

"Really? Like, that's amazing." said Kitty excitedly. "and sure." she added happily. Miss. Johnson handed Kitty over a red work shirt, a pair of black trousers and a thick diaper. Kitty raised her eye brows. "Like, what's this for?" asked Kitty, confused.

"At to make sure you don't take too many bathroom brakes." said Miss. Johnson. Kitty just nodded and quickly got changed. "Ok you can start off with counter work and feel free to eat some food while your working." said Miss. Johnson, leading Kitty to the counter and leaving. Kitty spent the next eight hours eating food and serving customers. That night when she got home, she was really bloated and walked in to see the rest of her friends just hanging out.

"Where you been?" asked Rogue with a curious look.

"I got a job at KFC. Like, I'm going to bed 'cause I'm really tired." said Kitty, resting her hand on belly and going to bed completely forgotten that she was still wearing her very full diaper.

Her red work shirt was super tight around her belly it rising up just above her belly button, she had gotten pretty used to the diapers and they did save her a lot of time. After a couple of more days, Kitty's friends start to get a little worried about her.
